name: Brent Van Zandbergen
text:
Centerline Fitness is a top-notch personal training and group-class fitness  facility that takes your health and safety seriously.  The coaches are certified experts at helping you meet your fitness goals - whether athletic training, job performance, or overall fitness.  I have personally exceeded all of my expectations and personal goals from when I first walked in the door and am amazed at what I've been able to accomplish from week to week and having fun in the process!

Injury avoidance was a key concern of mine when starting a fitness program "at zero" from years of a sedentary lifestyle.  The coaches have been amazing at demonstrating and reinforcing proper technique and have adjusted exercises and even complete programs to accommodate limitations I had when first walking in the door while also guiding me to overcome those limitations through their programming.

By far the best investment I've ever made in myself that has immediate and long-term benefits for my overall well-being.

resp.text: What a great client to work with! Thanks for the kind words, Brent!

name: Chris Dufrene
text: I have thoroughly enjoyed my experience this far. It's a great workout. The training team are super responsive to your individual needs. When you walk out after your workout, you know you've put in work. Kudos Centerline!

resp.text: You were truly a joy to have in our challenge and inspired everyone else to keep motivated. We're so happy you enjoyed the challenge, and you're welcome here any time, my friend. Thank you for the review, Chris!

name: Benita Palmer
text: The best workouts that I've ever had in my life. I thoroughly enjoyed my six weeks with Centerline and I could see a huge difference in how I felt. Chris and the other coaches will set you up for success but it's up to you to stick to the diet and give your best efforts in the workouts. I love that the workouts were a mix of strength training, HIIT, abs and butt, and boxing (my favorite)...you will never get bored!

resp.text: You are so much fun to have in the gym and you crushed the 6-Week Challenge! You were one of the best in class 💪💥🥊💥 Thank you so much!

name: Greorge lucarelli
text: My first week of six great workouts great trainer Chris and I'm sure the others I haven't worked out with yet are just as great. Having fun

resp.text: You take away everyone else's excuse, my brotha! Inspiring! We love having you here. Thanks for the review!

resp.text: That muscle tone! 💪💥 Proof that hard work and consistency pays off. We love having you here, Brandy! Thank you for being a part of our gym fam and for the great review!

name: Haven Melton
text: Don't believe the advertisement, of no commitment. There is a $25.00 cancellation fee and 30 day written notice. Don't even think about calling the store to cancelling the contract at the store by calling the number at the store. They will never return your call, which at that time you can never contact them over the phone. Not until I did some research through the 3rd party fee collector that I found out about the $25 cancellation fee and the written notice. If you able to contact the manager at this store he states that he has nothing to do with the billing and fees collected. That's between them. The 3rd party fee collector states that's between you and the manager of that business. Basically there is a no commitment, contrary to what they advertise. Read the fine print.

name: Brandon Thompson
text: If you yearn for the days of customer service, then LumaLife Therapy is the massage and wellness center for you.  Upon arrival I was greeted by courteous staff in a cozy atmosphere that promoted relaxation.  In addition to traditional massage therapy the clinic offers modern services such as cupping, wellness coaching, and tailored health services.  The prices are reasonable, so much that its easy to be a return customer.  A massage shouldn't have to mean it's a special occasion, and with LumaLife Therapy it doesn't have to be.

resp.text: THANK YOU!!!

name: Rebecca Johnson
text:
So unprofessional. I cannot believe this place has so many 5 star reviews. They did not gove me a pleasant experience and I did not even receive a massage. I scheduled an appointment for a Massage using Groupon on a Saturday in
March. Later I realized I had a scheduling conflict so I rescheduled for a different day. When I came in they had it scheduled for next month on the same day. I remember distinctly scheduling my appointment for this day this month because I TOOK THE DAY OFF for this appointment. I would not have scheduled an appointment incorrectly when I was specifically scheduling it for the day I asked off. So when I arrived they said that I could reschedule. So I tried to schedule it for a day I’m off so I don’t have to ask off again and apparently Saturday’s are only for members! How did I first schedule my appointment for a Saturday then? I’m not a member but I still had it scheduled! Please give me an explanation for this. However, Groupon helped me with my issue and allowed me to trade in my voucher. If I have any advice for anyone thinking about using this company. Don’t.

name: Joan Marie Stewart
text: The Massage Therapists at LumaLife are extremely well trained!  After my recent 90 minute massage, my neck and back had never felt looser!  I stood taller. The massages are truly therapeutic.  I was so relaxed that I wished someone could have driven me home!  The massage table is extremely comfortable - the bedding adds so much to your massage.  The spa is very private, super clean and relaxing.  If you want to really treat your body and mind with relaxation and rejuvenation, then you need to rely on LumaLife for your massages.  Simply a cut way above and I have had massages all over the world and at world class spas and hotels.  At LumaLife, you are relying on true professionals who care about your massage making a difference for your body and mind.

text: Amazing! Liz is the best. Hands down, the best. You'll never go to anyone else again. Update: Alex and Kallie are amazing too. Very attentive! I have a monthly membership and it's the best thing I've ever done for myself. And take some time to slow down and take advantage of the quiet room.

text: I’ve been a member for about three years. RAC is my idea of the perfect gym! Plenty of barbells, plates, dumbells, cables and cardio equipment. The best features, however are the people - Nehal and Robbie pay attention to all the details, make sure it stays clean, comfortable and organized and that members have what they need for THEIR workout. They have built a community atmosphere that is unique, authentic and awesome! So many great people workout there. Everybody “plays well together!”  I love it!!

name: Self Help CEE (TheRandomLife)
text:
My son (6) attended their youth class for what was about a month. For 140.00 per month, two days a week , and only one hour, we weren’t satisfied with how the classes were being taught. I can take my kid to launch in prattville and let him play longer for what we were paying.
Any way, perhaps we weren’t  aware of their “new” policy that they introduced with Covid, or it was not explained to us in detail, but 3 months later we are still being charged 140.00 per month for the classes which we haven’t attended. We even tried cancelling back in May and was told that we would be fully refunded, and no longer charged. As of today 7/21/21, we have been charged yet again, and have now been told that there’s nothing that can be done about it and they we will not be refunded.

Even Walmart has some kind of customer resolution procedure for situations like this. I don’t even see how they stay in business. If you are looking for a good martial arts place for your kids to go to GO SOMEWHERE else. They do not care about their customers, they only care about getting paid and robbing you of your time and money. The biggest mistake I made was signing up with them. If I could take legal action I would, because their policies are about robbery. They didn’t even apologize for the inconvenience.

I will NEVER come here, or recommend this them. I I am Highly upset, and unsatisfied with their business practices, and customer service. They will suffer greatly from doing business this way! If I could rate negative zero stars I would!

name: Shelby Hall
text: I joined to add something new to my exercise routine. I got the exercise and really enjoy the classes. The instructors do a good job and those in the class are a great group of people.

resp.text: Thanks Shelby! We sure are glad to have you training with us.

name: William Jones
text: With an amazing and caring military vet at the helm here, it's easy to see why this is the best place in town! I visited a few months back and was absolutely floored at the level of detail and caring they put into each student. I've been training martial arts all my life. If I move to Montgomery, this is where I'll train. I highly recommend it.

resp.text: Thanks William! It was a pleasure getting to meet and train with you. Hope to see you back soon.

name: Shad Jones
text: I’ve been training a few months here and it is wonderful. The staff is friendly and very helpful. The trainers and Mr Bill excellent teachers. They work closely with you and always have your Saftey at mind.  I’m always excited to go to another class and see what’s next, and how far I can push my limits. I highly recommend them for any of their training offered!

resp.text: It's an honor to have you on the mat. You're exactly the kind of student that makes it all worthwhile.

name: David Leonard
text: Bill is a seasoned, solid martial artist.  His comprehensive knowledge and grounded character-based teaching style make for a dynamic learning experience.  Students at this school will be challenged to be not only better martial artists, but also to incorporate discipline and integrity into thier everyday lives.  In 15 years of training, I have found few schools of this caliber.

resp.text: Thanks for the vote of confidence my friend!

name: Nikki Crockett
text: Bill and his team are awesome. They have helped my son so much. He is no longer the shy reserved kid. Highly recommend.

resp.text: Thanks Nikki! Ethan is doing fantastic! He's come a long way.

name: Sandra Lewis
text:
Awesome leaders here! Can't say enough about the atmosphere. They temper a sense of family, fun and learning all in a teaching setting. Your not only learning an art that will protect you but also teaches so many other things that seem to be lost in today's world.
Discipline
Comradery
Lasting friendships
Leadership
Respect
Self Esteem
Fun
Goals
Values
and many more.

name: Logan Moorer
text: I’ve been training and helping out at Montgomery Martial Arts now for a couple of years, and I can say without a doubt that I have been greatly blessed by the family I’ve  gained there. The environment is positive and the focus is always on encouragement for the sake of self improvement.

name: Corey E (cmericks)
text: I am immensely pleased with this excellent program! I started bringing my kindergartner after a series of encounters with bullies at school. The program imbued confidence, practical tactics, muscle memory, and measured responsiveness. Bullies ceased to be an issue (i.e. confidence). Last weekend, I watched him instinctively (i.e. muscle memory) throw up his forearm (i.e. practical tactic) to block his brother's temper tantrum haymaker, then scoot back and assume a guard stance (i.e. measured responsiveness).

resp.text: Thanks Cory! Love it! Super glad to have you guys in our Academy.

name: Bill Mehm
text: Awesome gym with a great carriculum and instructors...evident by how much the student body has grown since opening. If you’re looking for an actual self defense school for yourself or your kid, this is it!

name: Steven Roberts
text: Great classes and people

resp.text: Thanks for the stars brother! Glad you are enjoying your journey!

name: Jacob Saylor
text: Great learning environment for both children and adults. If you're serious about martial arts, this is your best bet in the Montgomery area.

name: Gregory Williams
text: Great atmosphere and great training partners make Montgomery Martial Arts an all-around excellent training environment.

name: Anna Rosemen
text: So I came in once a few weeks back, and I stood waiting for them to come over to the counter so I could ask about the program to sign up and I stood there for a long time waiting and nothing. The people there saw me and they didn’t come over. They completely ignored me so I left.

resp.text: Hello Anna! I am so sorry to hear this. I really do not know how this could happen. There is always someone at the front counter unless there is an emergency. The head instructors are even trained to come over and assist you if they are not completely overloaded in class. However, if it happened please allow us to opportunity to make it up to you. I would like to offer you two weeks of free training to check things out and a personal private lesson. Please reach out to us during business hours and we will set up a time to make it happen. Thank you for your understanding.

name: Beccy Campbell
text: Amazing instructors that take a genuine interest in every student. My son has been taking Brazilian Jiu Jitsu and Krav Maga with these instructors for over two years. The staff, students, and parents at the school are like family to us.  The programs at Montgomery Martial Arts not only focus on teaching technique and skill but also on building self esteem and character development as part of the martial arts education.  Flexible class schedules during the week that allow for training time that meets the needs of students and affordable tuition rates. I would highly recommend this school for martial arts students of all ages.

text: Very friendly staff. Great place to train during my stay at Maxwell AFB!

text: Crossfit style workouts sold as non crossfit workouts that can turn very monotonous. Trainers are very nice but there is a high turnover rate with them. The biggest issue is that you are locked into a one year contract, so I suggest you make sure you are going to be happy the whole time before signing up.

text: 5 star fitness facility. Top notch programming. Advanced coaching from Hayden and Kendra. Having a physical therapist, Dr. Jared Dowling, directing the gym is great for prehab and body maintenance is extremely helpful and rare to find anywhere else. Variety of class times and workouts that can fit any level of fitness. Highly recommend anyone to check it out.

name: Jared Coker
text: So I started GodSpeed exactly a year ago. They helped me lose almost 100 lbs. The staff only wants the absolute best for you they only want to see you get better. They develop a personal relationship with you which you really can’t get anywhere else. They aren’t only worried about numbers but they want to know how YOU are doing not only physically but mentally and emotionally! This is the best place I have ever been and have achieved goals I could have never dreamed of! I highly recommend. Hayden and Kendra are some of the highest quality coaches you will find!

name: stephanie c
text: I love this gym! I look forward to my workouts and I have never felt that way before! Everyone is so friendly and knowledgeable and help you meet your personal goals. They have surpassed my expectations.

name: Andrew Roden
text: It is a great place!  A very well-rounded approach to training.  The staff is as dedicated to my goals as I am!

name: David Abel
text: Incredible facility, weights, and equipment with personnel that cares for you as an athlete and as a person. Love it!

name: Ty Cofield
text: Great coaches, great facility, and great programming.

name: Seth Fincher
text: Top notch facility.

name: SaintMegery15
text: Only been here twice, but had an awesome experience! My instructor was Laura and she was great! Highly recommend checking the place out regardless of your experience level.

name: Taylor Goodwin
text: Such a fun and positive environment. I have never felt more welcomed and accepted than I have with my pole family. Elle runs the best studio in Alabama, and employs the best instructors. Everyone is so uplifting and encouraging through the process of learning and perfecting pole tricks safely. I couldn’t praise Elle or her instructors enough. The studio has changed my life and given me so much confidence in my self and in what I can accomplish, in and out of the studio. I leave every class with something new, and it’s my favorite way to work out!

resp.text: Taylor, you are a joy and a complete beast. We love having you at the studio!

name: Brandi Darty
text: I love taking classes at Studio Steel.  Elle and her fellow teachers always make me feel welcome, confident, and comfortable. Pole is such a fun exercise! I was hooked at my Taste of Pole almost a year ago. Give Pole a chance! You won’t regret it!

resp.text: Thanks Brandi, we love having you at the studio!

name: Stephanie Smith
text: Fantastic studio! The most amazing instructors; they really care about their students progress and want to help in every way. I have loved the classes I’ve taken so far and will definitely be back for more.

name: jenny machen
text: I’ve been attending classes for about 5 months now and I feel wonderful! If you don’t like the gym and want to try something different this is the perfect place for you. I’ve always felt encouraged here, and have felt myself become so much stronger both physically and mentally! It isn’t easy, but it is SO WORTH IT!

resp.text: You are a source of endless fun and positivity! I am so glad you chose Studio Steel - I love how you try everything without screaming lol

name: Nneka Gunn
text:
I went from someone who didn't think very much of herself to someone who has not in only grown in strength physically, but mentally as well. Today, I am stronger, more confident, and more fit than I've ever been and it is all thanks to the love, support, and instruction I've received from the owner Elle and her wonderful team of instructors.

I recently competed at PSO Southern on the Studio Steel Team and I won a gold medal!!! I'm three months into pole sport and this is the type of results I've received in such a short period of time.

If you like to workout in a judge-free environment filled with people of all backgrounds then this is the place to be. Prices are great, the instructors are incredible, and I'm delighted to say that I've gained a whole new family with my pole sisters!

See you in class!

resp.text: You are a ray of sunshine in the studio! You are always encouraging and inspiring to everyone, and as for your gold medal: YOU DID THAT and it was just plain beautiful to watch. xoxo

name: Peyton Stanley
text: Amazing community and supportive instructors who always listen. Very considerate of each person's limits and will help you find ways to do things you didn't know you were strong enough to accomplish. Welcoming and wonderful.

resp.text: We love you Peyton! Thanks for the confidence in us!

name: Kathryn at Redemptive Cycles
text: Elle & the community are wonders. I love this studio so much: it is welcoming, inclusive, encouraging & SO FUN! I've done a progressive class here, had a surprise bday party (BEST Dirty Thirty party EVER - props to Elle for helping my beau pull that off), and have done several stand-alone classes. Each experience left me feeling empowered, strong and sexy AF. You may be timid to walk in but you'll feel like a million dollars when you walk out!

resp.text: Thanks Kathryn! xoxo

name: Demiboy Dorito
text: awesome classes and atmosphere!!! very kind and talented folks!

name: Destinee Marie
text: Going to class at Studio Steel is definitely my favorite place to go/do through out the week. Corinne an Elle are some of the most friendliest people I have been delighted to meet. I have started learning this form of dance as a complete beginner with no experience in really any dancing or fitness and Corinne has been an excellent and patient teacher!

resp.text: Thanks, Destinee! It's great to see you getting stronger and flexier and learning those pretty moves!

name: Cassie Renfro
text: I love going to Studio Steel! I started as a complete beginner and have loved it from the first second of class. It’s a super inclusive and friendly atmosphere where everyone is welcome. It’s a great way to get a full body workout with amazing people!

resp.text: Thanks, Cassie! Your progress has been so much fun to watch!

name: J D Porter
text: Finally, a professional vertical fitness facility in B'ham!  Pole is an incredible workout and it's greatly enhanced when the instructors and the studio are top notch, like they are here.  Studio Steel is a new, unique, and very comfortable space that really lets you focus on the workout.  I so like the look and feel of the place.  The pleasant surroundings, ample parking, professional equipment, and quality accessories in the boutique let it all come together.  Definitely worth a visit.  And, they've got a great $10 "Taste of Pole" option that newbies should absolutely check out.

resp.text: Thanks, JD - that means a lot coming from you! I know you are a huge fan of all things pole and it's good to know you approve. xoxo

name: Who Knows
text: I would give it 5, but while I loved Elle's energy I was totally turned off by Corinne. She just didn't seem to know the difference between what's appropriate to speak about as a teacher and what isn't. She just was a major over sharer of her personal life, and the worst part was her young son is feet away possibly listening to his mother talk about inappropriate things.

resp.text: Thank you for your feedback. I don't think you are alone in this opinion. She doesn't work here anymore, and the new instructors are far more professional in both their conversation and their teaching. Please come try another class and see what I mean! xoxo Elle

Great workout and amazing trainers! Perfect way to start your day.

text: Not for the faint at heart! The trainers were extremely motivating and uplifting. Give it a shot and don’t be too hard on yourself.

text:
Expert staff is knowledgeable and helpful for all levels of experience and skill.
My 7 year old went from nervous to fearless in 4 classes! I also have great appreciation for their emphasis on respect, honor, and accountability. text:
We have been members since January 2019. My daughter has found a great group of friends, it has helped with her focus, and rebuilt her confidence.

text: I’ve really enjoyed the friendliness of the atmosphere. The instructors are helpful courteous respectful and motivational. I’ve learned a lot about self defense. name: Stephanie Leftwich
text: We started our son at ATA Hillcrest this past Fall and he has absolutely loved it.  We could not ask for better instructors to help guide him in learning some positive behaviors and martial arts skills.  We enjoyed the experience so much that my husband and I joined and started the adult kickboxing classes.  It is a great way for us as a family to do something together and the ATA Family has been so welcoming and we love it there so much!

name: K i t t y _ A l l y _ P o t a t o
text: This is the best place I could’ve brought my daughter! She is so much stronger mentally and physically. Her confidence has improved majorly!! Highly recommend! Also, we’re treated like family.

name: Courtney Foote
text: I've been taking kickboxing classes for over 6 weeks now and every single class has been a truly fantastic experience. The staff and instructors are professional and extremely caring. I was very nervous before my first class but they immediately made me feel at home and comfortable. They are always encouraging and supportive. I really love that in classes, they never yell or make fun. They always smile and spur me on to do better.

name: Dave deGruy
text: ATA has been a wonderful experience for my grandson, Brady.  Miss Barlow is great with the young kids (Tigers).  All of the instructors are knowledgeable and work well with children.  Would recommend to anyone looking for discipline and structure in their child's life.

name: Matthew Sharpe
text: My son looks forward every week to his classes. I have enjoyed watching the instructors work with him and develop his skills. I think we started a week or two behind some of the other students and the staff worked with him to catch him up and get him ready to test for his first color belt. I highly recommend Mr. Johnson, Mr. Craft, Ms. Barlow, Ms. Foote, Ms. Walton and all of the other instructors at the school. The school app has been very helpful in getting my son to practice outside of class. Try this school out - I think you will be pleased!

name: Ali Zeidan
text: Great staff that does a fantastic job teaching martial arts to kids and adults.

name: Clint Padgett
text: This is a great place with excellent staff. My son joined Tiny Tigers in December and never wants to miss a day. The expertise of the instructors very noticeable. It's a safe facility. The kids are becoming more confident, disciplined, and focused with each session. And most of all it's fun!!!

name: Sherry Reed
text: We love being a part of Mobile ATA. The instructors are great and encouraging with the students. We have seen such a positive change in our daughter's confidence since she began taking classes. Not only is it a challenging sport physically, the students learn life skills that will benefit then throughout their lives. I highly recommend this place!!

name: Lauren Viere
text: Highly recommend! My son just completed his first cycle and we very pleased. Instructors are very caring and encouraging. We will continue to be a part of the ata family ☺️

text: My son’s experience at Mobile ATA has been great. The instructors are patient and understand how to deal with a lack of self esteem. I highly recommend sending your kids here to learn martial arts!

text: We LOVE ATA! The whole family joined in January. Kick boxing is great for both me and my husband. Taekwondo is perfect for our child. I am so impressed with the friendliness of the staff and the professional atmosphere. I highly recommend ATA to all families in the Mobile area.

name: Erin Morton
text: I just started my 9 yr old son a couple of weeks ago. So far he loves it! It's already helping to boost his confidence and coordination. He looks forward to each class to see what he will learn next. The staff is friendly and works well with him. Great facility.

name: Catherine Anderson
text: I personally love ATA hillcrest for my son Corey. In just a short amount of time I saw confidence and self-esteem built up in my son. They have taught him respect and self discipline. Not to mention the staff is amazing. We love ATA

I love how they not only learn techniques, but learn skills that help them to become well behaved and respectful everyday and every where.

name: Casey Stanfill
text: Excellent facility, excellent staff, excellent experience all the way around. Our whole family has been participating and I can see improvements to our individual lives holistically.

name: Felicia Graf

The staff and instructors at ATA Hillcrest are phenomenal. They are always pleasant. My children's grades have improved in school and they are always excited to go to class. I highly recommend ATA Hillcrest.

name: Dana Mosley
text: I enrolled my 4 and 5yr old here and they absolutely LOVE IT!! My 5yr old was telling my 4yr old what good ninjas do on the way home from our first class so I am very optimistic this is going to make a big difference in their overall behavior.

name: Ifa Holiday
text: My family and I have been attending the school since February and we absolutely love it! The staff is friendly and do their best to make us feel welcome. The best part is while my boys are doing karate in their class, I'm able to get my workout in the kickboxing class! My boys have gained life skills, respect, and discipline oh such a short time. I'd recommend ATA Martial arts to anyone looking for a great place for your whole family to get fit and have fun!

name: Chrissy Benefield
text: We love ATA! Our son looks forward to each and every class. The structured yet fun and exciting environment provides a great way of learning. Each and every staff member knows every kids name and helps them achieve their goals!

name: mary shepherd
text: We have been a part of ATA since Feb 2018 and it has been such a fun journey for my son, Braxton! He has become so much more confident, and he truly enjoys karate! I love seeing him in his element-- when a child is passionate about something, and they have instructors who are equally as passionate-- it's amazing to witness! We love ATA!!!

name: Jessie Hale

You guys have really changed him in a positive way, he is so much more confident in himself and we thank you. We recently signed up our little girl and already see improvements in her as well.

name: Kevin Anders
text: Mobile ATA has been such a good choice for our family!!  Our son has been in classes for about 3 months now, and the improvement we see in his focus, discipline, and positivity is dramatic!!  It is such a blessing to see him really take a keen interest in such a fun activity!!

Being a part of ATA is being a part of a family.

text: My daughter has been to 3 classes and has already gained confidence and a boost in self esteem.   It’s amazing to watch the transformation in her.

name: Brad Puckett
text: Master Hayes and his team do a great job and I highly recommend ATA Martial Arts. The school teaches  students self confidence, discipline, perseverance, balance, strength, and so much more. We've been at the school for two years and my son loves it!

text: We love what ATA is teaching our son. The instructors are so kind and patient. We highly recommend this facility.

text: My child has fallen head over heels for this place. She looks forward every week to coming to class. The look of excitement on her face every Monday and Wednesday says it all, I'm happy I've signed her up with Mobile ATA Martial Arts (Hillcrest).

text: All I can say is I wish I had found mobileATA sooner!!! This place has changed my 8 year old sons life in every aspect. He is now thriving in school and his confidence has sky rocketed. Thank you ATA for all the hard work you put in with my son. You guys ROCK!!!!!

His attention span, his respect for others, his confidence, and more passion to learn. We were blessed in finding this place and are very thankful! Thank you ATA!!

name: Mara Osuna Suarez (Kastor)
text: We started ATA this year as a way to encourage Mia and help her with controlling anxiety. She enjoys being abble to defend herself, the companionship, the friendship and most of all the goal of being a black belt. We have bouts of anxiety attacks after something goes awry and she doesn't do as well as others but she never gives up. Thank you, to all of you, for understanding that her tears are just doubts and for giving your time to explain what she needs to improve on. You are all a blessing for giving her a voice and the strength to use it. #GirlPower #Ninja #BehaveLikeABlackBelt #AnxietyDoesntDefineUs

Even after the front desk was clear and I was the only person standing there, the two women looked right at me and continued chat completely ignoring that I was even standing there.  will find another place to take my son as I do not want him to be taught by example that this kind of rudeness is accepted.

resp.text: We apologize for your poor experience, Ms. Hall! While we understand that our team can get very busy and mistakes can happen, we agree that not being greeted today was unacceptable. It's our goal to provide our members with the best possible experience, and we would love to have a second chance to make it right. If you're interested, please give us a call at 633-5808, and ask to speak to a manager.

Not my home gym but will forever workout there when I am visiting

text: Love love love this gym! Deja the trainer is so nice and friendly! You cannot beat the quality of this gym for the price! It’s brand-new and always super clean!

name: David Smith
text: I really like this planet fitness.  Its brand new, the equipment is nice and everything is well maintained.  And best of all, the staff is great!

name: Anthony Montgomery
text: This is the first time I visited this location. The staff helped at the front with changing my membership from another location. There seemed to be plenty of space. I didn't have to wait on anyone, which is number one for me at any fitness center. Social distance measures were decent, as can be expected. The only real issue that bothered me was that one employee was talking to a customer waiting to go into the spa while I was trying to leave, and he walked in front of me three times going back and forth from the other customer and the counter, as if he couldn't see me. He didn't speak to me at all. I didn't find it very professional to be cutting customers off repeatedly and not saying excuse me or anything, just expecting me to continue to move and go around after already changing directions without even acknowledging me there. It would've been much better if he had the conversation with the customer at the counter, at the table, said "excuse me," or even "sorry about that," anything really to let me know I was valued as much as the person he was talking to and not just in his way. Things like that irk me, especially as a customer. Other than that though, pretty great first-time experience. If it doesn't get too much busier without being expanded, then I'll plan on this being my main gym. Oh, one more thing, I wish they had the treadmills like Midtown. Only having an up and down and not a keypad is annoying when trying to change interval speeds. The other features were nice too, but not a huge problem.

name: Bri Brown
text: Bailee is awesome! Her customer service is amazing. She is an asset to Planet Fitness for sure!

name: Courthney Hall
text: Good place to work out not many people so you can get in and get out.

name: Summer Wise
text: Very clean and has a huge variety of machines! Staff is nice and hydromassage bed is AMAZING 🙂

name: Brian Williams
text:
Edited my review.   Can’t find a mask in my car, they don’t have one I can buy, they do they have any disposable masks on site.   So I’m refused service.  Then to beat it all, hardly anyone in there wears masks, they just walk past the front desk then take off their masks (as I would normally do). Hypocritical feel-goodism.  Good gym overall, just do not like the fact of mandating something but not offering the product mandated.
**and to top it off, I’m currently in the gym staring at a 2 employees with a mask below their nose.  , get you some of that***

New edit:  other than that incident , I love this gym, and with relaxation of masks mandate they have done away with the “hypocritical feel goodism” that had existed.   Great gym.

name: Stephanie Hopkins
text:
Pro: Love how clean the gym is. Deja the trainer is very sweet.
Con: wish they had a trainer for 2nd and 3rd shift.
If you don't have your debit card on file there one employee who will literally worry you to death about.

text: Clean  environment and move equipment
