text: Great place to workout

name: General Rage
text: Best in town!

name: Joseph Jent
text: Clean, friendly, lots of equipment.

name: Chris Butler
text: By far the best gym I've ever joined and had the pleasure of being a member of. They've done an excellent job of navigating the whole covid-19 situation. They were extremely professional and understandable in all aspects of the pandemic. The staff and members do a great job of keeping the place clean and organized. It is never over-crowded and the atmosphere is one of community. There's no room for intimation or competitiveness. Everyone there is there for one common goal so if you're looking for a gym where you can go and get a great workout in without being pressured or harassed, you'd be hard pressed to find one as good as Jason's.

resp.text: Thank You Chris!

name: Lydia Sullivan
text: Clean and not crowded, with an atmosphere of dedication and grit. Friendly patrons and staff, who while nice also respect your need to work and not socialize.

resp.text: Thank You Lydia. Members like you make the past 40-years worth it!

name: Jason Stewart
text:
I swipe my card and open the door.  The lights come on.  The hair bands begin to play.  I step through the entrance, and into another dimension.  Time and space are left behind, as I ascend into a higher domain of reps and kilograms.

Quality equipment surrounds me.  Though I am spoiled for choice, I choose a station.  As I adjust my weights, I feel a gaze upon me.  I turn to meet it.  A wall of champions stare back, with determination and approval.  I add more weight... to remain worthy.

As you hoist here, hoist proudly.  As you exhale, exhale with reverence!  This is no mere 1-on-1 personal training, supplement and exercise equipment selling, 24-hour access fitness center with smoothie cafe.  No.  This is a shrine of greatness!

resp.text: Wow! I just saw this post. I cannot thank you enough. I love it when people actually get it. Welcome home Jason, welcome home!

name: Jerry Weaver
text: I've been training at Jason's for 39 years.  I've visited other clubs to see what they have to offer and none of them have the atmosphere and staff like Jason's.  Jason's also has the best mix of equipment and free weights of any club I have seen. I addition to the staff, the members are great, which adds to the overall atmosphere at Jason's.

resp.text: Thank you. That's high praise coming from you!

name: Jess
text: Best gym in Mobile! Love the atmosphere here. The equipment is clean, it's never crowded, and the staff really goes above and beyond. An added perk - some days you might even be greeted by the gym pups!

resp.text: On behalf of the family, staff and especially the pups Thank You Jessica!

name: Keela Puckett
text:
Jason's Fitness has been great!  Equipment, it's there.....
The staff is excellent - good people, very knowledgeable and helpful!
Jason designed exercise sessions that are specific to my needs.        Along with trainer Daniel Gardner, they continue to adjust and modify my program as needed.                                                                                             These exercise adjustments have been a key element for me.
Also, pleased to say that I'm making new friends at the gym!
Tim Puckett
____________________________________________________________________
At age 65 (and retired) with professions in the freight business and 36 years in the oil field, trauma from accidents outside of work (that included broken legs), along with surgeries on both shoulders, I thought "this is it, live with it". I was wrong.
Needed all the help that I could get, and got it!
Noticing couples of my age group working together, and have hopes that my wife will join in the near future.
Tim Puckett

resp.text: Thank you so much Tim.  People like you are why it has been a joy to come to work every day for the past 38-Years!

name: Lori
text: My job brought me to Foley for a couple of weeks and I was so thankful to find Jason's Fitness so I could continue my training.  Jason took the time to ask about my current training regime and was able to develop a routine specific to my needs and capability.   My trainer Josh, was keen on spotting my areas of weakness and strength and worked with Jason in customizing my workouts further to target the areas needed most.   Thank you Jason and Josh!

resp.text: Lori it was a pleasure having you. Hope to see you again soon!

name: gnimelfemsti
text: This gym is amazing. I spent seven months training here and I wish I could go back. The staff are both knowledge and courteous.  I've been to many gyms in my travels,  Jason's is by far my favorite.  It was never crowded,  the  other members were always friendly and willing to spot.  If I could give more stars I would.

resp.text: Thank you so, so much.  Words like this make coming to work a blast!

name: Shelby Weaver
text: Working out at Jason's is the best part of my week! I love the atmosphere there, everyone feels like family.

resp.text: We are family!

name: Alexandra Butts
text: Hands down the best gym in town! The managment is always available and willing to help. Cleanest gym I’ve ever been in. This place changed my life!

resp.text: It has been our pleasure.  You are a great addition to the family!

name: Alexx Collier
text: Best gym in the area- by far. Love the family oriented atmosphere and the gym itself is superb! 🖤🖤 Jason, Kelly, Daniel and Andrea are all incredible.

resp.text: Thank you Alexx!  It's because of people like you we are still here 39-years later!

name: Kendal Hood
text: Jason's Fitness is awesome! I travel a lot between mobile and Baldwin county, so I workout at both clubs often. Both facility's are great, but they just dumped some serious money into the Foley location. Brand new Indoor basketball court (2015), New equipment, Constantly getting new supplements in the shop. No Doubt, Best gym I've ever been a member off! The staff is always friendly, equipment is always clean, and doors are open rain or shine 365. What more could you ask for?!

name: Alison Bolton
text:
I switched to this gym from another local gym and Jason’s Fitness is 1000000% better than the other gym ever THOUGHT of being. I used to work at my university’s gym, so I have an idea of what I liked in a gym.

The staff is so nice and helpful. They answer any and all questions that I have and make the environment very positive.

The equipment is kept up very well. I never had any trouble using the equipment I wanted. It is not overcrowded with super noisy patrons. There are no ripped pads or broken cords.

It is also CLEAN. This was a huge issue at my last gym. I swear the staff at my old gym never clean; they just sat around on their phones and laptops with their back’s turned to everyone. The locker rooms and bathrooms always look clean and the equipment is clean at Jason’s. There are no  dumbells and plates strewn across the floor. The staff does a wonderful job at making this place neat and clean.

I’m so glad to finally be at a gym that makes me feel comfortable and excited to workout again.

resp.text: Alison, Thank you for the Love and welcome to the club.  We've been getting it done since 1981 and people like you make it all worth while!

name: Jesse Heydorn
text: I travel quite bit for work and it’s hard to find decent gyms to train at. I saw that Jason’s had some of the best reviews in mobile so I decided to check it out yesterday.  The staff was extremely friendly and helpful, and they showed me around the gym and made me feel right at home. The gym itself isn’t huge but they’ve got everything you need and then some.  It has this golden era body building feel to it with all kinds of awesome pics on the walls of competitors that have trained there.  They actually had a few machines that I’ve never even seen before as well. Definitely give this place a try if you live here or just need to get a good workout in!!

resp.text: Thanks Jesse.  Hope you had a blast!

name: Tabitha Knotts
text: I have been going to Jason's for 4 years now & am 100% certain I will never go to any other gym in my life. Everyone there is like family & the atmosphere is very motivating. There's also nothing better than knowing you are breathing clean air while training!

name: Blake Lee
text: Absolutely love this gym!!  It feels like a second home.  The staff and members are highly friendly and feel like a family.  Very nice equipment and a good variety that most gyms don't have (chains, battle ropes, etc).  They have a smoothie bar and small store as well, so you get all your before and after gym needs.  24/7 access so it fits any schedule.  Jason's is by far the best gym I have ever stepped in, with the nicest "gym clique" I could image.  10/10!!

name: Mandie Day
text: I Love this Gym!! I've been here for about a year and a half now and couldn't be happier with it. It is hardly every busy, and it is really  convenient having the 24 hour access. The Boot Camps here are pretty cool too, a cheaper alternative to personal trainers, but all the hard work and accountability of one. The tanning beds here are good too, they just got a 10 minute stand up bed that I'm pretty impressed with. Overall great place to work out.

name: Darrell Taylor
text:
Lets see...24/7 Access, Boot Camps, Basketball Court, Tanning Beds (both lying and standing by the way), Sauna, Team (Group) Training, and One-on-One Personal Training. If that was all it would be enough, but that's not all. A Great Smoothie awaits you for after your workout...my favorite the Chunky Monkey!

This place is great. Its not a large box chain gym with no personality. This is a place to come train and get fit with all the tools to do so. But also a place to come and have a good time while you work out. Tell Kelly at the front desk that Darrell sent you! And I'll see you at Jason's Fitness!

resp.text: Thank you D!

name: Jordan Barbarin
text: I have been a member at Jason's in mobile for almost 2 years. and I absolutely  love it here! The atmosphere here amazing. It isn't intimidating at all like I falsely assumed it would be. It is a pick up weights, not dates sort of place. Its always clean, and has excellent customer service. The boot camp classes make weight loss fun! I would defiantly recommend it to every one.

name: ashley barrameda
text: I absolutely enjoyed my gym experience. The front counter lady Kelly was extremely pleasant and helpful. Then the equipment is a mix of new and old (well maintained ) that all gel well together. I will go again

resp.text: Thank you!

name: Carlysle Salter
text: I can't say enough good things about Jason's! They have great personal trainers who are supportive and will make sure you meet your goal. It doesn't matter if you want to lose a little weight or become a bodybuilder; they will see to it that they meet your individual needs. Hands down the best gym in Mobile.

resp.text: You are family to us Carlysle and always will be!

name: chad raybon
text: Hands down the best gym along the Gulf Coast, been training here since I was 13 and I couldn't imagine being anywhere else. By far the best selection of free weights and top of the line equipment you'll find anywhere. Very friendly and knowledgeable staff and Jason is one of the best people you could ever hope to meet. This is without a doubt the place to be if your serious about your health.

name: annette bucci
text: I have been working out at Jason's for over 10 years now..It is convenient and he has the best staff ever..Bob is the sweetest and most friendliest guy you will ever meet.I love working our here😊

resp.text: You are way beyond member...You are family!

name: Jeremy Day
text: Jason's is awesome!! It has a very wide range of equipment, any where from power lifter, to first time in the gym equipment. Facility is always clean, and the staff here is always friendly. The smoothies are great too. I work shift work and often don't get off until most of the other gyms are closed, so the 24/7 access is a life saver!

name: Lane Pilger
text: I can not say enough great things about Jason's!  Its more than just a gym, its a family.  Great equipment, great trainers, and great products.  I personally have been transformed.  Jason and his team are the best and I would recommend this gym to absolutely anyone, as a matter of fact, I always do.

name: Josh Justice
text: I have been a member of this club for years and have enjoyed every second of it. The trainers are exceedingly friendly and knowledgeable. It is the best fitness club in the city. The 24 hour access is unbeatable.

name: Carena Kiser
text: Love this gym the personal trainers are awesome and it's open 24 hours so I can go any time. The facilitie and equipment  are always clean. They also have a great selection of supplements, along with a smoothie bar for after my workout.

name: Warren Nicholson
text:
Best Gym in Mobile.  I've known Jason for years
and he knows his stuff.  The staff there is great
too, and they treat everyone with respect  The most
important thing is this: YOU GET RESULTS!

name: Joshua Billie
text: Love the gym its very hard to find a gym that actually never crowded Jasons Fitness provides just that along with friendly staff and HIGHLY CLEANED AREA and Equipment. Great GYM and MEMBERS so if your in Foley or Mobile area don't hesitate drop in.

resp.text: Thank you Josh!

name: Bowdoin Atchison
text: Jason's is the best health club in Mobile, AL hands down! It's never crowded so I can easily get a full workout in under an hour. I enjoy the basketball court also.

name: Zach Taylor
text: Steller looking gym. Staff was great. Isnt crowded. Just wish I could afford it.

resp.text: You always get what you pay for and right now you can get the best for only $49 a month!

name: Stephanie M Hughes
text: After many years of being away from lifting weights, I decided to return. Jason's staff is both friendly and helpful. With the help of their Personal Trainer, Craig Barbarin, who gave  me great guidance and encouragement, I am on my way to feeling much healthier. With God's Grace this "grandmom" will not stop. If you are looking for a "good gym" with all the right equipment, come to Jason's.

name: tyler frey
text: Best gym around, awesome people and staff!

resp.text: Thanks Tyler.  It's members like you that make us the club we are today!

name: Aaron Ferguson
text:
Very friendly staff, clean machines and bathroom. Nice variety of gear including sun bed.
Best of all, 24 hour access!

name: Jerry Weaver
text: Great location and with 24 hour access.  Excellent cardio equipment and best overall selection of free-weights and machines I've seen.

name: manking4
text: Best gym in Mobile.

resp.text: Thank you so much!

name: Kevin Johnson
text: This is the best fitness gym in the Mobile area.

resp.text: Kevin, people like you make it the best gym!

name: Magdaelizetth Moffett
text: best gym ever!

name: Justin Denino
text: Had a great experience with this facility. A variety of equipment was readily available and the classes were welcoming and provided an excellent workout. Kristen slayed her spin/combat cardio class with not a second wasted from beginning to end. Awesome workout! 🏋️‍♂️

name: scott tate
text: Mallory is the ultimate trainer as well as the gym owner.  She's extremely intelligent on all parts of conditioning and diet and knows how to adapt a training program to an individual's needs.  The gym is well stocked with modern equipment including machines, loose weights, and a full assortment of training accessories.  All staff are very friendly and the gym is well maintained.  Other services include various cardio and conditioning classes and a staff of one on one trainers.  I can't say enough about how totally awesome my experience here has been. I love Mallory and this gym as her experience as an authentic trainer has upped my fitness level and lifestyle between the training and diet advice.  I've been a member of many gyms, but this is my favorite and I highly recommend it!

name: Joe Booksh
text: Fairhope Fitness is the best gym in Fairhope.   Mallory, the owner, is so awesome and very helpful.     The classes are great too!

name: Emily Elrod (Workzbe)
text: Beautiful facility and Best trainer ever works there. Ask for Sara if you can. Trust me, she is soooo worth it.

name: John J McGuinness
text:
After arriving in Fairhope  a month ago from New York, where gyms had been closed for five months, there was Fairhope Fitness, a 247 access gym With lots of ways to get your body going.. Mallory, who is the owner and trainer herself  has put together a great staff. Her personal story is inspirational,  which is why she’s created an environment where fitness is both an “inside and outside job”.

Fairhope Fitness has a really good vibe where clients can develop a fitness program that works for them which a variety of workout activities including  TRX, weights, cardio and yoga and nutrition counseling.

More than a gym it’s a place for wellness and community.... Love it.

name: Louisa Whitmire
text: I have been working out at this gym for about 8 years.  It has always provided me with the workout equipment I need. They also have awesome trainers and free classes offered with the membership. The gym recently changed ownership and I have noticed the owner has been frequenting the gym more than the previous one. She’s personable and very helpful if you have questions/comments/concerns. I enjoy my workouts there because I can get my pump on with zero interruptions. I also enjoy the fact that the gym is central to downtown Fairhope. Oh and last thing the gym is open 24/7 so if you want to roll up to work out at 12 am you are totally allowed to do that. 5/5 gym experience!

name: Edward Stratton
text: This gym may be small, but it's definitely one of the better ones . No one really bothers you, you can do your workout in peace and move on about your day. Thanks for keeping this gym d-bag free.

name: Tyler Tunstall
text: Good gym but small

name: Dominic Fresch
text: Just dropped in on my way to Florida, Beau “the owner I believe” was quick to answer an out of the area code phone number. Gym was awesome and has everything you need to get fit and strong. If I’m ever in town again I’ll definitely be coming here!

resp.text: Enjoyed meeting you! Glad you enjoyed it. Thanks for the review.

name: nndnfasn
text: Southern Muscle and Fitness has always been a great gym for my wife and I.  It has a lot of options to help you reach your fitness goals.

name: stephen W
text: Nice gym with plenty of weights and machines as well as trainers. Easy parking and modern building.

name: Ilya Unzhakov
text: Fantastic place! Great members, service staff, and atmosphere for an awesome workout! The trainers know their stuff, whether it be for weight loss or for competition prep, and the gym houses several professional bodybuilders. Check it out if you're looking for a good workout!

name: Yvette Hester
text:
I would highly recommend anyone to become a member at southern muscle under the NEW owner beau. I had a situation where I had canceled my membership and charges continued to come out of my account after I talked to the previous owner about my no longer attending.

Although Beau took over the gym back in July, he was fully understanding of the situation and although he did not HAVE to, he refunded me back a significant portion of the money I had lost with the previous owner due to there lack of communication with the vendor who withdrawals money from the accounts.

This owner genuinely cares about the members, it goes beyond a simple membership and a hello here and there! Charter and professionalism speaks volumes. THANK YOU AGAIN! ❤️

name: REM Sosa
text: I worked out around 6am and i had a great experience. The Owner Beau really made the gym run like a family and make everyone feel welcome. Great equipment for Strength and cardio training. SQUAT racks, barbells, dumbells etc. Will def come back if in the area for work. A+++

name: John Jarrett
text: Awesome gym!!! New management is impeccable and you cannot beat the 24 hour access. Very open and welcoming clientele. Highly recommend this gym to anyone in the area. You won’t regret it!

name: Natalia Gutium
text: Love this gym. The owner is very knowledgeable and helpful. Everyone is friendly. Great environment.

name: Ryan Wade
text:
I was told that I was not locked into a contract when I originally joined. I filled out automatic draft information with no problems. I was told the set-up fees were to be waived and monthly charges were $29.95. The auto draft amounts are different most months ($29.95- $59.95) with absolutely no explanation for the difference. I figured because I cut the owners sons hair I would have been told the truth-Guess not.
So if you are into a gym with dated equipment, management that takes hours (or days to return a call), and inconsistent billing this is the gym for you!!
As for me-I can't wait to transfer my drivers license to PROVE to "Paramount Acceptance" billing company that I no longer live in Montgomery so they will stop drafting my account.

name: Jennifer Biddy
text: Locally owned & operated. By far the best gym in Montgomery! 24 Hour Access

name: Rob Smith
text: Extremely difficult canceling your membership here

name: Aaron Longobardi
text: Quite possibly the easiest hello and definitely one of the hardest goodbyes when it comes to FXT. This place was my gym for 2 years while I was at flight school and I am so blessed to have found it. The community is so welcoming and friendly they ended up becoming family. The athletes are incredible, the programming is top notch, and the coaching is second to none. They are super military friendly and truly care about all their members. I will forever consider FXT my home gym and could not recommend this place enough. Check it out and I promise you’ll be glad you did it. Love my FXT family.

resp.text: You are family to us all at FXT. We will miss you & Lindsay and hope to see you on your next round at Rucker!! Write our name in the sand in Hawaii as we will be with you always ❤️Best wishes

name: Des2BFit
text: So, I had always wanted to get into CrossFit but was too nervous to try. I had known that CrossFit was a community of athletes and I seriously wanted to be apart of something GREAT. Well I decided to google CrossFit in my area and I landed on this location. I was nervous but I decided to give a GO, I called the number above and the reaction and engagement I got was fantastic. The professionalism of their staff had made me feel eager to get down there and begin training. First day I was amazed by the community, I was welcomed with smiles and assistance not just from the coaches but the members as well. I truly felt that I was apart of a Team. The amount of effort you put in you will get the same energy back ! I highly recommend for beginners and for those who are new to the area and want to feel apart of a community. Also for all the athletes you will definitely get a workout and a run for your money. The classes you can schedule at any time to your schedule. I had an phenomenal experience and would definitely recommend! Definitely military friendly! Hooooaaahh !

resp.text: thanks so much for the review, we are lucky to have the staff and the wonderful community! glad you are a part of it!!

name: ESAm Alamri
text:
The best so far I have been in several gyms in US but the
Atmosphere So great and so friendly

resp.text: Thank you Esam!! Glad to have you with us  at FXT while you are here in the US!!

name: Brandon Miller
text: Hands down the best gym to check out in the wire grass area! Get coach’s, lots of space and equipment!! I dropped in after 4 years of not being in town. That has to say something!!

name: Amanda Bolten
text: CrossFit FXT is one of the best gyms that I have been a part of. They have an extremely knowledgeable staff and offer something for everyone. If you’re an elite competitor or someone who just wants to get in great shape, you’ll love it! FXT has a wonderful, supportive community and is always out in their community. 10/10 would recommend!

resp.text: Thanks Amanda!! Enjoying see Chris here. Miss y’all though

name: Rumplestilskin Kumar
text: Great work out! I'm so out of shape and was nervous. Jayme was awesome. Everyone was upbeat and uplifting. I have a long way for my health journey but I am going to go back for another crossfit class!

resp.text: Thank you! We are here to help you achieve your goals! Let us know how we can assist!

name: Kacie Lee
text: AWESOME gym!!!  Very professional and friendly from start to finish.  They quickly replied to my emails about dropping in.  When I arrived, I was warmly greeted by coaches and multiple gym-goers.  Tough workouts - coaches did a great job explaining everything and keeping everybody on track.  True sense of community in there - they were even doing a fundraiser for a local family when I went in.  Can't wait to go back when I get the chance.

resp.text: Thank you for the great review, Kacie! Can't wait to see you back again with us!

name: Steven S
text: Great workout. Keith understands capabilities of each individual.

name: Allen Crist
text: Great atmosphere and plenty of workout space. Excellent programming and coaching! Multiple class times make it easy to get a workout in no matter what schedule you’re on. Fun community with plenty of friendly competition, highly recommend!

resp.text: Thanks Allen! Love having you, Heather & the kids in our FXT family!

name: Jacob Mitchell
text: The facilities, training, and atmosphere are top notch.  My wife and I dropped in for a visit and felt welcome, were challenged, and will certainly be back.  Coach Keith was excellent.  Thank you!

resp.text: Thank you so much for the great review. We really enjoyed hosting yall and hope to see you soon.

name: Sebastian Vasquez
text: This was my first CrossFit gym ever and I gotta say it was the number one reason why I fell in love in with the sport. Felt more like a second home and family rather than a gym and gym-mates. Big thanks to Keith and all the coaches, best staff ever in the history of the world (Specially Brett Thomas, fittest man in Enterprise). FXT is one of the major reasons why I would love to come back to Alabama.

resp.text: Thanks for the awesome review Sebastian! FXT will miss you and your family! We hope to see you back one day!

name: Peggy Chang
text: While visiting my son in Daleville, Al, I called Keith and was told to come join them and have fun! I did for 5 days in a row! The coaches are friendly, knowledgeable and motivational! If you want to burn calories, build your muscles and have fun while doing it, come check out this awesome gym.

resp.text: So glad you had so much fun with us, Peggy! Come back and have fun with us again soon!

name: Karissa Maradol
text: Love FXT!!! People make or break a gym and these are the most lovely and supportive group I’ve ever found at a gym! Happy to be part of the FXT Family!

resp.text: Love starting our day with you!! So glad you're part of our family, Karissa! Thanks for the awesome review! See you at 5am;)

name: Thomas Stinson
text: Great staff, community and programming!

resp.text: Thanks Thomas!! Miss you but happy to see you pop in from time to time!

name: Scott E
text: Good atmosphere for x-fit or just getting a pump if needed.  There's a plethora of workout space.  Tucked away in downtown Enterprise.  There's a variety of workouts as well as a variety of people to share competition with.

resp.text: Thanks for the stars and loved having you @ FXT

name: marianne eddy
text: Amazing gym, amazing people! This is more than just a CROSSFIT gym, it’s a family. If you’re intimidated by traditional CROSSFIT, then check out the Unloaded class. It’s amazing! You can also have on-one-on instruction with a personal trainer or join the Barbell club to focus on specific goals. Or, if you’re muscles are wrecked from the week, there’s a mobility class. I have utilized most of the services and have never been disappointed. Hands down the best gym I’ve ever been a part of.

resp.text: So proud of all of your accomplishments and hard work you've put in! An inspiration to so many! Excited to be on this fitness journey with you.

name: Ross Nelson
text: Awesome CrossFit box and family. Great coaching and programming,  fun community, and family. Love this place.

resp.text: Thanks Ross, and Jennifer for all the love and support you've given us all @ FXT

name: Silvia Jakobsen
text: Amazing place with great coaches! I love working out here😊

resp.text: Thanks Silvia! Love having you in our Unloaded Program @ FXT

name: Haley Kirkland
text: Awesome gym!!! Awesome people. Love everything about it!

resp.text: WE LOVE YOU HALEY!!! Thank you for years of support! You are and forever will be our family!

name: BKMC03
text: I Love my FXT Family.  You wouldn’t typically think of your gym as your “family”, but they definitely ARE! Our family has been through some devastating events in the last few months and our Fit-Fam has been there every step of the way!  They brought us food, helped with household needs, dogs, appointments and even our son at school!  IN ADDITION to all of that, FXT coaches truly care about my fitness goals. I have done group classes and barbell training within FXT. The coaches are knowledgeable (before FXT, I had never lifted in my life) and helpful, I have learned so much about how to safely engage in fitness.  I am meeting and beating my fitness goals and I love it! If you are looking for a very supportive and energized atmosphere to pursue your goals and with coaches who are knowledgeable and truly care, COME ON!!!  This is truly a one-of-a-kind place in so many ways. I’m very thankful to be a part of this Fit-Fam-Jam!💪🏼

resp.text: YOU are our WonderWoman! Thanks Kelly! Your family is our family and thats what friends, community do for one another. Thanks for your loyalty and for constantly crushing fitness goals with us.

name: Kevin Conley
text: Had a blast dropping in during my travels, Horton was a hoot! (Pun intended)

resp.text: Kevin, thanks for the shout out and come back and visit any time! We will make sure your next visit is a “hoot” too!!

name: Rich Puza
text: Best place ever! People are great and the coaches rock!

resp.text: Thanks Rich! Love having you in our FXT family

name: Nancy Garner
text: Great owners and ever improving facility!

resp.text: Thanks Nancy for your loyalty and support for 9 years in Enterprise. You are our family, in and out of the gym.

name: Gabe Martin
text: Great people and a great atmosphere!

resp.text: Thanks for you support Gabe! Love having you in our FXT family

name: Sammy Echevarria
text: Great environment to workout.

resp.text: Thanks Sammy ! Thanks for the stars! Love having you & family.

name: Conor Sweeney
text: Beautiful and clean gym with plenty of equipment!

resp.text: Thanks Connor! We work very hard to provide our members and clients a clean, safe experience.

name: Tim Babb
text: 24/7 and it’s always clean. A+ gym!

name: Abigail Hipps
text: Very clean space, and awesome updated equipment. It is a great place to work out. The owner is knowledgeable and has experience as a fitness/nutrition trainer. Would definitely recommend!

name: Raymond J. Hawthorne, Jr.
text: Excellent place to work out - Josh is great!

name: Mark Dorsey
text: Good place to get a light workout. Josh, the owner is very knowledgeable and friendly.

resp.text: Thank you your kind words Mark! We are so glad to have you and your wife as members of the fitness center. Please let us know how we can improve our facility and/or service!

name: Lee Walker
text: Small comfortable professional

name: ANaiya King
text: Pretty good gym. They offer classes, a pool, every machine possible... I enjoy it.

name: Annette Stumpe
text: Love it!!! Everyone there r really helpful! They go the extra mile to make u feel right at home!!

name: Luke Anderson
text: So sad to see it close

name: Lance G
text: These folks are the best. Very knowledgeable, professional and caring. Best physical fitness place around!

name: Sam Sykstus
text: I’ve spent a good amount of time at CrossFit Huntsville throughout the past few years and it is hands down the greatest gym I’ve been to. The coaches, facility, workouts and members are top tier and have set a phenomenal standard for what a gym should be. I cannot recommend Crossfit Huntsville enough.

name: Kevin Lowe
text: Best CF box in Huntsville!  Great coaches.  Very friendly community.

name: Kip McClung
text: Great box, great coaches and great people.

name: Kyle
text: I joined CF HSV to add some variety to my workouts and challenge myself in new ways, and it's easily one of the best decisions I've made! The coaches are great at helping us newbies navigate new movements and lingo and the programming makes for varied and enjoyable workouts. I look forward to getting to this gym every time and highly recommend it!

name: David Crow
text: Great gym for drop-ins. Roomy, good size classes, good coaches. Some of the best programming I've seen, though they're more RX vs RX+ weight than a differentiated life vs sport movements approach. Not much feeling of community: people are more likely to clean up their weights, foam roll, and chat, rather than cheering on the last finishers. Passing through for a month, though, I couldn't ask for better!

name: David Preczewski
text: CFHSV is a top-notch company.  I traveled to Huntsville for work and took their introduction classes as well as 2 months of regular classes.  They are passionate about teaching proper techniques, their coaches are professional, and the people that go there are friendly.  I can't thank them enough for their coaching and I appreciate all they do to support service members and First-Responders.  Hope to be back soon!

name: Carson Wakefield
text: I've been here for over 10 years and truly believe this is the best crossfit box in Huntsville.  The facilities are top notch, the coaches are engaged, and the community just can't be beat.

name: Mark Hurter
text: I started here in January of 2016 after losing my motivation in the daily traditional body-building gym grind.  I have loved it from day one.  There isn't a single day that I have dragged ass into the gym, I always come in ready to challenge myself, and be pushed by the staff and other members at the box.  The facility is top-notch, from the staff, to the equipment, to the members.  Highly recommended.

name: Sergio Antonio
text: Just had my first CrossFit box experience in over a year.  I generally train solo with workouts from posted WOD’s.  I was treated very well by both coaches upon arrival.  I was quickly taken into the office to fill out my waiver, and offered a discount for coming back since I’m visiting.  Just a great experience all around.  This is a huge box!  I’m impressed, and I’ll be back.  I’d recommend this box to anyone, new or experienced.

name: Ryan “Bam Bam” Smith
text: Was in town for a class and CrossFit Huntsville was recommended to me. I will say this Nate and his crew blew me away. They know so much information and different cues your bound to get it. The best gym I've ever been to hands down next time I'm in town I know where I'm going.

name: Doug Esleeck
text: Very nice facility. Not very welcoming. The instructor was awesome! Very helpful and friendly. The 10 other people in the class never spoke, and even when I tried to tell someone "good job" they ignored me. No community experience at all; I will not be back.

name: Jeff Williams
text: Nathaniel and Mande are awesome.  Great staff.  Very accommodating and supportive with us that are new to crossfit.  Very nice gym.

name: the
text: I have been doing crossfit for a few months now. It has been helping me lose weight.

name: Robert Langly
text: Not the right gym for me.

name: Jason Hagemann
text: Just no.  Don't do it.

name: Jessica Adams
text: Visited here last week while on vacation, and had a great time. Easy online check in process, friendly and knowledgeable coaches, as well as very welcoming members. More importantly, awesome workout!  Definitely be back when we come into town next year.

name: Rex Inman
text: Awesome CrossFit Box!! Dropped ion for 2 days while on vacation.  Enjoyed the Rooster Crew at 05:30.  Staff was awesome and they use the same programming as my home gym so a bonus!! Clean with tons of equipment!  NOTE TO SELF - do NOT go to the Floribama the night before....... Just saying LOLOL.

name: Seth Jirikowic
text: I really enjoyed my time with the Gulf Shores CrossFit team. Jack and Mason were awesome guys and make you feel welcome. Dropped in for a month. Workouts were well worth it and very challenging. Nice group of people as well and will be back next time I am in town. Highly recommend it!

resp.text: Thanks Seth! It was awesome having you with us.

name: Chris Adams
text: Nice, welcoming staff and great facility.  Would highly recommend a drop in class if you are visiting the area.

name: Jeffrey Mayo
text: Great place, Super Friendly Coaches, Great location 🏋️💥

name: Sergio Campos
text: Awesome place! Everyone was very friendly and welcoming. Really enjoyed the workout!

name: Leonel Colon
text: I "dropped in" for a workout and really enjoyed it. Only a couple of us for the 5:30 AM class and was well taken care of and given close supervision. Coach was very friendly, patient, and professional. Facilities overall are in great condition and very clean.

resp.text: Thanks so much Leonel! We're glad you had a great time and hope to see you back with us anytime you're over this way.

name: Kaycie Oliphant
text: This CF box is top notch! I’ve experienced many drop ins across the coast and I always come back here! They are personable, professional, and the quality of coaching is amazing. You will feel welcomed and comfortable no matter your skill level! If you are in town give this place a shot! Jack has a organized box that you are sure to have a great experience!

resp.text: Thank you for that Kaycie, we appreciate it for sure! We loved having you join us this morning and hope to see you again soon!

name: Stuart Maddox
text: Great full hour CrossFit workouts Friendly knowledgeable coaches!!!

name: Terri Leib
text: Awesome place!  Super clean! Thanks Jack for making us feel so welcome!

resp.text: Glad you enjoyed your time with us Terri. Hope to see you again soon!

name: Dale Logan
text: In town for the Thanksgiving holiday and dropped by.  Coach and members were very welcoming and made it easy to join in! Thanks for a great workout!

resp.text: Glad you found us during your holiday Dale! Hope you can join us when you're back in the area.

name: Robin Hyman
text: Awesome box!  Thanks for letting me drop in!

name: Sarah Mills
text: I was able to drop in for a class while on vacation. The people were very welcoming and the coach was awesome and encouraging! The workout was tough just how I like it and also fun! Very clean and spacious gym! Overall had a great experience! Will be back on next vacation!

resp.text: Thanks so much Sarah and glad you dropped in with us. See you next time!

name: Cheyenne Hill
text: I did the week drop in pass as I was on vacation. The coaching staff and members were so kind and welcoming!

resp.text: Thanks Cheyenne! Glad you enjoyed your time here and hope you'll be back soon.

name: paul pinckley
text: Really enjoyed my visit.

name: jackson ingram
text: Super clean and very well coached. Checked all the boxes in what you want for a CrossFit gym. Coach really made sure all the drop ins were comfortable and paid attention to us all during the workout. The WoD was absolutely awesome as well!!

resp.text: So glad you could join us and appreciate the compliments. Hope to see you again soon!

name: Darrell Webb
text: The highlight of my Gulf Shores vacation with in-laws. It’s easier to deal with everyone after my dopamine dump lol. For real it’s a great place to visit. Quick email response and Jack was an encouraging coach...

resp.text: Thanks Darrell! Our goal is to be the highlight of your day but it’s a bonus to be the highlight of your whole vacation for sure. Good luck with your race!

name: Trevor Morgan
text: I came down to gulf shores for a vacation and still wanted to get a WOD in, so I visited Gulf Shores CrossFit. The staff and coach Jack are great. It was a great workout too. Give them a visit

resp.text: Thanks Trevor! We enjoyed having you with us and hope to see you again soon!

name: Jennifer Huser
text: It was super easy to schedule a drop in at Gulf Shores Crossfit.  Jack and Emma were very welcoming.  It was a great workout this morning and I am thinking about going back again.

resp.text: So glad you joined us and enjoyed dropping in. Can’t wait to see you again!

name: Bobby Hartzog
text: Awesome experience... Mason is a great coach... really enjoyed getting a couple good workouts in while on vacation!

resp.text: Love the feedback, thanks Bobby. Hope you join us again soon!

name: Anthony Fringer
text: Always nice to go somewhere and drop in and feel like your at home.  Great place to get your W.O.D on!

resp.text: Glad you joined us. You’re welcome anytime. See you again soon!

name: Josh Myles
text: Awesome Gym!!!!!! Great hospitality and both coaches were very interactive with me. Great equipment and great floor space, very clean !

resp.text: Thanks for joining us and the kind words. See you next time!

name: Heather Logan
text: We dropped in today and it was worth it! The coach was great, the WOD was great and we had a blast!

resp.text: Glad you and Dale found us Heather. Hope to have you back soon!

name: Matthew Bolton
text: Dropped in while on fall beak. Nice gym with solid coaching and quality programming. Welcoming atmosphere to out of towners.  You can tell a good culture and community has been built here.

name: Christ is King
text:
Great environment and knowledgeable Coaches
5/5 Recommend.

resp.text: Thanks! We’re so glad you had a good time with us. See you again soon!

name: Joan Price
text: Best gym I have ever used. The red light and tanning beds are an added bonus. Best price on membership fees I have ever paid.

name: Kelly B
text: This was such an awesome gym!! My only regret was that I wasn’t able to make more classes. They are so kind and welcoming. One thing I love is how focused on form they are! I’ve been doing CrossFit for a year and was able to take away 4 improvements to my form. Would highly recommend this gym to anyone, regardless of your CrossFit stage!

name: Jack Munoz
text: Clean and well-run, love the place.  The management team is responsive as well, which I truly appreciate.  Definite recommend.

name: Matthew Gonzalez
text: Awesome place to go. Dropped in on vacation. Great coaches. Fun people, did my very first muscle up in this gym. Great size and place

name: Lainey Guidry
text: AWESOME!!! My sister and I dropped in on two classes during our vacation in Gulf Shores. We work out regularly at a local Crossfit gym where we are from and wanted to keep up with our workouts on vacation. The gym was so clean, the staff was friendly and helpful, and the work outs were challenging and left us feeling accomplished! The instructor was encouraging and taught us many skills that we will use during our regular workouts from now on. The members of this particular gym were so welcoming and helpful as well. We will be back our next time in GS.

name: Joe Presley
text:
My family and I were staying in Gulf Shores for a week long vacation at the beach. I needed somewhere to work out so I reached out to Gulf Shores CrossFit.

The team there was awesome. They replied to my email within 24 hours and I had options for working out that day or the full schedule throughout the week. They had daily dropin rates of $15 or $50 for the entire week.

I worked out with two different trainers there throughout the week and both were great, taking time to warm-up, stretch properly and make sure everyone was using good form and understood the exercises. They worked with everyone to scale the without for their level too.

The facilities are very close to the beach, clean and roomy. They have tons of equipment and great locker rooms with showers.

Net net, its a great gym, very welcoming, and reasonably priced for what you get. I'd recommend it to anyone.

name: Nathan Stoll
text: You know what’s great? An inviting box, a motivating coach, and a tough WOD. I enjoyed my drop in here immensely. Jim was a great motivator and kept me on task. He took extra time working on some movements. He obviously cared about my success. If I lived here I know where I’d throw down!

name: Larry Wiggins
text: Visited this box while in town on vacation. Jim answered my questions over email beforehand, super friendly. Gym was huge, clean, with lots of equipment. Coaching was on point, picking up my typical kinks and mobility limitations. Great folks there, everyone was friendly and helpful. Plenty of time after the WOD for stretching, rolling, and Jim was there to help on any questions or techniques needed. Overall great box and very welcoming.

name: Carla Brown
text: I miss this place so much! And my good friends 💖

name: Kevin Lowe
text: Dropped in.  Felt at home.  Great coaching.  Has all the fun equipment.

name: Umbrella Oats Gacha
text: Really good employies

resp.text: Thanks Olivia, we think they’re pretty special too.

name: Tim Knight
text: Friendly & very knowledgeable trainers here provide a great, fun, and supportive training environment.  They adapt the workouts to your abilities but keep them challenging.  There's a lot of fun, a lot of humor, but every class is full of support.  Give it a try!

resp.text: Thanks Tim! We definitely appreciate having you with us too!

name: Jeff Robinson
text: Jim is awesome. Very impressed with his ability to make technical adjustments to my form and also modify my personal workout

name: Therian Webb
text: Visited from out of state back In April and found my new box when visiting GS. Owner answered when we called, instructor was great and work out was hard. Don't hesitate to check this box out while in the area!

name: Maurice Campbell
text: Fantastic coaches, inviting athletes, and a great gym. Worked out here twice, and I felt at home.

name: Hazel Barber
text: They have a lot of different class schedules and you get one on one instruction if you need it

name: Tori Campbell
text: Definitely going here when I move to the gulf

name: Troy Persyn
text: Great box, great people

name: Jan Fussell
text: Get place to work out

name: Melinda pulliam
text: Awesome!

name: amy crumpton
text: I recently visited Gulf Shores CrossFit while on vacation. The coaches, staff, and athletes were so warm and welcoming... and knowledgable!  I cannot say enough good things about this box. As a CrossFit Affiliate myself, they are doing great things I too will implement. If you're in Gulf Shores and love to CrossFit, GO!!

name: Brian Burke (The Branch)
text: This gym is absolutely fantastic on all levels. You are going to love it. Great price, great value, great staff. Enjoy it!

resp.text: Brian, thank you so much! We really appreciate hearing that! :)

name: Sabrina Stanga
text: Great Health Club!  There is a wide variety of weightlifting equipment: free weights, plate loaded and machines.  Classes are taught by energetic instructors with polished material.  Trainers are experienced and knowledgeable.  Locker rooms, pool, sauna, swim lessons, smoothie bar, prepared food, ready to drinks supplements are all accessible!

resp.text: Thank you, Sabrina! We are so honored to be able to serve you and delighted to hear you are enjoying 24e and all of the amenities!!

name: Gary Hundlo
text: My wife and I like it very much , we needed a clean co-ed place to work out and 25e health club was just the ticket for us .

resp.text: We are so honored to have you both!!! Thank you!

name: TeDarius Forrest
text: Absolutely love this gym! Great staff! They are extremely helpful! The staff are very knowledgeable as well!. The price for membership is very reasonable. Especially with the level of gym you get. It's a very clean facility. The equipment is new and top of the line! I don't regret my decision not one bit!!

resp.text: TeDearius, thank you for taking the time to leave such a great review! We are so thrilled to hear that you are enjoying 24e! It's an honor to serve our amazing members. We appreciate you!!!

name: C Michelle Harris
text: I love it here. Everything is very clean and shiny. If you get a chance  try the TRIP on Wednesdays with LaKeisha! It's  an awesome spin class.

resp.text: Thanks for the 5 stars! We are glad to have you at 24e!

name: Carlos Ruiz
text: Very nice gym with good equipment, I think it's the best gym around the area. Has a Sauna and Steam Room. The gym is well kept and clean.

resp.text: Thanks Carlos!! It means a lot to us to hear that. We are honored to serve you and thankful to have you at 24e!!

name: Ryan Hamilton
text: Great gym. Very clean with high quality equipment. The classes are top notch. Highly recommend!

resp.text: Thanks Ryan!

name: Tim Archer
text: Great gym, great atmosphere.   Large selection of free weights, machines, cardio equipment,  and classes.  Great place to work out.

resp.text: Thanks Tim! We are so glad to hear you are enjoying all of the amenities!

name: Alicia Cox
text: Man, this place has it all! I just moved into the area from across town and kept passing this place thinking.. "man, I don't want to get stuck in another contract". So I walked in, not thinking anyone would say hello or introduce themselves but, to my surprise, everyone there was super friendly!  Got a sweet tour of the place and they answered all my questions and the best part of it all was, they had an option for a $29  month to month option instead of a contract!  That sold me.  With how 2020 went and how I want 2021 to go financially, I just didn't want to get stuck in something I couldn't get out of.  So glad to call this my new gym!

resp.text: Alicia, thank you so much for leaving us a great review! We strive everyday to give our members a great experience. Thankful to have you at 24e!!

name: Nikita szymczak
text: Love this gym! Lots of great classes, machines, free weights, treadmills......Pool. The staff is outstanding, professional yet super friendly. I would recommend this gym to anybody and everybody, young and not so young. Like me😁

resp.text: Thanks for leaving us such an awesome review! We love to hear how much our members are enjoying 24e. You rock!

name: Brigette Pharo
text: I love love this gym!!!! Highly recommend especially if you need more motivation. The classes and coaches are amazing.

resp.text: Thanks Brigette!

name: Kevin Nguyen
text: Coming from Lifetime Fitness I can say this gym is better! I did save money joining early but, $24 a month compared to $80 is such a steal. There’s all the weights you can dream of and they still have more equipment coming currently. Staff is friendly and the decor is gorgeous. It’s a gym rats dream!

resp.text: Thanks Kevin! So glad to have you as a member!

name: David Smith
text: Best gym I've been too.  Clean, machines in good repair, pool, sauna, steam room, theater.  Staff extra friendly and helpful

resp.text: Thanks for leaving us a great review! Glad to have you at 24e!!

name: adrienne mccall
text: I’m a  former 24e member and decided to re-enroll at the new Pelham location today. Upon entering I was immediately greeted with a warm smile and welcome by fitness trainer Nicolette Hayes. She took me on a tour of the new facility...btw which is AWESOME... and answered all of my questions and concerns throughly! The gym itself has everything...the latest state of the art equipment, a smoothie bar and a pool!  Plus, only $24 a month which is a steal.  I was introduced to other staff members which are just as friendly and welcoming.  Nicolette was very friendly and made the joining process simple and easy.  I have an appointment set up for a fitness consultation  in a few days and I am super excited to start working out again! If you’re thinking about joining, go ahead and do it...you’ll be happy you did!

resp.text: Awesome! Welcome back!!!

name: Bill Kahmar
text: great gym! the best in the area

resp.text: Thanks Bill!  We are thankful for our awesome members!

name: Rebecca Hatten
text: Good gym to use - wish there was more done to be COVID safe but changing up when I go has helped some.

name: Sha-Ron Hunter
text: The gym is huge, clean, and has a wide variety of equipment and services. They even have a smoothie bar and a sauna. Great place to work out.

resp.text: Thanks for the awesome review! Thankful to have you at 24e!!

name: Aqiea Cole
text: Love this gym. Definitely the best I’ve been too. It’s clean and the workers are nice and very helpful.

resp.text: Thanks Aqiea! Were thankful to have you as a member with us!!!

name: rip kobe
text: Great has a movie theater with treadmills and a indoor track and pool and more tredmills and alot of good weights

resp.text: Thanks for the 5 stars! It means a lot to us to hear our members are enjoying 24e!

name: Reed Parrish
text: Rhett and Maria helped me find my lost headphones and were extremely caring, good people

resp.text: They are awesome! We love our members!

name: Buddha 3g
text: Great gym, great staff with the exception of one trainer. The one trainer I'm speaking of if very rude. The only reason I'm there is the guy running the gym.

name: Darren Mullinax
text: It used to be a Golds gym so facilities are top notch. My only complaint is people going around the track in the wrong direction. They need to police that so people don’t run into each other. Huge pain in the butt

resp.text: Hi Darren! Thanks for the feedback! We will get to work on addressing that. Glad to have you as a member with us and hope we can earn that 5th star very soon!

name: amy mims
text: Love my gym!! Friendly staff, lots of equipment and fun classes!!

resp.text: Thanks Amy! You rock! So thankful to have you at 24e!

name: Amanda Lenhart
text: A huge improvement from Gold's! The equipment is all new and the staff goes above and beyond to keep the facilities clean. They actually care about the upkeep and maintenance of the machines and weights. The only suggestion I would have would be to add those automatic water bottle dispensers on the drinking fountains!

resp.text: Hi Amanda! Thanks for the great review and feedback! Really glad to hear you are enjoying the new facility! We'll look into adding the water bottle dispensers. We're eyeing the current water fountain that is near the elevator.

name: Shane Glidewell
text: These guys did it right. Best...gym...ever! I've been around the country and this gym would rival any top city gym.

resp.text: Shane, we are so thrilled to hear that! It was a labor of love. Thank you!!

name: Anthony Johnson
text: Great staff, tons of equipment, classes, pool and xfit plus protein or performance shake bar what else could you ask for. Place is clean and open 24/7

resp.text: Having such amazing members like you makes it all worth it!!

name: Sandra
text: They have great yoga instructors

resp.text: Thanks Sandra! We agree!! :)

name: Ricardo Mendez
text: Great gym, only down fall is sauna has been down for about 2-3 weeks now and it’s causing the steam room to be over crowded in busy times

resp.text: Hi Ricardo! We apologize for this inconvenience. We were hoping to have this resolved last week, but discovered it was not just one bad element but all three. The other two have been ordered up and our technician is on standby to install as soon as they arrive. Hope we can earn five stars again from you very soon. Thanks for being such a valued member with us!!

name: Ayo
text: Cool gym

resp.text: Thanks Ayo! We appreciate it!

name: Regena Varvoutis
text: Pool was 82 degrees today.

resp.text: Hi Regena! There will be times during the week were the water temps will fluctuate. This is due to regular pool upkeep which involves backwashing and refilling the pool water levels. The fresh water being added back in is colder and causes the temps to drop a couple degrees. Our pool heater is set to 84. We'll try to pin down a maintenance schedule so that you can be more aware of these times and plan your swim times accordingly. Thanks for being a valued member with us!!

name: Tameka Fields
text: Love this gym!

resp.text: And we so love hearing that!! It is our great honor and pleasure serving our awesome 24e members.

name: Candice Wilkerson
text: Absolutely love this gym

resp.text: Thankful to have you at 24e!!

name: Jay Goodner
text: Excellent, excellent gym!

resp.text: Thank you, Jay!

name: Djalma Galvão15
text: The best!

resp.text: Thank you!! We have the best members!

text: Great gym

name: America Foster
text: Great  place

resp.text: Thank you, so much!!!

name: stephen kabachia
text: They have a sauna!!!!

name: Christine Calzada
text: Large, clean Gym with plenty of free weights, 3 squat racks,cardio cinema and they have great options for premium training. Melanie is AMAZING. She takes the time with you and is extremely helpful, will elaborate on all the extra amenities, training, etc. There is a pool. Great locker room, so clean and they make u feel welcome. You can grab a protein smoothie on the way in or out. Can't beat the price.such great front desk employee, helpful!

name: osvaldo lopez
text:
(Translated by Google) Excellent 👌👌👌👌

Excelente 👌👌👌👌

resp.text: Thank you!! :)

name: Raydeana Hunt

name: George Patterson
text: This place is great!  Everyone is so nice, even when they're trying to kill you in workout class.. LOL!!  HIGHLY RECOMMEND!!  ENJOY!

name: Bucky Summerlin
text: Great people!!! Great environment, come join us!!!

name: Stephen P
text: Well-maintained place with friendly staff and good hours.  Definitely spikes in the evenings after the 9-5 workday.

name: Airman 920
text: If you have any issues, let the owner, David Johnson, know, and he’s quick to address them.

name: Donna Thomas

text: Very clean ,all new equipment,Excellent employees.

name: Kendall Dixon

text: Everything is good

name: Felicia Moseley
text: Very nice

name: Caroline Hopkins
text: Too many areas to go in the building to work out. Weight room way to small n too overcrowded  treadmill area downstairs too small n machines too close together. There's no inside pool. Why charge for popcorn it should be included in the membership fee like other gyms do.

name: Gloria Black
text: Facilities are up to date.

name: Ty Oswald
text: Love small local owned business, that you feel like family? Check out F4L!!!!

name: Meghan Parker
text: I was very unsure about signing up for the gym bc I'm at the beginning of my weight loss journey and everyone there made me feel so welcomed and has been so encouraging. Wonderful place!

name: Frank Smith
text: No frills and gimmicks. Nice small facility, never crowded, has just the equipment I need and nothing more. 24/7 access makes it convenient for me.

name: Juli Hogan
text: Quaint no frills gym. Great for bodybuilding. Equip. Kinda old but ergonomic.

name: Mike Voss
text: Get healthy

name: Alethea Ward
text: I have called several times to try and get information for a family membership no one ever answers the phone!! Wants me to leave a message and they'll call me back within 24 hrs.

resp.text: Hi Alethea—we are always happy to return voicemail and always answer calls when our staff is available and not helping others.  Unfortunately we have not gotten a voucher mail from you. You can also email us at attalla@snapditness.com. We’d love to answer your questions!

name: al lamb
text: Great staff and facility

resp.text: Thank you for your review!!

name: Gaynell Wade
text: Nice staff, hot though

name: kristi smith
text: Luv luv luv it. New equipment tanning bed,it's awesome

resp.text: Thank you for your review!

name: Susan Coleman
text: I love the gym atmosphere and I really love the manger she is very sweet and helpful.  I love how clean the gym is and love all the updated equipment   GREAT PLACE TO WORKOUT!!

name: Cole Owens
text: See any of the friendly staff at Snap Fitness in Attalla to help you achieve your goals! Best gym in Northeast Alabama hands down!

text: Best place to work out if your into athletic weight lifting

resp.text: Thank you for reveiwing!

name: William Turner
text: Friendly staff, excellent equipment, and open 24 hours. What more could you ask for?

resp.text: Thank you so much for taking time to review us!

name: Mark Talley

resp.text: Thank you for your review!

name: Kevin McCullouch

resp.text: Thank you for your review!

name: maggie lyons
text: Love it

name: Bobby Hooks
text: Lover it

name: Bob Woody
text: Great place lots of free weights and awesome machines.

name: Katherine Kuhn
text: Fitness For Life was a great gym, had everything I needed, and I love the 24/7 access. I knew I would be moving soon and was nervous about gym contracts because I've been jiffed pretty bad in the past with other gyms. Their membership is month to month, SO affordable, and easy to cancel. I also enjoyed that it's very clean and spacious for a smaller gym. Thanks guys!

name: Tychell Johnson
text: No complaints! Clean equipment, gym, bathrooms, older people so no wait in machines and they are all really nice. The owner and the staff are nice and they have classes which is a must for me!

name: Belinda Conley
text: Try it, you'll like it.  It's a great environment and the morning crew treats you like family (if you like your family)!  Loved working out here.  The owner, Lyle, is great and Josh is absolutely one of the best trainers in the area!  He makes you want to put in the work....I'll be back soon, Josh! 😊

name: Amy Carter
text: Clean, friendly, simple. No frills and have everything you need.  Group classes are included.   Dietitian, massage therapist, personal trainers all on staff and at affordable rates. Can't ask for more!

name: Rhonda Lewis
text:
Love this gym! The Zumba instructor is so nice! The owner is so nice, and always there to answer any questions and to greet you. Always clean, private bathrooms and showers. Love this place.
Added 9/3/2018. Went and had a Massage by Katherine, she is amazing, very professional and cares about the type of massage and pressure that best fits your needs,  asks if I have any questions or concerns before and after my massage. This will be a monthly must for me. Thank you to the staff for creating a wonderful and comfortable environment.

name: Michael Sheridan
text: Awesome gym. Very clean. All the equipment you could want. Great owner

name: Jennifer Strete
text: It is 24/7, secure, clean and has almost everything you can imagine to get a great workout whether a beginner or expert

name: andrew franz
text: I came into town looking for a place to workout. Lyle went above and beyond to accommodate me. I would highly recommend this place.

name: Jim Gordon
text: Good-sized area with plenty of machines, not too crowded, and Lyle is both pleasant and helpful.

name: Charles
text: Excellent gym with excellent classes; excellent staff

name: judith campbell
text: Awesome place

name: James Douglass
text: Great facility and great staff. Professional personal training at its best!

name: Kristin Anthony
text: Awesome facility, team, and amazing spin class crew!!

name: Pam Martin
text: Great live this place.

name: John Henson
text: Rarely overcrowded and always clean

name: Michael Olheiser
text: Great gym, with excellent staff.

name: Tina Burner
text: Best Yoga Studio I have ever been too! They are the most welcoming people I have ever been around. I never felt out of place & they always provided such a pleasant experience.

name: Alison Herlihy
text: Glow is an amazing community! They have a great variety of classes and the classes can be accommodated for all fitness levels. When I first went to Glow, I was a little intimated by hot yoga, but now I am a believer.

name: Jackie Hawkins
text: I love this place. Easy going, no pressure, no problems. I can easily plan times to go around my busy schedule thanks to the 530a classes. A lot of other yoga studios in the area I looked at didn’t have weekend, night, or early morning classes which always made it difficult to try something new.  I haven’t found an instructor I don’t like and I love the special events                (especially the ones that they partner with other businesses). I really look forward to continuing with Glow.

name: Danelle Adair
text: When I decided to join a yoga studio, I looked local studios around town and when Glow Yoga popped up, I knew this studio was the right one for me. The good vibes I felt when I stepped into the front door confirmed how I felt when I saw the website. The teachers are so friendly, knowledgeable, and make classes fun. Namaste Glow Yoga family. ✨🧘🏻‍♀️✨

name: Marbury Buckhaults
text: From the first moment I felt a part of the Glow family and yet we are given that gentle shove needed that produces results. Can't say enough good things!

name: Jacquelyn East
text: Glow Yoga is a very welcoming studio. You can practice here at any level. When I first started practicing yoga at Glow, I was a beginner. It has been a wonderful journey to watch my practice grow and my body become stronger. No more back problems.

name: Emilee Shuler
text: From my very first day at Glow Yoga Mobile, I have felt completely welcome and comfortable. Soon after starting classes there, I began to realize that this place is not just a yoga studio. It's a safe place where like minded people can go to practice yoga, but also a community in which everyone supports and encourages each other. I enjoyed it so much that I began the teacher training, and it is one of the best things that's ever happened to me. I'm not only learning the physical aspects of yoga and how to teach it, but how to incorporate it into my day to day life. I am learning so much about myself and life in general. I could go on and on!

name: Melissa Byrd
text: Having tried many yoga classes, I never really felt connected to the practice or the classes until I began going to Glow Yoga.  I entered feeling very intimidated but left with a sense of community and peace.  The studio and the staff are so welcoming and inspiring.  I began practicing here at a very vulnerable time in my life having faced many terrible tragic losses, yet due to the constant positive energy, I was hooked.  I am now teaching yoga and thriving both on and off of the mat!  I cannot thank them enough for changing my life, one breath, one hour at a time!

name: addie hanson
text: Such an awesome environment--I am brand new to yoga and everyone was so welcoming and helpful! Can't wait to go back and finish my 30 days for $30 special. They also have an awesome selection of workout gear including Lululemon (so cute!!)

name: Gail Harrington
text: Changes your body and your mind .I feel stronger after every class.The instructors are so encouraging and positive. For me, it's a great way to end a stressful day.

name: Jacqueline Beverly
text: Original location is in Gulf Shores, AL, but the Mobile studio has the same welcoming, friendly, and relaxed vibe. You will get a great workout for your body and mind! Plus, they sell Lululemon!

name: Kristin O'Connell
text: Judgment-free, all skill levels welcome and super happy environment. Love Glow Yoga so much!

name: Jennifer Heitman
text: Best Lululemon selection in southern Alabama. If you love Lululemon, you should definitely check out this studio. Great location in Springhill. Stay for some amazing yoga too!

name: Tara Brown
text: I love Glow yoga!! Great people and wonderful yoga!!

name: Rachel Fulmer
text: Perfect Location with a great community!

name: Cinna buunnzz
text: Love it!

name: Sarah Preston
text: The equipment is great. Peter, one of their trainers, is fantastic. The tanning beds are high quality. I gave four stars instead of five because cleanliness could be better and now that summer has hit, it has been pretty hot in there.

name: P Johnson
text: My adult daughter has been at this gym 6 months and loves it, so I wanted to check it out.  The first thing I noticed is the easy access to the facility with plenty of parking.  The gym is well-lit and I felt the energy as I entered.  The front desk folks are friendly and helpful, engaging in conversation with those who have questions and offering a friendly greeting to those who just want to check in and get started. The ladies' locker room is clean and fresh smelling.  The gym is clean and organized.   Staffed 24/7.  A supervised activity area for children...  I can see why my daughter likes to be a part of this Crunch Fitness.

name: Nicholas High
text:
Management is super unprofessional. They don’t pay their staff enough to care. No commission, so the staff have no incentive to raise a finger, but they’re really great people. Plumbing is always down, from the sinks in the bathroom, to the water fountains. What gym, in the biggest city in the state, can’t fix a water fountain? It’s a cheap gym, and a good value for the money, but the management is so rude to both employees and staff that I felt bad paying the membership fee every month.

They “bought” a bunch of memberships from Gold’s Gym, and charged those people $30/month without their consent though, so what do you expect?

There was a guy caught taking pictures of women changing in gym down the street and the manager decided he could get a membership at Crunch for whatever reason, even as criminal charges were pending. Not what I’d consider to be great decision-making.

name: Jourdan Truth
text: Love the gym! It’s clean and the staff are friendly and make sure the gym stays neat! Also love that I can keep up with ESPN and the news while working out with all the TVs. Here for all the gains!

name: Christine Gaitantzis
text: Had a great experience at Crunch. It is spacious and clean with a lot of variety in terms of workout machines and options. Staff was friendly and helpful.

name: Earth & Sky
text: Excellent facility and staff was great! Much cheaper and more amenities than all other local gyms. Definitely worth the wait!!

name: Kenneth Enman
text: Go see Johnny and Kayla for a great gym experience.  Convenient location and nice mix of weights, machines and cardio eqipment.

name: Gator6
text: Great gym! Had a day pass, lots of diverse equipment! Nice people!

name: April L. Butler
text: Awesome new facility, tons of space and courteous staff.  2 floors of workout space, group fitness, and the best spin instructor to boot!  Really great gym, especially considering the price.

name: Christina Buchholz
text:
Great facility. Nice people. Reasonable pricing. Love the hydro massage.

Subpar children center.

name: Johnny Isbell
text: The best energy I have ever felt in a gym hands down. Tons of equipment and the staff is always friendly and helpful. Way cleaner than any other gym I’ve been to as well.

name: Lauren Muncher
text:
Wow. Just wow. Going back to planet fitness!

I went as a guest of a friend and I was not impressed.

An employee named I think Johnny, was super unprofessional and wasn’t wearing a mask during a GLOBAL PANDEMIC! He was rude to other staff and clients. As someone who has been in customer service for over 10 years I was appalled. He ignored clients and spoke down to women! This is 2021 for god sakes. Leave the misogyny in the 50’s.

The only redeeming employee was a blonde girl (I think her name was Emma or Emily?) she was awesome and I hope she finds a better place to work!

Planet fitness here I come!

name: Pamela Cartright
text: My trainer is excellent . The gym is mediocre. And the there are mistakes with billing.  If you are overcharged do not expect to be reimbursed.

name: Melvin Smith (Snap)
text: It’s a great place to workout and the prices are low! You can’t beat that.

name: Kaiser Hulsman
text:
I worked here from July-October 2020, if any customer saw what was going on behind the scenes of this place it would make them sick to their stomachs. Often times the GM and Owner would short people money on their pay checks and it was up to us on the staff to harass and remind them for days at a time to get the money we worked for. It wasn't just front desk staff either, the personal trainers were shorted even more money and would even be shouldered out of it. Finances aside the environment of continuous disrespect towards the employees was a daily challenge. As a male I did not have to deal with the sexist name calling but i did have to deal with inappropriate conversations about the female members who would come in and work out(From GM).
Very unprofessional, disrespectful and not a good work environment.

name: Abdul D
text: The gym is very good. Super clean! Everything you need for working out is available. Even when it’s crowded, I still can get the workout done. Friendly staff. And 24 hours.

name: Ken Sutherland
text:
Well equipped and a shiny new facility.
I didn't see many cleaning stations. Odd showers don't have soap or shelves. Good prices for memberships though!!!

name: Carlo Romano
text:
Don’t ignore the bad reviews. Golds was wrong, after being dormant, to then sell memberships, personal information and data - and yes, they sent emails. So what. Some didn’t get them, some had contracts that expired, and some weren’t even active members when they decided to go bankrupt and hide from their already unmanageable debts.....
If you’re  happy at Crunch - great. But I find the practice of charging people that don’t want to go to your gym, even worse. What’s even more frustrating is the manner in which Crunch (Hoover) acts about it. There is never a reason to charge anyone before communicating such. They had a golden opportunity to be the good guy and decide everyday, and at every interaction to be the opposite.
Our country is hurting right now - businesses have all the reasons in the world to be helpful right now and those business that don’t understand that - should be shamed!
Cancel Crunch

name: Laqhasha Reed
text: Because Gold's sold my membership without my knowledge or consent and because Crunch started billing me forty bucks without warning, my  bank account was overdrawn by $60.  If Crunch would have bought the Gold's location I would have considered staying. However, thank goodness I'm relocating to another city.  They should remember that prosperity without integrity will never work out in the long run.

name: Johnny Molden
text: Don’t listen to all the bad reviews because of Gold’s mistakes. I was a Gold’s member too, and with just a little communication the folks at Crunch easily adjusted my membership to their plans—which actually had more benefits for less money than what Gold’s was charging! Sadly with covid cases spiking again I needed to ask about cancellation (I have a high risk child at home), but was worried that I’d technically still be locked in my old contract from Gold’s. Again, nope, no issues-no questions asked and no pressure. I look forward to doing business with Crunch again in the future and will recommend them to anyone who asks.

name: Emily Stephens
text:
IGNORE THE ANGRY GOLDS MEMBERS

When golds shutdown in march, I received multiple emails explaining my membership would be transferred to Crunch. I contacted crunch before they opened and they provided my new billing date information and confirmed my account. They were incredibly helpful.

Since it opened, the facility has been well maintained. The classes are high energy and fun, and the equipment is top notch. They listen to their members and got more accessories for the different stations, as well as more benches. I see staff constantly cleaning and refilling the bottles at the cleaning stations. Tanning and the hydromassages are nice perks too.

While this gym hit some rough spots after opening (hydromassage and tanning beds going down), the staff has been incredibly apologetic and to resolve all issues.

I've visited this gym during different times on different days and some staff that deserves recognition includes Krissy (a manager), Arkin, Nick, Landry, a tall dark haired girl, and many others.

This place is awesome and they're doing the best they can with mess golds left them with.

name: Bradleigh Smith
text: This gym is so well laid out and has ALL the amenities you could be looking for!!! The staff is super friendly, shout out to the front desk boy nick who always is looking good! There is all the top of the line equipment, classes like cycling and yoga and there is also a hydro massage and tanning bed/ spray tan areas. Overall very pleased with my experience!!!!!

name: Marlin White
text: Very clean, spacious, and offers a lot

name: V P
text: Never been inside a crunch gym but have been charged for membership since July 2020. While many families were struggling financially during Covid-19, golds and crunch gym found a way to steal money legally from people. Doesn't matter how many emails were sent out by either gym this was calculated by both parties, they were in it to steal money there are no if and buts about this. What crunch did was buy stolen goods,  they wont admit it and point finger at golds for selling membership but can't take responsibility for being a part of the transaction. Crunch might be a great gym but they took advantage of people and tried to gain business by cheating members.

name: Saba Arain
text: It has everything you need + a great atmossphere

name: Sleepy Hollow Review
text: I have been to Crunch everyday since they opened and love it. Extremely clean and well lit. Tons of equipment and classes. The instructors seem pretty knowledgeable. In my opinion, the 1 star reviews are from people that are from Golds. Crunch bought all of Golds memberships when Golds closed. This is a common business practice. Should they have called, maybe but Golds could have as well.

name: Duncan Lawrence
text: A wide variety of equipment to use with plenty of floor space so you don’t feel like your right on top of other people.

name: Eli Brown
text: I am a former Gold's Gym client and was getting personal training at Gold's in Pelham.  I stopped personal training BEFORE Gold's shut down.  Nevertheless, Crunch charged my credit card a total of $285, $230 of which was for personal training, and I had never set foot in their gym. I never gave them permission to charge my credit charge. I couldn't care less what arrangement Gold's and Crunch Fitness made. I just know I never gave Gold's permission to give my credit card information to anyone, and I never gave Crunch permission to start charging my card.  When I called, they refused to refund my money and said they had a right to continue charging because they had bought the memberships from Gold's. I tried to explain to the lady that I had stopped personal training even BEFORE Gold's shut down.  Needless to say, they did not refund my money. Crunch Fitness in Hoover is perpetuating a fraud, plain and simple. I suggest all former Gold's Gym members who had drafts on their credit cards immediately check their statements. Crunch is outright stealing!!!! Believe me, they will not stop until more of us file fraud complaints against them.  Stay away from this gym.  STAY FAR, FAR AWAY!!!!

name: Lindsay Diaz
text: Crunch classes are so good. The teachers all give options which helps me!

name: Molly Feazell
text:
This gym billed me 8 TIMES what a single membership is from my transfer from Gold’s and WILL NOT refund a penny!  My membership was SOLD to Crunch Fitness when Gold’s Gym pulled out of Alabama.
