text: If you're an adult athlete, the Boot Camps are the best offering in Huntsville.  You learn form and gain agility.  Strength and weight loss are a given.  D1 Boot Camp is the hardest workout, and the most rewarding.  The groups are supportive, with an edge of competitiveness.  They keep you on your toes and coming back for more.  Thanks to D1, I placed first in my tennis league and have qualified to compete at the State level twice this year.

name: Tyler King
text: I've been through physical therapy and training with D1 Huntsville for just over two years combined now, and it's never been anything but fantastic.  With respect to training, their focus on form/technique is essential to an athlete looking to progress without getting hurt.  Their focus on an full-body athlete instead of strictly "mirror muscles" is a must for any athlete or any person looking to train properly.  There's an even balance of cardio & weight work.  The physical therapists knowledge and focus on helping active people, those wishing to be active, and those just wanting to be able to walk again is fantastic.  Both have helped me focus in on what I need to get better and progress as an active person.

name: Brian Weathers
text: Killer work outs! Really creative workouts that keep you from feeling like your working out and getting bored. They have many different sessions throughout the day to fit almost anyone's schedule.

name: Jarrod Barnes
text: Great place to train and workout. Place for all not just athletes, will make you better and reach that goal.

name: Aileen
text: They make you feel like family!!

name: Gina Terry
text: Fantastic Trainers and a Great facility!

name: Dart Monkey
text: They have a solid rock wall here. There are several top rope routes as well as a few lead climbing spots and a bouldering cave. You do not have to be a member to climb. A day pass is $15 and they even have gear that you can rent.

name: Will Grice
text: ACA is a great club to be part of. Their facilities are top notch and the staff is friendly and professional. The new restaurant has phenomenal food and has the perfect atmosphere for a business lunch. The general manager is so very passionate about the club, the members, and the employees. How many places give out cards with the general manager's personal email and cell phone on it so that any time you have a question or concern you can get in touch with him or her? I highly recommend ACA. They do business the right way and I'm proud to have a membership there.

name: Candice Humphrey
text: I absolutely love this place. Wonderful staff and two beautiful locations. Tennis courts, group fitness class, a spa and so much more!!!

name: Charlie “GoodTime Charlie”
text: I wish they would provide better services for the racquetballers....I guess if you like tennis...its ok.  Beware....they charge your dues an additional $25 per month for a food allowance regardless if you use it or not...if you don't use it...they take it away from you....

resp.text:
Thanks for your review, Charlie. I'm sorry we're not able to provide all of the services and amenities we once were down at the South location. After years of trying to make the facility work for the racquetball, rock climbing, and fitness community, we had to make a choice to either close down the building completely or keep it open ONLY for the racquetball community. We thought we were doing a kindness in keeping it open. I will certainly pass your message across to ownership, and in gathering these opinions they can make a decision for the future of the building.

Please remember - you have 90 days to use your food and beverage points!

name: Nicholas Olson
text: Had an excellent time rock climbing for the very first time. Great instructor and all very nice.

name: Sherrie Dunn
text: I love my gym.  Everything I need in one place.  The staff is wonderful and make you feel welcome.

name: Devin Webb
text: Unfriendly account managers. Poor value and not customer friendly.

name: Jon Sawa
text: Very nice facility.  Clean and many options.  Totally worth the membership!

name: Maria Faulkner
text: The staff is amazing. They take the time to explain the concept, the motions, and proper form. The workouts are tough yet very enjoyable. It's a good way to spend an hour toning muscles and also stretching and relieving tension. I've only been going to classes here for a month and I can see a difference in my body and feel the increase in my strength. I highly recommend.

name: Pearls of Eden
text: I absolutely love going to workout at Pure Barre! I've been working out for years and have tried many, many things but Pure Barre by far is the best I've tried!! I love going to work out each day and it feels as though I'm at a retreat or spa of some sort when I'm there. I can't say enough great things about the instructors and community . They are simply AWESOME! I love the results and the way my body is sculpting out. Great people, Great environment, Amazing workout!

name: Melanie Anderson
text: This is a whole new experience in exercise. They have great classes with a variety of times to choose from. The instructors are genuinely interested in showing you proper technique to get the most benefit. I have back issues and  was worried about my age, but I was shown multiple ways to protect my back and still be getting a good work out.

name: Erika R. Harvell
text: I have been to six classes, so far. I tried out their free week and liked it so much that I signed up so I could keep the momentum going. My first and second class, I was kind of a disaster! There are certain parts of the workout that stay the same, so I had to follow the other girls that knew what they were doing. The exercises were new and pretty interesting. They work some of the smaller muscles that really lift your butt, tone your arms, and tone your abs. I am already seeing a little change in my muscle tone. I normally run and do yoga or some light weight lifting, so I was already in some kind of shape going in, but I don't work out too hard by myself. There's something cool and inspiring about doing it with other people and loud pumping music. It makes me really push myself to my limits, which is what I need. I get the feeling there is a sense of community there, too (I go to the Riverchase location). You don't just walk in and out like an invisible stranger. They learn your name, greet you every time, and tell you you're doing great in class. I'm really happy, so far! I can't wait to the results after a few more weeks.

name: S Miller
text: Challenging yet fun workout! The studio is great and the instructors are helpful. I am in love with this program and look forward to working out. The 55 minutes goes by fast and it focuses on problem areas for women

name: KD Burchfield
text: The Riverchase Studio is amazing! The instructors are all fantastic, welcoming and very helpful! This is the first workout that I have actually stuck with and look forward to going.  If you haven't checked it out, I highly recommend that you do.  You won't be sorry.

name: Beth Wilkinson
text: First time to take the Empowered class and loved it.  Leslie was a great instructor.   This will definitely be a regular Wednesday class for me.

name: Amanda Tabor
text: Tried it for the first time this past weekend! Loved it! The instructor Grace was awesome & the group of ladies there were super nice. Even though I had no idea what I was doing I'll definetly be back.

name: Kelly Jackson
text: So amazing! Only 2 classes in and I can already tell a difference. I have way more energy and feel more confident! Everyone is so welcoming and friendly. I need the accountability, and I have found it at Pure Barre Riverchase!

name: Amanda Morris
text:
I have always had back problems ever since I was in high school, mainly due to poor posture and not performing exercises to strengthen my back. I was in a car accident in 2014 that completely destroyed my back. I could barely get out of bed some mornings. I went to physical therapy for a couple months and that alleviated some of the pain but not all. I hate exercising by myself at a gym because I find it extremely boring. My coworker mentioned that there was a Groupon for Pure Barre for a couple classes at a good price. So I decided to go for it! I have finally found something that will help make me stronger and more toned and will keep my attention and keep challenging me. I have finished my Groupon and have purchased the student package and I can't wait to start going to classes multiple times a week. My back pain is pretty much nonexistent. I can feel those muscles getting tighter and I am extremely happy with my results thus far.

PS. Whitney is my favorite instructor so far. She takes the time to go around to all the ladies in class and help them get the most out of their exercises. Wish she taught more classes!

name: Carol Madden
text: Pure Barre is a great workout. I sleep better and feel better. I am seeing a change in my body. I really enjoy it.

name: Marissa S. Williams
text: Great workout at any level! Staff is very welcoming and engaging during class.

name: Scrub Mcglumpington
text: Ignore the name as my son also uses this account, but Pure Barre was fantastic today!! Can't wait until my next class!

name: Hillary Butterworth
text: So much fun! This location has the BEST customer service :)

name: Penny McCune
text: LOVE PB RIVERCHASE! THE BEST PLACE TO GET A FULL BODY WORK OUT! AWESOME INSTRUCTORS!!!! EVERYONE SHOULD TRY PB RIVERCHASE!!!

name: Rebecca Johnstone
text: My favorite all time workout- I can't say enough positive praise

name: Alicia Bettes
text: 1st time visit. The workout was challenging. I will be back!

name: Katelyn Ann Snyder
text: Great workout and an even better staff!

name: SanityCure
text: Great place!!!!!

name: Allison O'Brien Granger
text: love pure barre!!

name: Ann L
text: This is the very best place to relax and workout without being intimidated. It's clean and fun. The staff and personal trainers are very educated and professional in health and fitness.

name: Maddog Fishing
text: Very nice facility with plenty of plates and dumbbells even for the heavy lifters. A variety of machines especially for leg workouts. The only thing they are lacking is cable machines for triceps and lats but they make up for it with there calisthenic and cardio room. Sleds, battle ropes, climbing rope, rings, heavy punching bag and a host of other stuff. They are closed on Sunday!

name: Second2none
text: Great place quiet, personable and inviting environment. Ask for TNT Bobby the trainer.

name: Podna
text: Very clean and the staff is very helpful and knowledgeable.

name: Raven BeGreat
text: Amazing place

name: Lenita Bishop
text: Great facility with amazing trainers.

name: Margaret DeHaye
text: Great local gym. Plenty of cardio equipment, machines, free weights, TRX straps and more. Super nice staff and clean!

resp.text: Thanks Margaret! We enjoy your presence!

name: Janet Dunn
text: Great workout!

name: Cameron B
text: Great Vibe, professional equipment and very clean!

resp.text: Thank you! Welcome to the EHC Family, we are happy you enjoyed your workout!

name: Joshua Golden
text: Awesome gym...great equipment for its size.

name: Linda Lavender
text: CAN'T FIND A BETTER FITNESS CENTER

resp.text: Thank you Linda! You're the BEST!

name: Pamela Ward
text: I Love It! You will also!

name: vonyabutfly johnsonjemison
text: Love the service

name: J. Houston
text: Very nice facility

name: Jessica Sena (Communications Consultant)
text:
CrossFit done right!
I fell in love with the constantly varied, high intensity workouts over 10 years ago when I first discovered CrossFit (in my early twenties). Eventually, I got out of the everyday routine and before I knew it, 8 years had gone by. Last February (2019) I got up the nerve to get back into CrossFit and found Oddity (formerly Nomad). I could not have chosen a better gym! No longer in my twenties and several pounds heavier than during my initial CrossFit days, I was intimidated to "start all over". But the coaching and camaraderie are second to none at CrossFit Oddity! A year later, I am stronger than I have ever been. The progress has been phenomenal.
CrossFit is not for everybody. But if you want the best workout (and community) of your life, can humble yourself enough to be coached (and love loud music) ...you'll fit right in at Oddity. My hour in the gym is my favorite hour of every day!

resp.text: Thanks Jessica!  We love having you (and your dog)!

name: Mike Giles
text: Great gym and a great community.  Coaches are great a tailoring the workouts to fit my skill levels.  Everyone can do CrossFit and Oddity makes sure that everyone can be successful.

name: Lindsay Badiuk
text: Very welcoming and catering to modifications

resp.text: Thank you for the kind words! We look forward to seeing you in the future!!!

name: Lauren Sharif
text: I was a novice starting CrossFit and the coaches there scale to EVERY fitness level and are heavily focused on form. David does an incredible job coaching while maintaining a relaxed and fun atmosphere to learn and workout. The community this place has cultivated is a blessing to anyone that enters. Come drop in and try it for yourself.

resp.text: Thank you for the positive review! We strive to make sure everyone gets a good workout and has fun while doing so!!!

name: Andrea Brooks
text: My husband and I joined Oddity a few months ago as complete beginners to CrossFit. We were intimidated by what we knew about CrossFit, but Oddity provides an atmosphere that is truly accommodating of all skill levels. The coaching is great, we always get a great workout, and we never feel ashamed of our beginner status! If you’re on the fence about trying CrossFit, come give Oddity a try.

resp.text: Thank you! We want everyone to get a great workout and feel welcome regardless of their fitness level.

name: Alex Kijowski
text:
Came for the CrossFit workouts, stayed for the workout story time.

Whether you’re looking for a box to call home, or a place to drop in to, you won’t find better than Crossfit Oddity.  They’ve got the best coaches around, and they emphasize proper technique to make sure nobody gets hurt, making us all better athletes as a result.  And they have YOGA!

THANKS ODDITY YOU'RE THE BEST

name: Dominic Zelenak
text: I've been a member of this gym for several months and it was a great choice. I would recommend this gym to anyone who wants to start or continue doing CrossFit, or who wants to practice their Olympic lifts. Class times are very flexible and there are open-gym time slots regularly. The staff is knowledgeable, welcoming, and receptive to your goals.

name: Sean Rheams
text:
I used to travel the country for work and have had the pleasure of dropping into some amazing boxes across the country. I moved to Madison at the start of 2019 and joined Crossfit Oddity from the start. They are one of the top gyms in my books. The coaching staff is top notch, the community is better, and the atmosphere is so much fun!

if you have not had the pleasure of stopping in, then maybe you should! The people are friendly and very welcoming!

name: John Alexander
text: Great CrossFit gym without the ego. Will tailor a plan for anyone.

name: Aimee Doubleday
text: Whether you are new to the area or just need a drop in gym while you're in town for work - CrossFit Oddity is the place for you. I've been a member for almost 3 years now and couldn't be happier. Friendly people and the coaches are top notch. Don't take my word for it - drop in for a visit to see for yourself!

name: Tim Hurley
text: I moved to Madison in early 2019 and Oddity (then Nomad) was the 2nd Crossfit box I tried in the area. This was a mistake it should of been the first one I tried but boy I am glad I did. From the moment I cam to the day breakers class everyone has been so welcoming and helpful. This is by far the best box in Madison and Huntsville area. Amazing coaches, programming and great member . If you're in the area and need a box come by Oddity

name: JayJay
text: The coaches and other members (#fitfam) are what keep me motivated and returning to Crossfit Oddity. Even after an injury, the coaches worked with me to modify every single workout so I would not have to quit. Being a part of this gym and family is what helps me stay focused to be a stronger, better person in all areas of my life.

resp.text: Glad you are sticking with it and we love having you working out with us!

name: Brad Henley
text: I have been part of Crossfit Oddity (then Nomad) for the past 7 years. My fitness wouldn’t be where it is today without my CrossFit Oddity community to push me and keep me accountable! If you are on the fence about trying Crossfit, I recommend giving Oddity a try. You will be welcomed by great coaches who care about impacting your fitness journey!

resp.text: We are happy to have you as a member of our community and as a coach!

name: Jessica Teach
text: This is an awesome gym and awesome community! The workouts are always great and there is additional programming geared at building strength and for RX+ . The owner and head coach is super knowledgable and spicy and strives for you to get the best workout for your capabilities!

name: Bonnie Beddingfield
text: Highly recommend! I love the personalized coaching we are given during workouts.

resp.text: Thank you! We do our best to make sure everyone gets some personal attention!

name: Chad Fowler
text: Great atmosphere of people. Class time to fit any schedule. All fitness levels are welcome.

resp.text: We are glad you found the gym to be welcoming.  We strive to make everyone feel at home.  Loud music, kinda sweaty home, but home.

name: Laura Alexander
text: Great vibe, great community, great programming. And they have YOGA!

resp.text: Glad you like the yoga, we are happy to offer it!

name: janelle cordova
text: Dropped in for a tough and fun workout with a great and welcoming group.

resp.text: We glad you liked the workout!  Come back anytime!

name: Charles Dean
text: Best Coaches around! This is my happy place.

resp.text: We are happy to have you!

name: Chris Lindsey
text: Great Gym and even better people that push me to get better everyday!!!  Come check us out.  You’ll be glad you did!!!

name: Jamie Russell
text: I joined CrossFit Nomad about a month ago and I absolutely love it! I am a beginner. CrossFit was extremely intimidating to think about even starting for me, but I knew I wanted to at least try it.  All of the coaches have been so awesome. They walk me through every step of each workout. I have been to several different class times and everyone has the same supportive and upbeat attitude. I couldn't have picked a better place to start this new journey!

name: Trey Stinson
text: You won’t find a better atmosphere to come hangout, get fit and make some friends along the way.

resp.text: Thank you for the kind words!

name: Dale Anton
text: The staff at CrossFit Nomad is amazing - they are knowledgeable and helpful. They teach and encourage the clients to do things properly and because they are so upbeat they get the best performance out of me. The "box" is well set up, it is clean and the equipment is well cared for. This is the most un-gym like experience I've ever had at a gym. There is no posing and the vibe is cooperation not competition. That's not to say that we aren't encouraged to do our best. In fact the way the staff models being good people who are very fit does in fact encourage me to do my best and a bit more. #nomadforlife #crossfitnomad

name: Adam Christiansen
text: Huge concentration on form here, which is the main knock on crossfit. Won't be dissapointed.

name: Janice Kluge
text:
I have been a client at “Chambers Total Body” for a decade and have recommended Mr. Chambers many times. During the time of Covoid he invested in safety precautions above and beyond. He continues to keep sterile environment and his individual attention for personal training is outstanding! There is 30 minutes between clients- for complete turnover.

I was in the studio when the two men came in that gave the ONE star review. They walked right in and did not say anything to the owner. They had materials in their arms that made them look like SALES PEOPLE. And that happens a lot! A LARGE SIGN IS ONTHE DOOR to wear a MASK! Anyone who would give a review like that- after just walking in without calling ahead and already breaking rules- is not really the type of person who comes to workout in this location. I have met many clients over the years. That review was just completely UNFAIR and should be deleted.

name: Meaux La Soule
text: extremely rude when me and a friend walked in just to ask about his services. immediately shoo’d us out of the door like we didn’t belong there. it ruined my day and i won’t be going back.

resp.text: I'm sorry your interpretation of our interaction was that you don't belong here and that you were treated rudely. Our business has clear signage stating, face coverings required. The health and well-being of our clients are extremely important and it's our responsibility to keep the space in which we work as safe as possible for them.  While, It's unfortunate that this rating is reflective of your experience it is in no way reflective of our services.

name: Gary Roubin
text:
Marlon Chambers is the consummate professional trainer. Whether you are 40 or 70y., physical activity is the key to longevity and quality of life. Marlon is able to formulate a circuit of exercises to tune up your core, strengthen your lower extremities and for men," keep you shoulders wider than your waist". And he mixes it up! The workouts match your increasing fitness, your mood on the day and the inevitable appearance of irritated joints and muscles. If consistency is you goal, you will enjoy the experience and be disappointed when you have to miss a session.
As an Interventional Cardiologist, I have a professional interest in fitness and health. I have been working with personal trainers for 30 years. Marlon is the best!

name: Val Walton
text: I am very thankful I have Marlon Chambers as a personal trainer. He is a great motivator and a testament that you do not have to have a hard, drill sergeant attitude to get fitness results. Chambers Total Body, LLC has one-on-one regimens that are designed to do what its name says work your "total body." You will see results, provided you do the work.

name: Anna Schmidt
text: I've been training with Marlon for 3 years now.   Along the way, I've had some major health challenges that Marlon has been instrumental in helping me through.   I'm now strong, agile, slim, and most importantly able to do all those things in life that I really love.  I really appreciate the one on one focus and the way he has individualized a very core-focused program for me.  He even puts my favorite music on and has it ready for me when I walk in.  The facility is immaculately clean and well kept.  The atmosphere is professional and comfortable.  I highly recommend Chambers to anyone considering personal training.  You won't be disappointed.

name: Jimmy Adams
text: Marlon Chambers is a great trainer, working to style the workouts to the client's needs. I have been working out with him Marlon for almost two years and enjoy it. Marlon is also very friendly, and funny frankly. I highly recommend him.

name: john nixon
text: I loss 20 pounds in the first month and the training has improved my energy level.  Marlon is a well trained professional . I highly recommend Chambers Total Body.

name: Paige Daniel
text: My husband and I are long-term clients of Chambers Total Body.  The customized programs and one on one attention is great in helping you meet your goals.

name: Charles Montgomery
text:
Sportsplex was a nice gym. They have several racket ball courts, a nice vaketball courts, workout rooms and a lap pool out back.

They also gave a nice kids area so parents can workout without worrying about child care

Equipment looked to be in good shape and the people working out were really nice. Most of the people working out during this visit were senior citizens.

name: Karate & Jujitsu 4 Kids at Fitness CF
text:
At Sportplex the whole family has a place to become fit!
● We have a Kids program which incorporates Judo, Karate and Fitness for ages 4+
● We have a Kids Nursery to keep the little ones busy while mom and dad get to enjoy some personal time getting in shape.
● We have great programs for Teens to get involved in like Basketball, Swimming, Weightlifting and Martial Arts.
● Adults will find programs like Yoga and Zumba to be quite a fun challenge to get involved in.
● Our family rates are affordable!

name: Don Stringfellow
text:
Best thing is it’s convenient for our family. If anything breaks, it’s does not get fixed. I enjoy yoga class, which is only thing I do there.
Employees are friendly and nice but owner need to step up or sell it to someone who will because the deterioration will continue.

name: Victoria U
text:
Crystal the Zumba instructor is AMAZING!!!! 5 Stars for her.
Sad to see it going away.

name: Robert Stanley
text: The place is literally rotting away. Broken things never get fixed. The best thing is that the place stays empty. The water fountain fell off of the wall and it's been on the ground for a few weeks. The mens showers and saunas have been broken for over a year, the mirror in the free weight area fell off the wall a few months ago and is being held on the wall with duck tape. Some equipment has been in use for 30 years.

name: Samuel Allen
text: Great staff great people and great daycare for your kids I will miss it and the people there

name: Bo Crowe
text: Everyone is nice and the gym has a great atmosphere. Plenty of different choices for all from MMA training, racquet ball, Basketball, spinning , and exercise classes. Track and pool.

name: Jamie Pierkowski Ishmael
text: Been going there for at least 10 years. Very friendly. I enjoy going there.

name: Taylor Thibodeaux
text: Nice place but very old. Needs update

name: Shiv Patel
text: The ice was very loose and half of my blade sunk into the ground. Very dangerous and also said they did not have any half sizes. Please fix

name: catherine smalls
text: User friendly

name: Edythe “LOVE” BINGHAM
text:
(Translated by Google) .Ike

(Original)
Ĺike

name: Chase Burgess
text: Would give 0 Stars if possible. Just moved back into the area and wanted to try it out with a friend and come as there guest one time to see if I like it. Get told soon as I come in with my friend they are not allowing guest until June 1st which is totally fine but the way she comes off saying it. I come back well over June 1st to try it finally and get told they had a meeting and are not doing guest for the month of June. Just wish there was a sign or woulda let me known back then. Just sad that I asked "well if I sign up right now and don't come as a guess can I use the facility" and get told yes absolutely. Just seems like a cash  grab to be honest.

name: Torri Atkins
text: Chris was awesome sauce! He was super helpful, knowledgeable, and patient!

name: Emma Klein
text: Always nice employees, but the building is very old and feels dirty. I remember going here when I was a kid, nearly 20 years ago, and nothing has changed. I prefer the downtown location even though this location is closer to my house. It is much smaller, but much nicer. Being a member of the YMCA isn't cheap so I think it is fair to have higher expectations.

name: Derek Damron
text: This is not the greatest location...... The building seems to be very out dated and neglected...... The locker rooms aren’t the cleanest.... It could be a really cool location, but the staff is super nice 👍 though ( I will say that they are 5 star ⭐️!) but it’s is very disappointing with other things that are lacked or just looked over..... I would like to see it open later and that they aren’t rushing you to get out....

name: John Traylor
text: Great place for working out and staying healthy.  Friendly staff and great equipment.  Definite asset to SE HSV.

name: John Muhlhauser
text: There's no trying this place out,  it's either join straight out of the gate or go somewhere else.  Looks like im going somewhere else.

name: Jenny Mayers
text: I workout here daily and i love the people and the atmosphere.

name: Amy Carter
text: The staff is always friendly and informative (or willing to find the answer if they don't know).  The child watch areas are clean, well-maintained, and (almost) all of the workers are happy to be there.  They have a Mom's Morning Out program that is as affordable as it is fantastic.  The equipment is kept in working order and wiped down regularly by both patrons and staff.  The family and 18+ women's locker rooms are kept clean.  The sauna and steam rooms are a nice touch after a hard workout.  Group classes can get crowded depending on their popularity but the instructors are awesome!  There are separate pools for lap, aerobics, and children-complete with multiple splash pads!  I would highly recommend this facility!

name: Dorothy Densford
text: It is always a pleasant experience to go to this YMCA. The place is clean, and the staff are friendly and helpful. It seems that others enjoy it also because smiles abound. It doesn't matter if I am working on the machines, going to yoga or water aerobics, it is totally enjoyable. I hate to miss a day. The children love the child care facility and are eager to go also. I recommend it to all ages.

resp.text: Thank you for taking the time to leave a review, Dorothy! We are glad that you are a Y Member :-)

name: Dana DeBardelaben
text: I love the Y, but I might be biased since I have been teaching a Spin class there for about 5 years. They have worked hard to update the look and feel of the place along with the machines/equipment. There are programs for all ages. It's like a big family...a workout family!

name: Deanna Patterson
text: I love the southeast Y!!! The child care has been wonderful! My toddler cry's when she's away from me and now she walks in with a smile on her face and runs around!!!! Her baby sister loves the baby side as well!!! Love the classes and the gym! I've gained so much confidence about myself and how to actually workout since joining in on the classes!!!  Couldn't ask for a better place to hangout with my family 😀

name: Kendall Vining
text: Great family atmosphere. Newer cardio equipment. Constantly adding new equipment. Great for people wanting to get into working out and more experienced people.

name: alicia lund
text: Their after school program is horrible. Their councilors are more concerned with being on their cell phones and eating than actually paying attention to the children for a total of 3 hours. They left my child by herself on a soccer field, thank goodness she had her cellphone and could call me. I am appalled that this is acceptable behavior to their program director.

resp.text: Dear Alicia, I'm glad that we had the opportunity to talk today about your concerns with our Afterschool program. The safety of children in our care is of utmost importance to the Y. I do thank you for bringing your concerns to our attention. Our counselor should have ensured that your daughter was delivered to her soccer coach, and she was not. After reviewing our security camera footage, we did find that when your daughter was walked to the soccer field, the Southeast YMCA Sports Support Staff Member was present and other children were engaged with their coaches in soccer practice at that time (4:59 p.m.), but your daughter's coach was not present. At 5:03 p.m., a counselor walked your daughter back inside to her Afterschool group. At no time during this footage did we observe counselors or sports staff on their cell phones. We have taken appropriate action with the counselor involved and are reviewing our policies and procedures with all Afterschool staff to ensure that this does not happen again. We look forward to seeing your daughter again today for Afterschool care and thank you for allowing us to continue to serve your family.  Kind regards, Bev Snellgrove, District Executive Director, Southeast Family YMCA

name: Ian Kinner
text: Clean, well-maintained facility with many offerings. It gets busy sometimes, but it's never overcrowded.

name: Kenneth Lowe
text: Both of my sons were raised in the YMCA and they turned out to be very happy children and very smart and it is a christian-based program

name: adam michaelis
text: There was not a sign up Friday when I dropped my kid off at kid care, but soon returning 2 hours later. There where 2 signs posted. One was for scabies and some other disease that was i cannot pronounce in child care. When I went to pick her up the staff tried to say the sign was there the whole time when it was not. My child was due for surgery and if I saw the sign I never would have left her. A man at the YMCA called me denying to  me that there was never any signs.

name: Frederic Wells
text: The staff is nice, but they do not maintain their equipment, and when stuff breaks down, it takes forever to get it fixed.

name: Bob Fuller
text: Been going to this Y for 9 years and 17 overall around the country - love the family atmosphere and people who enjoy what the do and do that with excellence !

name: Mildred Drinkard
text: A wonderful place to make new friends and excellent instructors as well as  great classes.

name: Melissa Brandsmeier
text: This YMCA is extremely out of date. Their weights are all different brands. Some look like they are from a garage sale. It just seems really dirty. It looks like everything is donated. Really wish they would update this YMCA.

name: Karon McGill
text: Clean, well lit, no tv on the wall, no radio coming  thru the speakers interferring with my music ir thoughts. Friendly staff. Grear teachers

name: Albie Kruer
text: Good facility, just wish it was open later. Especially the weekends.

name: Barry Owen
text: Great place just wish they were open later

name: Lynn Bridges
text: Nice people great place to bring the kids

name: Jessie Langford
text: I love the YMCA

name: James Chaney
text: Good folks... Christian environment.

resp.text: Hi James, thanks for taking the time to leave a review, and we appreciate the kind comments. See you at the Y!

name: teresa White
text: Very clean work area and the changing area is very clean.  The people are friendly and call you by name.

name: Kieran Hill
text: I love the y

name: Bert Poston
text: Great staff and facility

name: Layken Lee
text: I’ve been a member at BBB since July 2020 and have loved every minute. All the staff is knowledgeable and alters the workouts to fit my body, strength and limitations. I love the atmosphere with only women there supporting and encouraging you. Def nice to feel comfortable always. The classes are always super fun but difficult and I love that there’s always laughter. If you’re a lady looking for a gym look no further! Join now! You won’t regret it!

name: kellie speer
text: I’ve been with Body By Brii for over a year now and I can honestly say that I have never felt more in tuned with my fitness. Brii not only provides a challenging workout but goes above and beyond in providing education in proper nutrition, meal plans, and living a healthy lifestyle to achieve maximum results. Her facility is clean, her clients are so friendly, and the atmosphere is upbeat and positive. You can choose group training, personal fitness, classes, or a combo package. Brii will work with you to build your perfect plan to meet your goals. I highly recommend Body By Brii for all of your fitness needs!!

name: Amanda Larson
text:
I have been a member of Body By Brii since January.  I can not recommend enough.  Brii is great to work with.  It is a female only gym.  Everyone is so nice, welcoming and very encouraging.   If you are looking for a great gym, with a great owner then look no further.

I have never seen a gym cleaner than this one, as well.  Brii strives to have a clean environment for all her clients and it shows.

name: Erika Watkins
text: Brii and her staff are absolutely fantastic at what they do! She genuinely cares for each of her clients and has created a welcoming, judgment-free zone for females of all shapes, sizes and fitness levels. I have used this studio since August 2019 and have been nothing but happy with my experience. The sweet puppy love after workouts is definitely an added bonus!

name: Laura Machen
text: I have been training at Body by Brii for over a year. She has helped me build the muscle I had been trying to on my own before joining. I love all the trainers there, as they each push my to be my best during a workout! The members of the gym are super great as well. I love how there’s so many different types of workout classes offered aside from weight training. 10/10 recommended!!

name: Marla Clinkscales
text: I have been a member of Body by Brii for over two years.  This was my first experience with belonging to a fitness center.  Added to my inexperience was the fact that I am over 50 which made me one of the older members.  Starting on my very first day the staff made me feel so welcome and comfortable as I navigated my first few months.  The instructors went out of their way to make certain that every workout  included low impact options until I could gain confidence in myself and in my fitness journey.  The studio is always spotless and the shower facilities are always clean and well maintained.  I can't recommend Body by Brii enough!  If you have thought about starting your own fitness journey this is definitely the place to begin.

name: Emma Cotney
text: I’ve been attending Body By Brii for only a few months but it feels like years!! The family atmosphere is amazing and the women there are so inviting, you feel apart of the BBB family your first group there. I can’t recommend this place enough for any woman in need of some exercise and female support in her life! Brii is one of the best trainers I’ve ever known and can meet you at whatever level you’re at!

name: Tiffany Webster
text: I cannot recommend this place enough! I started going to Body by Brii about 1.5 years ago. I honestly hated to work out before I joined, but knew I needed to get in better shape. Now, I LOVE working out and I am at the gym 5 days a week! I have seen fantastic results!! I love my Body by Brii family and am so glad I have them all in my life! Everyone is very friendly and we all encourage each other to keep pushing to the next level! All the trainers are great there, so you will not go wrong with any of them! There is a wide variety of classes! Something for everyone!  100% recommend!!

name: Christy Sharp
text: I have been going to Body By Brii since July 2020. I have lost 20 pounds and over 20 inches! Brii and her staff are knowledgeable, professional and so supportive. This is the only FEMALE ONLY gym in the area, and the atmosphere is like no other gym I've ever tried. Definitely recommend! Strong Women Lift Each Other Up!

name: B Sherer
text: I have been a member of Body By Brii since last year.  I am so thankful I found it.  Brii takes her business seriously.  The staff is very knowledgeable from a training standpoint and the gym is immaculate.  She supports her clients and I know first-hand she genuinely wants us to be successful In our quest to live a healthier lifestyle.

name: Shawn dela Merced
text: The doggies at this gym are honestly what brought me to it. I had just moved to AL from CA and was missing my best bud Porkchop, my 15-year-old lab who crossed the rainbow bridge just after I moved. I needed to meet people, I needed to get fit for my new roles as a wife and bonus mom, but I really needed interaction with dogs because they feel like home to me. The dogs are good-tempered and smell good, better than any sweaty human! I think it’s a great business model for a gym to have dogs present because it’s proven that animals especially dogs are beneficial to your health! Granted, if you don’t like dogs, then this isn’t the gym for you. (Note: You can’t complain about the dogs for how they are because 1) they are dogs and 2) you are on notice before signing up that the dogs will be present - just peer through the windows!) But join this gym if you are searching for a welcoming environment, fun instructors and members who don’t judge, and cleanliness/organization to the max (I’ve watched Brii walk across the entire gym to clean or adjust something that wouldn’t be seen by a non-meticulous eye). Hope to meet you soon!

name: Candice Kelley
text: I started attending Body by Brii at the first of the year and have really enjoyed it. All of the instructors are knowledgeable and very encouraging. Brii is a true professional and makes you feel so comfortable, no matter your experience level of working out. I would definitely recommend Brii for personal training, group training or any of the classes.

name: Starla Suttles
text: In March of 2020 due to COVID, the gym I belonged to closed.  I am a gym rat working out daily for years.  Obviously, I was extremely upset.  My Sister was a member of Body by Brii and suggested I contact Brii to see if I could participate in the on line zoom classes she was offering to members.  I am so thankful Brii graciously allowed me to participate.  I have been purchasing zoom classes ever since.  She has worked with me every step of the way.  I can't thank her enough for her kindness.  There are multiple classes to choose from with varying skill levels required.

name: Anna Nicholson
text: As this is a female only gym, it is the only gym that I have ever been to that I have felt totally comfortable working out. The staff is so supportive and extremely knowledgeable about all things fitness. Great/clean facility and group training and classes are awesome! Would totally recommend this place above all other gyms/fitness centers!!

name: Ashley Grainger
text: I have been a member of Body by Brii for over two years and I have loved my experience. Brii loves her clients and takes time to get to know them. She knew when I was having a bad night and made sure to check on me. Brii not only takes care of outside of our bodies, she takes care of the whole body inside and out. I love her workouts and the friendships I’ve made there.

name: Sherry Tilley
text: I started going to Body by Brii in January. I love it!!  It’s a female only gym and I feel very comfortable. Everyone has been so welcoming and it’s the cleanest gym I’ve ever been too. The classes and group training are awesome.

name: Lindsay Brogdon
text: I just joined Body by Brii a couple of weeks ago and I LOVE it!! My mom has been going for about a year and she looks FANTASTIC. I’ve never been part of a female only gym and I’m not sure if I’ll ever go back to a regular gym!!!  Highly recommend all the trainers and the atmosphere!!

name: Suzanne Brown
text: Absolutely love my workouts at Body by Brii! Brii is welcoming and she knows what she’s doing. Love the atmosphere there and would highly recommend any lady to give it a try!

name: Erica Howton
text: I’ve been personal and group training with Brii for 6.5 years now and have never seen the results I get working out with her by doing any other independent or gym exercising.  The studio is uplifting and empowering to women and there’s never repetitive exercise routines in the groups or personal training sessions so your guaranteed a one of a kind experience.  No matter what your fitness level is, there’s something for you at Body by Brii.

name: Heather James
text: I have been going to Body By Brii for a little over two months now!! I have had an excellent experience. All the trainers and classes are awesome!! If you have been thinking about coming to visit- please do!! Brii rocks!! 💪🏼🖤

name: Richard Elledge
text: I recently joined Body By Brii and I LOVE it!! The community is great!! Brii and all the instructors are all so encouraging and give great workouts!! I also love that it’s an all women’s gym!! It’s always nice and clean too!! Highly recommend ladies!!!

name: Tara Respinto
text: I joined a couple of months ago and love it. I feel so comfortable working out here and love that’s it’s all females. I have been to many gyms but never stayed long. The classes are so fun and the people are so nice!

name: Jillian Harig
text:
I’ve been at Body By Brii for about 7 months and I cannot recommend it enough!  I was never an athlete and never really worked out before besides walking on treadmills and jogging. I was totally new to this and unfamiliar and nervous when I started. Brii, Misty, and LaRanda are kind, professional, helpful, knowledgeable, and passionate about helping you meet your fitness old. The trainers make some challenging but great workouts, and they will always help you modify an exercise/weight station if you need it. I have done personal trainings, group trainings, and classes and love them all. I love the fact that it’s a female only gym. There is a huge feeling of camaraderie and sisterhood from day 1. All of the members have been friendly, encouraging, and wonderful to be around.
And THE DOGS!!! Brii’s dogs are precious and  well behaved and friendly. I am a dog person myself so I adore the dogs being there, but they also help you emotionally if you need it. Dogs are wonderful and intuitive animals and they can sense when you’re having a hard time! There’s been several times one of them had rested their head on my leg during an exercise and it was immediately calming and nice to pet a doggy after some hard reps!

I recommend Body By Brii to everyone I meet. It’s a fantastic gym that is clean, professional, and she’ll give you a killer workout. 5 stars all the way!

name: Lauren Green
text: I’ve never felt more at home at a gym than I do here! The people are great, the gym is clean, there’s puppies to love on and it’s a great value! BEST DECISION I EVER MADE!

name: Michelle Nivens
text: I adore the digital communication. She uses an app to schedule all your workouts and track your credits. It’s where we exchange messages and get information. Very tech savvy!!

name: Haley Raines
text: I’ve been with this gym for almost 2 years now. It’s the longest I’ve stuck with it consistently. Brii makes the workouts fun yet challenging. I’m the strongest I’ve ever been and reaching more and more goals. And the pups are a huge plus! Friendly and helpful when you struggle through one of the more challenging stations!

name: Michele Blankenship
text: I joined at the beginning of this year and have absolutely loved it. Brii and her staff are wonderful to work with. The classes are fun and you always get a great work out.

name: Elizabeth Smith
text:
Excellent staff with open and friendly communication.
Wide variety of classes and can be performed at any fitness level .  Love the encouragement  from both staff and members, fun place to work out and relieve some stress!!

name: Jenn Blackburn
text: I have been going to Body By Brii for a while now- I have had a great experience all around. Always clean, everyone is welcoming, all the trainers are awesome!!

name: Kelsey Baird
text: First gym I’ve felt so comfortable in!!! Staff and all members are so welcoming. Join and you won’t regret it!

name: Elyse Rawlins
text: I have been a client of Brii’s for 2 years (attending at LEAST once a week)! My husband is always wondering when I’m going to stop being sore! Brii works so hard to make sure our muscles never know what’s coming next! In two years, i have never done the same combination of strength training. She pushes you but also caters when you have an injury. Her cardio classes are routine based and I’m always over 400 calorie burn most of the time 500-600+ burn..... in one hour. Not only that but through the sweat we actually have fun. Brii has created a family environment of women supporting women- which is a breath of fresh air in and of itself. I have strengthened my mind, my body and my relationships by being a client of Brii’s. I will continue to support Brii and her studio for as long as my body will allow it. Her small business has thrived through “unprecedented” circumstances and that’s because of Brii and the culture she has worked hard to create. She is creative, innovative and she knows what the heck she’s doing! So proud of her and to be a part of her studio.

name: Angel Harris
text: Long time member of the BBB family....I highly recommend for fun and challenging workouts....choose from Personal training, Group training, or Classes.

name: Maite Miller
text: I've been a member at Body by Brii for more than 2 years. You won't find a more personalized gym or dedicated trainer. Brii and her staff work hard to give you the hardest workout you'll ever experience and help you meet your goals.

name: LaRanda Westbrook
text:
Great ALL female gym!
Clean! Clean! Clean! (Even before COVID)

name: ashley Wear
text: Great place to workout ! Brii is so helpful ! The best atmosphere !

name: Jessica Miller
text: My friend and I visited but were not impressed , she allows her dogs to roam free and they are not potty trained , urine smell was awful , also the shower area was filthy.  Just my own opinion but I would look elsewhere

resp.text: Considering I have never had a Jessica Miller come in for an orientation as I don't accept walk-ins and this account has NEVER left a review on any other Business I feel confident in saying this is someone hiding behind a fake name and google account just to leave a bad review. Please advice to the other 40 reviews as they are honest and factual.

name: RainaPuppies
text: Beautiful gym!!

name: Danny Williams
text: Man oh man I can’t begin to tell you how great Sean and his staff are at the path gym. They really care about you and your goals. Great structured workout by top notch instructor that really care about your well being.  I personally don’t think you could find a better gym.

resp.text: Thank you Mr Williams! It is a pleasure to train people like you. We appreciate you!

name: Remy Helu
text: Looking out for the little guy

name: David Eckman
text: I travel, and pay extra for a nation wide membership.   I’ve been in 15-20 ymca’s in the last year and they have all been gracious and accommodating.  This one must be special, because they will not accept my membership, and will not give me any option to use their facility.

resp.text: We regret that you were unable to visit our YMCA facility during the pandemic.  In order to protect our staff and our members, we are currently welcoming guests from Baldwin and Mobile Counties of Alabama only.  We will continue to monitor updated CDC guidelines as more people are vaccinated, as rates of COVID-19 change and as additional scientific evidence becomes available.

name: Recep Kuru
text: Good and friendly employees but they need to check some disgusting customers. The guy spit at floor in sauna like an animal when he did chewing a gum , I already reported him and they known him . I believe they kicked him out .

name: Ernest Kelly
text: Love Gina's Total Body Challenges classes at Bounds Family YMCA. I've been taking her classes for over a year now and am happy to say I look forward to them every week. It's always fun, high energy and you get a great workout! Gina's the best!

name: Karim Harzallaoui
text: Great gym, but if they would open at least at 14:30 would be awesome

name: Cody White
text: Clean facility, lots of options, and Karen is the absolute best up front!!

name: Wesley Williams
text: Really nice gym but it has the worst hours of any gym I've been to.

name: Local Guide
text: Great customer service and welcome desk. 2 pools one indoor and heated another outdoors. Exercise equipment. Several Stories. Family environment and safe. Child Care. Excellent facility.

name: A Boyd
text: I came in as a guest with my sister who is a member. Wanted to get a membership but wanted to try a class out first. We called the day before and asked what all we needed to bring for me to do a class with her. Was told all we needed was $10. I get there with $10 in cash and then I’m told “oh we don’t accept cash” which of course was not told to me on the phone. But it was fine my sister asked if she could just charge it to the card on file. Then she asks for my drivers license that I don’t have with me because I was never told that I needed to have it. All the while I’m trying to remain calm even though this is very annoying because I did everything right and called the night before and asked what I needed to have and NONE of this was mentioned. The woman at the front desk was extremely rude and said “well your sister is a member and should have known what you needed to have.” My sister has never brought a guest before and again WE CALLED AND ASKED and were not told any of this. It was very disgusting and embarrassing the way the woman was talking to us. Needless to say, I’m not getting a membership there anymore. This was very disappointing.

name: Rachel Tucker
text: The group fitness instructors are an exceptional team. They’re all phenomenal teachers and community builders. For me, they’ve made the difference in my experience at this YMCA. Otherwise, it’s a beautifully maintained facility. The mission of the organization and the way it’s run make membership well worth it.

name: The Connor and Jacob Channel
text: Pretty decent gym. Friendly atmosphere most of the time.  Lots of machines although it seems many of the treadmills have glitchy TVs. Wish the pool was open later on weekends and cleaner...especially the outside pool. Pool staff has been unwelcoming in the past. I know they are mostly kids but they should probably have some training in how to treat the kids they are watching. We've always liked the private swimming lessons experience and those instructors have always been excellent. We used to love the Kids Night Out program, but they've made it less conducive for our child who is not into socializing. I wish they had some kind of classes for beginners especially yoga. Administrative people are nice but don't seem to be on the same page with information. Cleaning attendants are friendly and always hard at work. Now that my children are 8 and 11 they do not feel comfortable going in the ladies dressing room which I totally agree with but I do not feel comfortable letting them go in the men's area because there is no privacy for them. I'm not comfortable with them being exposed to naked men or having to expose themselves. Probably a lot to ask for a kids dressing area or family room. There is a changing room/storage room by the pool but I think it's really just meant for storage. It would be great if they would post the status of the pool on Facebook or via text. It's kind of inconvenient to get there only to discover it is closed because of a distant rumble.

name: Yosef Aborady
text: They have horrible hours of operation. Wi-Fi coverage is so spotty and when you do have a connection it’s super slow there’s no cellular signal because it is a metal building. Staff are clueless and who doesn’t open until one on Sunday it’s absolutely ridiculous. My advice to anyone would be to go to planet fitness for the same type of atmosphere half the price only thing you’re missing out on is a pool.

name: James Spivey
text: Probably the best overall fitness facility in Baldwin county. I’ve tried several other gyms and nothing really compares to the selection of equipment. The staff is also very friendly and helpful! I thoroughly enjoy lifting and swimming here.

name: Jessica Ellis
text: Love the staff and instructors!

name: Erin Adkinson
text: Great selection of classes. Large and clean facility!

name: Ash ton
text: Very military friendly! If you're active military visiting the area, they will give you a free pass for the time you're here. I'd recommend this facility to anyone.

name: Adam Manning
text: Great facility and friendly staff.

name: CHARLES Harris
text: Awesome place to work out . stay fit. I love it , family fitness center.

name: Jessica Redditt
text: I use this gym as a visitor and have been very pleased with my experience. Both the staff and other patrons were friendly and helpful to this out-of-towner. I follow a pretty extensive powerlifting and body building program and this gym had almost everything I needed, including a weightlifting platform! I highly recommend!

name: Virtual KRMZEN
text: Amazing place to go and work out or just relax in the hottub or swim in the pool! Amazing staff members that are very nice! It's very clean! It's very big and has a lot of room! They have very clean equipment!

name: Jim g
text: Great place, much better than downtown. I wish they would post a sign at the entrance and then enforce 10 minutes maximum per machine, no checking emails and texting while lounging on the equipment, chatting and socializing, rather than actually using the weights. The weights are for everyone's use, and using them is what they should be doing. Check your emails, text, and take calls in the lobby area. Thanks for a great place to work out. More fans would be a plus.

name: Zachary Dinkins
text: One of the better gyms I've ever lifted at. Nice people there too. I never had a problem with them

name: Robert Holyfield
text: Seen worse. Very crowded

name: Troy White
text: Probably the dirtiest most disgusting gym I have ever been to. My high school locker room smelled better. I don’t think the men’s restrooms have ever been mopped or disinfected. I only see the attendant using a broom and dust pan to cleanup. Wiping off equipment is not enforced. I find all sorts of goodies in the pool (band-aids, lettuce 🤷‍♂️). My wife and I had to say goodbye to our long term membership a few months ago as we just can’t justify the cost of membership vs the amenities. AND the fear of staphylococcus or MRSA. I don’t know how they stay open from a health code standard.

name: Brian Brey
text: the people are great but the facility is not up to date. The people running scheduling the classes do a poor job to say the least. the instructors that run the classes are great.

name: Rob Whitsett
text: Great gym. Needs to have more maintenance performed on the equipment!!!

name: Betsy Smith
text: Friendly atmosphere, helpful staff, variety of classes.

name: Trina Swan
text: Plenty of equipment, no parking available during peak hours. Swimming pool is alway inaccessible due to swim leagues. Open for only a short time on weekends.

name: Bert Waller
text: Nice, large facilities and decent selection.

name: Paul Klutes
text: Okay gym, some good instructors, awful christian music, and a constant stream of Fox News.

name: Marissa Ann
text: really needs to stay open till 10 pm

name: Trent McManus
text: Needs to stay open until 10 pm everyday. Needs to get EzH20 water fountains with bottle fillers. Filling a water bottle with a standard water fountain takes ages and doesn't allow you to fill it all the way up because of the angle.

name: Marissa Gray
text: I completed the "exhausted to energized" program for the entire 28 days. I got great nutrition advice and guidance from Elliot. I felt like I truly got a custom fitted program to suit my lifestyle and body type. This program is a must if you need to kick start your journey to wellness. I am so thankful for everything I have learned and the welcoming "come as you are" environment. I also got great coaching on my form from taking classes with Jordan. The coaching alone is worth every penny.

resp.text: Thank you for the awesome review Marissa. We loved coaching you and having you as a member of the community!

name: Tabitha Eldridge
text: Live ready fitness is a great gym for beginners and professionals alike. The coaches are great at finding what works for you and offer the best advice whether it be something to do with nutrition or with an alternative work out. The environment is friendly and vibrant. The classes are hard work but worth it. I highly recommend to anyone ready to learn and put in work!

name: Cody Abbey
text: Elliot is an incredible coach. His knowledge, leadership, and mentorship will quickly assist anyone in ascending to the highest version of themselves. Anyone considering joining this program will join an environment that caters to the maximum growth of the mental/physical wellbeing of any individual!

resp.text: Cody thank you so much for the review. You help us to ascend to higher version of ourselves as well. Thank you again!

name: Lisa Fountain
text:
I met gym owner, Elliott Quinones, about 8 years ago. I was impressed with his knowledge and ability in the area of health and fitness. Elliott is all about community. He's played a huge role in helping me establish my non-profit, Scarlett's Closet . He's even a member of my board.
Last year, after attending one of the fundraisers Live Ready hosts for us annually, I saw pictures of myself at the event and realized I needed to take control of my life and be the healthiest version of Lisa I can be. I started doing workouts in my home and making better food choices. By May of this year, I'd lost 41Lbs, but the scales had stopped moving. I reached out to Elliott and he told me I was most likely in a calorie deficit.  I recall my response; I laughed at him. He encouraged me to sign up for  a "Love to Eat Challenge" Through this challenge, I was taught what to eat and how my plate should look. I am happy to report that I won the challenge and to date, I have lost 64lbs. I am wearing the smallest clothes I've ever worn as an adult. I recently had surgery and  Elliott has asked me to start training with him once my Doctor clears me to do so.  In the past, I would have said, "No way." Now, I have the confidence I need to accept the challenge.
If you are looking to make positive changes in your life, I urge you to contact Elliott and his team. They are not only the best at what they do, but some of the nicest and most encouraging people you will ever meet. You won't feel pressured or intimidated. I am grateful for all their help and encouragement. I've never felt better. Isn't it time you took the first step to a healthier you? call them today!
Lisa P. Fountain, Founder
Scarlett's Closet

resp.text: Thank you Lisa. We love and appreciate you very much and the entire staff could not be more proud of you.

name: Nina Fletcher
text: Upon arriving in Columbus, I was looking for a gym that would be mindful of past injuries and would help me build up to a healthy place.   Having been a gymnast I deal with a lot of neck issues and was worried I would not find a place that could help me work with through them. Thus, I spent a lot of time researching different options in the area and several individuals recommended Live Ready Fitness.  So I took a leap of faith and I scheduled a consultation.  I walked away feeling optimistic about their one-on-one approach.  I started working with Coach Elliott who has been instrumental in helping me make strides in my personal health journey. They have not only worked with my injury but also have shown me ways to make it better. Overall, I highly suggest you see Coach Elliott at Live Ready Fitness (or anyone of the amazing Live Ready staff!) if you are looking to make a change and interested in working with an all-star staff that provides the utmost competence!

resp.text: Thank you Nina! We appreciate you trusting us with your health. You are an All-Star client!

name: Fonda Board
text: I came from your regular “Globo gym", and let me tell you, I have never experienced a workout like this. It is challenging in the best way possible. Coach Elliott not only walked me through how to do every movement, but he also explained best nutrition practices, and taught me how to approach each workout with a purpose. The entire team and the community are so nice and were very welcoming. Since I’m coming to a new city with no friends that was very important to me. This has been an overall great experience.

resp.text: Fonda, we are so excited you allowed us to help you reach your goals and even more excited that you have a community of friends now!

name: Heidi Cummings
text: As someone who has worked in fitness for the last 8 years, I can say with confidence that Live Ready Fitness is the best gym in the Columbus/Phenix City area. Elliott has taken the time to become highly educated in all things fitness and nutrition, and he has built a professional, world class team of coaches around himself. Elliott invests in his employees, so that they can all collectively invest in their members. If you're in the area, do yourself a favor and try out Live Ready Fitness. Guarantee you won't regret it.

resp.text: Thank you for the amazing review. We are so lucky to have you as part of the team and community.

name: Chase Etheridge
text: This place will seriously get you in shape. I’ve lost 20 lbs and feel better than ever!

resp.text: Thank you Chase! We see the change in you and love it!

name: Rebecca Jungman
text: I waited to join Live Ready because the price of the gym is a little higher, but honestly after the first session, I realized they are worth every penny. The care and attention Elliott and his team give is unmatched. They truly care about every one of the people they work with. Oh and bonus the facility is amazing! I absolutely recommend joining this family, because that is exactly who you become to the coaches and fellow athletes.

resp.text: Thank you Rebecca. We truly appreciate our medical professionals and are honored to help take care of them because you all deserve it! Thank you again for being part of our community!

name: Stephanie Swoger
text: If you think that you are too injured to workout you are wrong. I have been recommended to have two knee replacements and a shoulder replacement (after one has already failed).  I was in constant pain. I had given up and being a former member of Live Ready and seeing all the new programs they had started I thought this is my last hope. Coach Elliott was completely honest with me and said there were no guarantees but he thought that he could help. After three sessions a week for the last month I already move better, see strength gains and my knees hurt significantly less. That is only outweighed by the fact that THIS TRULY IS THE BEST HOUR OF MY DAY. The coaches and community have so much care for one another it is inspiring. Everyday is new challenge but I am incredibly excited for what the future holds.

resp.text: Thank you, Stephanie Swoger. It is such a pleasure being able to work with you and seeing the amazing progress you have been making. The team and I are committed to getting you to your healthy happy place! Thank you again!

name: Stephanie Hawkins
text: Mom’s who don’t think they can do it, I am here to tell you that you can. I have twin toddlers, I was not eating enough food to keep my energy up throughout the day up and somewhere I lost myself. Coach Samantha and the Live Ready team changed that. After just a few sessions, my body started to change, my mood and sleep was so much better, and my confidence soared. My husband even noticed the change in me. I feel unstoppable and can do things for myself and my family that I didn’t ever think I could do. If you are hesitant and think it is not possible, SEE COACH SAMANTHA, she truly cares about her clients!Take back control of your life.

resp.text: Stephanie you are an inspiration to moms and people everywhere! Seeing that kind of change in someone fires us up!

name: Andrew Pate
text:
I will state that even know my time here was short. The staff of coaches are super supportive, knowledgeable, and dedicated to their team of clients.

Know that they have gone above and beyond in these difficult times. Providing continuous support and training with creativity.

Overall I would highly refer this gym to each and every individual I meet. You will not be disappointed.

Big Shoutout to Coach Sam, she is awesome. Very knowledgeable and has a keen ability to apply what’s most effective for any limitations you might have with your physical aptitude.

resp.text: Thank you Andrew. We are glad we could make an impact in such a short time. Please reach out if we can ever help you with anything!

name: Carli Culpepper
text: My knee pain was so bad I honestly thought I would never be able to do some of the things I loved again. It was affecting my workout, my job and my entire state of mine. Within 4 weeks of working with Coach Elliott and the Live Ready Fitness team I was pain free and back to living my life again. Elliott and his team are absolutely amazing. If you have joint pain go, see them!

resp.text: Thank you Carli! We are so happy we could help but it is is always so much easier when we have a fantastic client like yourself!

name: Sabrina Robertson
text: I was searching for something to help me get my weight under control and stumbled upon an ad for CrossFit Deprivation on Facebook. They were doing a 6 week challenge and that sounded like a great jump start. I worked with one of the coaches and she suggested just giving it a try. I did and I completely fell in love with the whole experience. The workouts were challenging but could always be modified to fit me and what I was able to do and they were always different. The community was so supportive and encouraging that I wanted to go back everyday for a new challenge. They helped me with nutrition and have taught me how to feel good by eating to fuel my body's performance and feeling good about how I look has been a pleasant side effect of trusting that process. I have gained confidence, motivation, strength, and friends. It's been 2 years now and I wouldn't want to go anywhere else. This place is like a second home and the people are like family. If you are a human and need help with health or fitness, this is the place to go! It's so much more than a gym! Give it a try and you will fall in love with it, too!

resp.text: Thank you Sabrina. You truly are such an impactful member of our community and have grown so much as well as helping us grow as coaches. Thank you again!

name: Kayla Brossard [Student]
text: Ya’ll I hated working out! And when I tried I would always feel some sort of pain in my knees and hips. I also always felt lost when I went to a gym. Elliott and the Live Ready team have changed my tune. Within 4 weeks my knee pain was gone. Not only that but, the workouts keep me interested and I feel so accomplished after. I can already see changes in my body as well! I am so excited to see what I can do and how I feel over the next few months. DO NOT WAIT. IT WILL CHANGE YOUR LIFE. #ConfidentAF #LiveReady

resp.text: Thank you Kayla! We had so much fun taking you through foundations and can't wait to see your progress in class!

name: Kurt F
text:
Excellent facility.  Staff is not only very knowledgeable, but extremely approachable you can feel that they care about your process just as much as you do.

My experience through the PT sessions was one of tailoring it to my ability and my schedule it didn’t just feel like some walk through you had to complete to get to the next level.

If your looking for a place to feel welcome and to be challenged, you’ve found the right place.

resp.text: Thank Kurt! We are so pumped to have you in classes and as a part of our community. Thank you for trusting us with your health, wellness and fitness. We look forward to crushing some goals with you.

name: Taylor Strawder
text: Hands down the best gym I’ve ever joined. I came to my first class a little over a year ago and was scared at first but the coaches work with every and anyone and they have made my experience with CrossFit AWESOME. The coaches always do their absolute best to make sure we are performing the movements correctly and most importantly safely. This gym has definitely taught  me I can do a lot more physically then I ever thought I could and I will forever be grateful for all the help from these amazing people!

resp.text: Thank you so much for the review Taylor! We will forever be grateful for the kind words. It is so awesome seeing your progress through your fitness journey and we all look forward to seeing you continue to kill it!

name: David Anderson
text: Elliott has a unique and elite approach to fitness. Whether your goals are general wellness or higher levels of performance Elliott and the other coaches will be able to accommodate. I have been to CrossFit gyms on 6 continents and I have never seen this model or been so catered to my needs. Elliott is a positive coach that has an understanding of each individual’s fitness goals and how you can achieve them. I am currently an athlete at CFD and cannot speak highly enough about the coaches or facility.

resp.text: Thanks David. We truly appreciate the review and love watching you absolutely crush it in and outside of the gym.

name: vicki ijames
text: I really respect the coaching staff with Crossfit Deprivation. They pay attention to safety and which is so important in Crossfit. If you have a pain or an injury, the coaching staff ensures that athletes are going to workout safely without further injury.  I appreciate coaching I've received and the personal attention to my injuries and training needs. The staff is cohesive and work together as a team and is such a welcomed experience!

resp.text: Thank you Vicki. Coming from an incredible athlete like yourself that means alot. We appreciate you!

name: Thomas
text: One of the most professional businesses.  Best coaches I have worked  with Sam and Jacqueline are awesome.  I give them 2 thumbs up👍👍

resp.text: Thomas thank you for that absolutely awesome review. We look forward to helping you crush all of your goals moving forward!

name: Thestayathomepawmom
text: This is an amazing gym and community! The coaches at the gym are there for you 110%, there is never any judgment, only people cheering you on and helping you be successful and reach your goals. You get a coach for life and Allison Shiver is my girl! She knows her stuff, is funny, kind and genuinely there for you. You not only get an amazing coach with her but a great friend. It doesn't matter your skill level this place will challenge you in the best ways! If you have any doubts go see coach Alli, she'll change your mind 😉

resp.text: Thank you so much for the love! We love being your coaches and friends for life.

name: Hillary Stamey
text: CrossFit Deprivation is the best gym that I have ever walked into. The positive attitude and sense of community is absolutely contagious. The staff and coaches are kind and attentive. They work along side you, encouraging you, and pushing you to reach your full potential. I decided to participate in a weight-loss challenge on a whim and have found a place that I have come to love. Put in the work and give it a chance, this place will change your life.

resp.text: Thank you so much Hillary. Working with clients like you changes our life as well!

name: Britney Moffett
text: I’m so glad I joined! I’ve never done Crossfit before and I love it because it feels like one big team/family. The workouts can be challenging, but that’s expected. The meal plan is something that I can definitely stick with and the team is so helpful. I will definitely continue after the 6 week challenge!

resp.text: Thank you for the review Britney! We are glad we could help and thank. you for being part of the family!

name: gregory walters
text: I love this place, it’s one of the best decisions I have made in a long time. The staff/coaches are amazing. Every workout gets broken down step by step before the start of every workout. All the coaches are super approachable and knowledgeable. Everyone gets treated with respect, and it’s a judgement free environment!

resp.text:
Thank you so much for this absolutely amazing review Gregory. We love having you as a part of this community and look forward to working with you. We work so hard because of people like you!

-CFD Team

name: D. Neely
text: I participated in the 6 week challenge and I loved every minute of it. The staff is very knowledgeable and motivated to helping you reach your goals.  Not only is the staff/trainers awesome the atmosphere is amazing and very positive. The members are just as encouraging and supportive. I would recommend this gym to any and everyone!

resp.text: Congrats on your 6 Week Challenge, Deej -- isn't it a great feeling? We're so glad you joined us. We hope to see you again soon! -Elliott Q, Owner

name: Emily Clymer
text: Seriously one of the best gyms I’ve ever been to! Super personalized and everyone is crazy friendly and supportive!

resp.text: Thank you Emily. You have been such an incredible addition to our community we feel like w should be thanking you!

name: Jayson Teague
text: This place amazing.  It is a real personable experience to work out here.  Every class time has multiple coaches that actually take the time to coach and not just watch you workout. I did the 6 week challenge there and became a member afterwards.  Great place and family.

resp.text: Thank you so much for the awesome review Jayson, though I think it should say I crushed the 6 week challenge there and stayed as a member. :-). We are so happy to have you as part of the community and we look forward to help you achieving your goals not only in fitness but in life! Keep on killing it and we look forward to seeing your progress!

name: Brian McNally
text: CrossFit Deprivation is a phenomenal Box with world class facilities and friendly and knowledgeable coaches. Coach Elliott's programming is top notch. My fellow athletes and I are consistently improving our form, strength, and mastery of the more complex skills. Our Box is very family friendly and you will not find a better facility, available classes, and programs for the price!!!

resp.text: Thank for the great review! You will always be a part of the CFD family.

name: Avery Mclean
text: I just finished my 6 week challenge and I have nothing but amazing things to say about this gym. When the coaches say trust the process that could not be more sound advice. It doesn't matter if this is your first time in the gym or if you are athletic they will treat you with dignity and respect every moment. I am excited at my progress and I can honestly say Deprivation is worth your time. The coaches are helpful and very knowledgeable and can fine tune a plan that will help you reach maximum success! If you haven't signed up you are missing out!

resp.text: Thank you so much for the awesome review! We absolutely loved working with you and thank you for allowing us to be your guides on this fitness journey!

name: Johran Bethea
text: I did the 6-week challenge. Crossfit Deprivation is a wonderful place. The coaches keep you motivated and are very attentive and knowledgeable. They also break down every excercise step by step before the workout so you know exactly what to do and provide plenty of modifications for people of all fitness levels.

resp.text: Thank you Johran. You are a wonderful client!

name: William Kinsey
text: I was traveling to Columbus and did a drop in at Crossfit Deprivation.  It was a fantastic experience.  Coach Daniel was the 5:30am instructor and he was outstanding.  He made me feel welcome and was very attentive during the workout by giving me tips to improve my form/performance.  I really appreciated this.  The box is amazing.  It is very large and has a lot of equipment.  I travel to Columbus quite a bit on business and have worked out at other gyms in the area.  Crossfit Deprivation is by far the best.

resp.text:
