Jeff Finley

name: Roy Jones
text: Great gym great staff and clean

name: Sonya Franklin
text: Clean, nice staff and great equipment

name: Austin
text: Scamming people is immoral and fraudulent.

resp.text: Hi Austin! We see where you were a member back in 2016, but ran into an issue with your account. We'd love to work with you, get you back into the club, and help you reach your fitness goals. If we can be of assistance, please email us at customerservice@24ehealthclubs.com

name: Lauren Faustmann
text: The don't have wifi when the manager is not working so unless you like staring at black walls don't join!

name: Shannon Magers McNamee
text:
I attended the Huntsville Adventure Boot Camp For Women several years ago and loved every minute of it. I stopped attending because of a move to Birmingham. (I’m hoping one day Joe and his family will relocate! :0) ) I never found a great boot camp in Birmingham and ended up joining a gym, but never felt the support and accountability I did while attending HABC. After the pandemic hit, I didn’t feel comfortable going back to the gym and still don’t. Luckily I saw one of Joe’s posts about his online workouts and I signed up right away. I love these online workouts! They are 30 minutes, 4 times a week and so thorough. I feel like I get a great overall workout. Joe takes the time to explain each exercise to make sure you are doing it correctly and gives options for all fitness levels. He also checks in with you to offer support and answer any questions you may have.
If you are looking for a fresh, healthy start - contact Joe today. He’s got a program that will be able to help.

resp.text: Thank you so much for the awesome review Shannon! I'm very grateful to have the opportunity to work with you again.

name: Claire Aiello
text:
I love Huntsville Adventure Boot Camp for Women. I've been going for several years, and it's given me a whole new outlook on life, health, and exercise. Joe Martin is positive, upbeat, and has a daily joke for us (we sometimes laugh) - but the important part is, he keeps us motivated and we motivate each other.

If you don't have your health, you don't have anything. Really! You have to take time for yourself and keep fit.  Or you can't take care of anyone else. Take this time out for yourself -- you are worth it!

Also, if you're hesitant to join because you might think the class is like a "military-style" boot camp, it's not. It is doable and fun.  Every day is different. You'll make some of the best friends, too.  We all support each other -- come join us!

resp.text: Thank you so much Claire! I am now going to hire you to do my marketing :) Because you nailed it! Lift each other up, offer encouragement, and move forward together.

name: Hillary Dunham
text: Huntsville Adventure Boot Camp is absolutely a breath of fresh air for workout plans. If you want to be surrounding with people who are real, funny, encouraging and kind, this is the best place for you! Joe will always  bring relentless positivity and constantly offer different ways to keep your body moving. No crazy diets, no fads, just simple and effective ways to keep moving without feeling bad about whatever place you are currently in. You will not regret any time spend at Boot Camp with friends and with Joe. It's a great investment in yourself and I'm so glad I made it!

resp.text: Thank you so much Hillary! When gingers combine forces amazing things happen :)

name: Kari Fox
text: Huntsville Adventure Boot Camp is the best! It’s is well suited for any age woman of any fitness level. Joe offers many convenient times, he is great at keeping me motivated and he is loads of fun! I’ve been participating for a year and can definitely tell a difference in my muscle tone and energy level. I highly recommend it!

resp.text: Thank you so much Kari, I appreciate you!

name: Elizabeth Riggle
text: I came across information on Huntsville Adventure Boot Camp & Joe Martin at a time when I was frustrated and stressed with changes that Covid had created in my life.  I was eating my way through it & not exercising.  I decided to give the program a try.  Great decision!  Joe offers virtual workouts which is great.  He does them live, but also sends you a link, so you can do them at a time that is convenient for you.  You have no excuse not to do the workout.  He designs workouts for all fitness levels.  He demonstrates options for the exercises for beginners to those wanting a challenge.  In the past I would get bored exercising & end up quitting, especially at holiday time until this year.  I started in June & have stuck with it.  Joe is a wonderful coach who truly cares & wants to help you become a healthier & happier you.  He sends several emails a week filled with encouragement & motivation.  If you are struggling let him know & he will work with you.  He is always willing to answer questions about nutrition & exercise.

resp.text: What an awesome review Elizabeth, I am blown away! Thank you so much

name: Magen Sanders
text: In the past have been guilty of never sticking with a program or workout. However, with Joe's boot camp I have stayed inspired! Everyday is a different workout that keeps my body from getting too fatigued and my mind alert. The ladies at the classes should also be noted as welcoming and great proof that this is an uplifting community of people who care about health and well being. Thanks Joe!

resp.text: Thank you so much Magen! And you nailed it. The ladies in the class are what separates us from other gyms. Stronger together, all are welcome!

name: Annie Phillips
text: I have been attending HABC for about a year and a half, and it is one of the best things I have ever done, both for my physical and my mental health. Joe Martin leads us through our exercise with warmth and fun and fellowship. If you can't do a certain exercise the traditional way, he offers alternatives for your needs. I have met so many wonderful women who I call friends, and Joe is a dear friend now too. Do something life-giving for yourself in 2021 and join us!

resp.text: The gift that keeps on giving! Like the Jelly of the Month Club :) Thank you so much for the kinds words Annie, it is definitely more than just an exercise class.

name: Amy Slamp
text: If you are woman looking for a great place to work out with other women and a fun and inspiring leader, this is the place for you.  Joe Martin makes  doing a workout at 5:30 am something you want to get up for.  I have developed some great friends I would not have gotten to know otherwise, and every day Joe shares a funny "Dad" joke so what better way to start your day.

resp.text: So grateful you are a part of the HABC Family Amy!

name: Patti Blacklock
text: Joe Martin's Huntsville Adventure Book Camp for Women is a great option for women of all fitness levels to get in shape physically and nutritionally. The boot camps are fun and challenging, and Joe, along with my fellow boot camps, offer encouragement and motivation that keeps me working toward my fitness and nutrition goals so that I am as healthy as I can be.

resp.text: Thank you, Patti it has been awesome having the opportunity to work with you for so long. Here's to many more years together!

name: Donna Van Berkom
text: Joe is an excellent trainer.  He gives various options depending on your workout level.  Exercises are geared towards total body workouts, balance and cardio.   Joe helps you set your goals and meet them.

resp.text: Thank you so much for being a part of the Adventure Boot Camp family DVB! I'm so glad I get to work with you again even if we can't meet face to face.

name: Joy Wiseman
text: Changing lives one burpee at a time! Seriously the most fun workouts I have ever done! Joe is motivating and the other ladies very supportive. You will not regret joining, even with squats and burpees... 5 more seconds and funny dad jokes!

resp.text: Thank you so much Joy! Burpees have been banned by the CDC, so we should be ok going forward :)

name: Chelsea Bell
text: I’ve lost 50lbs in 7 months following Joe’s program! Huntsville Adventure Bootcamp provides me an effective program, tips/tricks for changing my bad habits and I actually look forward to working out every day.

resp.text: So proud you Chelsea! You have done amazing and you continue to get better. Keep up the great work!

name: amy burnette
text: I have been going to Huntsville Adventure Boot Camp, for over a year now and by far the best place to workout for women. The atmosphere is so welcoming, supportive, encouraging, motivating, and positive. The workouts are always different, so you never get bored and have something to look forward to each time. Your fitness level doesn't matter, Joe incorporates a way for all to benefit whether your just beginning your journey or needing a challenge. I drive over thirty minutes one way to attend and love every minute of Huntsville Adventure Boot Camp. HABC is not like other gyms, in that it gives you a sense of family. Highly recommend!

resp.text: Thank you so much Amy! I'm so proud of how far you've come since you started. You are a rock star!

name: Kristine Maness
text: It’s more than a great workout. It’s a great support system. I’ve met some of my closest friends here. Joe is the BEST cheerleader/trainer. He encourages and supports us in everything, both inside and outside of class. Can’t imagine not having HABC as part of my life.

resp.text: You just pretty much wrote out my mission statement for me! Thank you so much, I can't imagine HABC without you.

name: Wendy Smythe
text: HABC is a great place to workout and make life long friends.  Joe always has a positive and encouraging attitude and philosophy and gladly welcomes all who strive to get healthy and feel better.  Exercises and programs can be adapted to meet individual needs that provide results for everyone who participates.  I highly recommend it.

resp.text: Thank you so much Wendy, I really appreciate the kind words! All are welcome at the house of awesome :)

name: Gay Schill
text: Joe got me moving again!   Great workouts understands limitations and works with you.  I could barely get up off the floor now i am getting stronger day by day and was able to get up today after only a week without so much pain.  So thankful I have found him!

resp.text: I'm so thankful you started too! Stronger every day :)

name: Claudinette Purifoy-Fears
text: One of the best decisions I ever made. The workouts can be modified to accommodate fitness level. Love working out in the company of positive and uplifting women. Going on year 9!

resp.text: Thank you Claudinette! I really appreciate your loyalty and commitment after all these years. You are awesome!

name: Laura Lynn Hardy
text: Very welcoming atmosphere! Structured workouts that can be varied to your ability and strength level. Joe is a great coach and motivator. I've kicked things up for myself in a way that I would not do on my own at a gym.

resp.text: Thank you so much Laura Lynn! Keep up the great work.

name: Jess R
text: Just beginning but so far HABC has been great. Great workouts that aren’t daunting, no high pressure to be perfect or already in great shape, customizes each exercise to benefit ladies at all fitness levels, friendly environment. I can feel it working already. Highly recommend.

resp.text: Thank you so much Jess, so glad you started coming!

name: Leigh Holeman
text: Huntsville Adventure Boot Camp for Women is awesome! Joe is a good leader who really cares about you. The workouts are excellent, and are always new and different - you won't get bored here! Highly recommended.

resp.text: Thank you so much No E! So glad you are part of the HABC family.

name: Tory Green
text: Huntsville Adventure Boot Camp for Women has been a real game changer for me.  Joe is a patient and kind trainer who actually makes exercise fun.  I have made life-long friends in this class as well.  Sign up!  You won't regret it.

resp.text: Thank you so much Tory! Life-long friends and buffness. What more could you ask for? :)

name: Cairenn Martin
text: Women of all ages can benefit from Adventure Boot Camp.  Joe makes exercising fun! He is also very knowledgeable about physical fitness so his sessions are well balanced for strength and cardio. I highly recommend Huntsville Adventure Boot Camp!

resp.text: Thank you so much! I hear the owner's mom is the BEST.

name: Ashley Gray
text: HABC is the only exercise program I have stuck with and actually look forward to going to! Joe is the best coach! He offers a variety workouts for all fitness levels, and believe it or not makes the workout FUN! If you enjoy hanging out with a group of women (and one man) who are getting up before the sun or showing up after a long day because they are motivated to just be better, HABC is where you belong!

resp.text: You guys make it fun for me! I take it as a huge honor that people take an hour out of their day to spend at HABC. And I hear people there wear the coolest shirts.

name: Deborah Holt
text: I absolutely love this exercise program. Joe Martin is an incredible person who truly enjoys helping others with exercise and making the healthier food choices; and his daily jokes are hysterical.

resp.text: I am blessed to be able to do what I do for a living. I love it! And thank you for recognizing the hilarity of the jokes, I work really hard on them :)

name: Laurali Hollister
text: I am a big fan of Joe's bootcamp.  His knowledge keeps you exercising no matter what kind of issue you might have.  You control how strenuous you want to work out and there's lots of laughter, fun and encouragement from your fellow bootcampers.  When I can be consistent I'm in great physical shape.

resp.text: So glad to have you back Laurali! You're a big part of making that laughter happen. And not just because you talk to yourself :)

name: Ashley DeHaye
text: Joe works hard to keep fitness accessible and make workouts not boring. He also genuinely cares about the people he works with and will always go the extra mile to make sure they are successful.

resp.text: Thank you Ashley! I really appreciate you being part of the HABC family.

name: Wendy Hnetynka
text: Coach Joe Martin is truly committed to the overall fitness and well-being of his boot campers. The atmosphere is always fun, friendly and encouraging. The workout routines are never repetitive. They are designed to encourage consistent participation by keeping you entertained and motivated. Great music, friendships and even a joke of the day!

resp.text: Thank you so much for the great review Wendy, you are awesome!

name: Elena Aiello
text: Fantastic program! I've been doing this for a year and it's changed my life for the better. It's changed my view on exercise/fitness - which should be fun, not something you dread. Huntsville Adventure Boot Camp is fun - I look forward to going every day. Joe Martin makes it different and challenging. No day is ever the same. He's the best -- and the ladies are wonderful. We all support each other and you do things at your level. If you feel like challenging yourself, go for it. Joe will give you different levels to try for each exercise. He's awesome and very supportive. You will be supported by everyone there.

resp.text: Thank you so much! You nailed a lot of the things I hold near and dear to my heart about boot camp. We are family!

name: Susan Presley
text: Joe is a great motivator and even starts each class off with a joke. He keeps the classes fun.

resp.text: Thank you so much Susan! And the joke is ALWAYS hilarious.

name: Mary Ottman - Leadership Speaker & Certified Coach
text: Joe is a fantastic trainer.  I couldn't do one ONE push-up when I started, and he never made me feel like I was "behind" the rest of the class.  He is always super supportive and has a wealth of knowledge and ways to modify exercises to your skill level.  Newbies train next to serious exercisers, and everybody feels like they are part of his tribe.  His wife and his mom both come to some of the classes too, and that makes it a cool family vibe.  He plays great music and he is always super positive.  In addition, he lets us know about local exercise events and we have the opportunity to be part of his team, helping the community, i.e. the Liz Hurley 5K.  Everyone is welcome to join in.  Another huge plus is that the ladies in the classes are SO friendly and supportive!! It truly is a tribe of supportive women (and Joe!) who want to be the best versions of themselves! I couldn't recommend this boot camp any higher! It is awesome!!! 💗💕💖💗💕💖

resp.text: Thank you so much Mary! It was your hard work that made it happen. Proud to call you my friend!

name: Donna Baughn
text: I didn’t know what to expect when I signed up for a month of boot camp. After not exercising for years I was not in any shape to flip tires or push a sled. But that wasn’t what it was like at all. Joe gives me modified versions of the exercise when I need it based on my fitness level. I never feel like I can’t do something but I am amazed daily at how much more I can do since starting boot camp. Best part is that exercise is now part of my daily life and I look forward to boot camp each and every day because each day is different.

resp.text: Thank you so much for the great review Donna! I can't imagine having class without you now, you rock star you.

name: Marie Ferguson
text: Don't let the words "Boot Camp" scare you.  It's fun, challenging, inspiring and just an all around good time.  You will meet an amazing group of women who will do anything to keep you and each other motivated.  They make me laugh every day.  Joe scales the work outs for every level of fitness.  When I first started I couldn't imagine how everyone was doing the exercises and carrying on a conversation, now I'm cutting up as much as anyone.  Probably the most fun you can legally have at 5:30 in the morning.  Give a try, you might just love it!!

resp.text: You are a big part of why it is fun and inspirational Marie, so glad you are a part of the boot camp family!

name: Erina at Work
text: You will not find a nicer, more dedicated fitness coach than Joe Martin and these boot camp sessions are not only very effective but they are a lot of fun. Joe is truly committed to helping women meet their health and fitness goals but he understands it's important to do it with humor and humility.

resp.text: Thank you so much for the great review Erina! It is always fun to work with you.

name: Heather Thacker
text: If you want to get stronger, leaner, feel better AND laugh your head off, this boot camp is for you.  Joe Martin is the leader of this crew and is the best in his field.  All ages and sizes were in my classes and everyone loved it!

resp.text: Thank you Heather, that is very kind of you!

name: Jessica Burton
text: Joe is amazing! He genuinely cares about everyone! His workouts are always different and creative. His jokes are great too!! I definitely would recommend Huntsville Adventure Boot Camp.

resp.text: Thank you so much Jessica, so glad you are a part of the HABC family!

name: Crystal Hanson
text: I began hoping to complete a month. 18 months later I'm still at it! I've been encouraged, cheered for, welcomed at whatever fitness level I am at. If I'm absent, I'm missed. I've never had more fun getting healthy! I love this program! And Joe is one of a kind!

resp.text: Thank you so much Crystal! It has been awesome seeing you continue to improve, actually enjoy exercise, and learn more about music from you :) Keep up the great work!

name: Kimberly Widner
text: Best health decision I have ever made! Joe has created an environment that is welcoming, supportive and challenging. I have never enjoyed exercising but Joe makes it fun!

resp.text: I'm so thankful for your review Kim! That is my goal in life, to get people enjoying exercise. Thank you for being a part of the HABC family!

name: Becky Phillips
text: Best decision Ive made regarding my health! Its a go at your own pace class in a group setting.  Everyone is so encouraging and fun to be around.  Joe Martin is a great instructor, always switching things up and keeps it fresh and always good for a laugh.  Thank you Huntsville Adventure Boot Camp!

resp.text: Thank you so much Becky! You have done and continue to do amazing. Grateful to have you as a client!

name: Joanne Long
text: Fun, fabulous and uplifting. Getting healthy and making friends at the same time, completely non threatening since it's all women of different ages shapes and sizes, except Joe of course, but he came to the dark side a long time ago and can easily manage to not lose his cool when talking about sweaty female parts!

resp.text: Thanks for the great review Joanne! I think...

name: Patty Sykstus
text: Joe is the best!  Very motivating and supportive!

resp.text: Thank you so much Patty, you are awesome!

name: Functional Chiropractic
text: If you are looking for a great fitness option, then Joe Martin and his team at Adventure Bootcamp is the right place to go.  I have been involved in several of his workouts and know that they are not only effective and fun, but also easy to jump into at every level.  Highly recommend you check out his website or call Joe Martin to get signed up.

resp.text: Thank you Dr. Porter, really appreciate the kind words!

name: Leigh Anne McMahon
text: HABC offers up an inclusive and safe environment for women on all fitness levels and ages to get up, get moving, get stronger, get results.  Joe's program has made all the difference for me, helping me get leaner and making me a much stronger runner.  He is relentlessly positive and does an excellent job of keeping things fresh and interesting.  You won't meet a better group of women to exercise with and get support from either.  Five stars, without a doubt!

resp.text: Thank you so much LA! You're the bee's knees :)

name: Marie Held
text: Wonderful way to get your daily exercise in.

resp.text: Thank you Marie, so glad you are a part of that daily exercise!

name: Erina Galloway
text: If you don't like going to the gym (me) and really enjoy being outside (me) this is the boot camp for you. It's fun without losing the challenge of getting in shape. You are driven and pushed but through laughter and motivation, not just from the fearless leader (Joe) but the many amazing people you will encounter.  Do yourself a favor and try it out, you won't regret it!

resp.text: Thank you so much for the great review Erina, you are awesome!

name: Brianne Oleson
text: Fun and great place to get your workout on!!

resp.text: Thank you so much Brianne, so glad you are a part of the boot camp fam!

name: Nancy Smith
text: Want to change your way of working out? Come to HABC with Joe Martin! It is a fun and effective workout - just show up, do what Joe says (if you can hear him over the gossip and giggling - LOL) and give it all you got. Wonderful group of ladies and Joe's got jokes!

resp.text: The jokes are so hilarious! I can't stress enough how hilarious they are. Thank you so much Nancy, you are a rock star.

name: Monica Sanford
text: Joe is amazing!  His classes are fun but you still get a great workout.  If you're sitting in the fence and wonder if you should try HABC...wonder no more.  Just do it!

resp.text: Thank you for the 5 start review Monica! And that is great advice for getting started with HABC.

name: Vickie Blacklock
text: Get to exercise with old friends and new. Diverse and challenging workouts that are different everyday. Great for mind, body and soul! Thanks Joe!

resp.text: Thank you for the 5 star review Vickie!

name: Aquita Wherry
text: Great motivator! Work outs are fun whether indoors or out.  Great knowledge and great fun

resp.text: Thank you for the great review Aquita!

name: Kellie Andrews
text: Joe Martin creates a challenging workout experience with fun and encouragement and new friends. If anything is holding you back from getting healthy, you should give Boot Camp a try. It's a party with friends where you get fit!

resp.text: Thank you for the great review Kellie! I really like your description of our classes  too :)

name: Jade Gann
text: Joe is awesome!!!

resp.text: Thank you Jade! Takes awesome to know awesome.

name: Sherri Stroud
text: Joining an exercise program can be daunting, joining a "Boot Camp" is terrifying...until you find Huntsville Adventure Boot Camp!  Joe Martin is more than a boot camp instructor, he is a personal trainer, nutritionist and a friend to all his clients. He offers a program that suits all fitness levels and all age ranges and somehow manages to be crazy fun!

resp.text: Thank you so much Sherri! Exercise doesn't have to be misersable to be effective. Looking forward to more awesome with you in the future!

name: Eula Pugh
text: Huntsville Adventure Boot Camp is a great place to get into shape, loose weight and be around encouraging women while you are on your healthy lifestyle journey.

resp.text: So proud of how far you have come Eula, you are doing awesome!

name: Vicky Mathis
text: Fun and exciting workout that doesn't feel like work at all - until you feel the burn later!!

resp.text: Thank you so much for the kind review Vicky!

name: Rena Strange
text: Awesome Boot Camp!  Great atmosphere, professional support, fun way to get in shape.

resp.text: Thank you so much for the great review Rena!

name: Marcie Lewis
text: I have been doing boot camp for 10 years and I cannot say enough about how much I love it!

resp.text: Boot Camp OG! So glad you are still coming after all these years :)

name: Amanda Pope
text: Such a great way to workout - it is FUN, not work!

resp.text: Thank you so much Amanda! Exercise doesn't have to be miserable, so glad you enjoyed the workouts.

name: Junior Pruitt
text: Since Jesse has taken charge,  things have greatly improved and I'm looking forward to seeing great things at this location.

name: Corey Johnson
text: Joined this gym a few months ago and it's very convenient,  clean, and it's not a hassle to get in touch with management if I need to. Would def recommend to anyone who is looking for a more so small gym that's not too noisy and with friendly members!!

name: Sherri Wallace
text: The new manager Rodney has FIXED all of my billing issues! After trying to cancel my membership for a whole two months, the new manager has totally fixed everything, reassured me that it will never happen again & gave me a complimentary 2 free months

name: McKenzie Bates
text: One of the best gyms that's close to my house

name: Michelle Constance
text: I had a membership at Calera Snap Fitness for probably about a year. Management is very poor at communicating, taking care of equipment, and canceling your membership when requested. I canceled my membership in May of 2020 and still got billed for June, July, and August. I had to put a stop payment on my account and they changed their merchant name so they could start billing me again. I am not the only one this was done to. Since my email in May I was also contacted two other times about my membership and needing payment. I reiterated that my account should already be canceled and they proceeded to tell me it is now canceled but do not mention a word about my refund.

name: Kristina Stephens
text: This gym is horrible. If I could give it negative stars I would. Initially I had to drop by several times for someone to be there for me to join. I should have known then that this was a terrible establishment.  I've been trying to cancel my membership since March and yet I can't get in contact with anyone to do that. I've called and left voicemails and even emailed with no response. I'm simply fed up. On top of that half the machines didn't work and the cable was off half the time. Don't waste your time or money here.

name: Fabio Alnaham
text: The WORST membership you will EVER subscribe to . This is highway robbery and for many reason . The employees were rude on the first day I went to get my membership. Also I've been stuck with a membership that I've been trying to cancel for more than a year now. I have attempted EVERYTHING to try and get in contact with them to cancel it. I have left countless voicemails with all my contact information and I have not been contacted at all. I have went in person and no one was even there. The point is they take your money and avoid you at ALL costs from trying to get it cancelled. Its not just me that had this issue but two other friends as well. I highly do not recommend this gym at all . Any other gym is wayyyyy better then this. Save your money and save yourself some headaches and look somewhere else.

name: Joey Thomason
text: Purchased membership online. Have not been able to get into the gym once. Door is locked. Apparently the water has been cut off, the staff has all quit, the  phone doesn’t work, and the owner has been AWOL for months. I’ve paid for a membership and am literally unable to use it or cancel it. Going to charge back the original payment and block any future payments.

name: Anna Hopson
text: For a “24-7” gym... THEYRE NEVER OPEN!!!

name: joe cox
text: The new manager Pamela has turned this place around. We stopped going to this location while ago because it was filthy and dark. Now she has cleaned everything spotless and much brighter. She also enforces that everyone entering must be a member. Really like the new atmosphere. From 1 star to 5 star. Recommend

name: NaturalBornSpartans
text: Mis-managed hot garbage

name: janny leson
text: They will not fix broken equipment. Manager has a BAD attitude problem (a lot of people talk about this all the time). She has smart attitude with employees and its sad to act that way in front of customers. We all see it regularly. How do you even have a job lady?

name: karen tortorigi
text:
Can not recommend this location as long as the manager (Karen) is still there.
I called and spoke with her to cancel membership in May said she would.
DID NOT HAPPEN. My bank acct was charged 30.00. Called back left VM and email. NO RESPONSE. I have had issues before I cancelled of her not responding to my emails or VM said she was having trouble with emails what about VM pretty sad if cant get to the MANAGER.
I have another 30.00 charged for July so I'm trying to get my money back .
Called CORPORATE

name: Alison Boothe
text: I have only been a member since February 2018 and out of all the gyms I've been apart of I've never been treated so special as I am at this Snap Fitness.  Miss Pamela, Snap Fitness Calera, AL gym manager always says hello and makes me feel special! I have met so many nice people!  A huge thank you and appreciation to Rick Anderson, Snap Fitness Calera, AL Personal Trainer for without his guidance, positive enthusiasm, and extensive knowledge and experience i couldn't have lost the so far 40 lbs since I joined the gym in February.  The members and staff make this gym by far the best gym I've ever had the pleasure to be a part of!

name: Lindsey Davis
text:
The facility it's self is nice enough not exactly clean but its a gym....  the staff is awful, other members of the gym showed me equipment, how to use the key pass, and tanning bed.
the hours they have posted of the website mean nothing I had to call 3 times between 9 - 11 before I could get someone to answer. The women there, pamela could not answer any of my questions without asking "the guys" I assume she meant management or perhaps an owner and when I requested to cancel my membership she insisted that I come to the location. When I made her aware that it wasn't possible for me to get there or even leave my home she was persistent in finding out why as if it was any of her business and still refused to cancel my membership after calling 5 times in a month I eventually had to cancel my credit card to keep them from charging me.

name: Chanda Mitchell
text: I live it except for the darn music they play. Great selection of workout equipment, kept clean, nice employees,   and quiey. Just horrible music

name: James Jackson
text: Friendliest staff and cleanest gym you will ever visit with lots of cardio and strength training options!

name: Danny Barbee
text: I have called several times to inguire about joining. Voicemail says someone will return call within 24 hours. Never happened! Went there yesterday and only one person was there and he wouldn’t even come to the door. I guess they don’t need any more members. My guess is this place will not be in business much longer.

name: Gary Johnston
text: Nice and quiet place to work out.

name: Tommy Harris
text: Never really crowded. The work out equipment may have problems from time to time, but they do their best to fix them.

name: Melissa Martin
text: The place has went down since we join alot of stuff needs to be fixed. Ask for another key and been waiting  a month and also the workout  room has not work for a year

name: C S
text: I have been trying to cancel my membership for the past month and a half. I do not live in the area anymore and was not able to come to the location. After countless phone calls and leaving voicemail after voicemail (which prompts I will be called back within 24 hours) I finally called during the magic time to reach an employee to cancel. If you want to cancel your membership and you cannot visit the location be prepared to be charged 2 months worth of membership fees before you actually reach someone.

name: Nathan French
text: Can not get my membership cancel I have tried three times to Cancel my membership every time I go to cancel the tell me my membership is at another branch. Poor customer service all they want to do is overcharge people.  I would never recommend gym.

name: Mohamed Elnaham
text: I haven't been in calera for more than 2 months, I try to call them to cancel my member ship, or do something about it, because I'm been charged while I'm not even there, this the second month I'm been charged by this gym, every time I call they won't answer, I went there the other day to talk to someone, and there was no body at all around 11am, now I'm calling around 3pm and still no body to talk too! I need help

name: Luke Moore
text: I’ve tried multiple times to cancel my membership, each month continuously charged.

name: Nia Marie
text:
Horrible customer service they are only open about 3 hours during the day and do not answer the phone when it is business hours
I have tried to cancel my membership in October the woman I spoke to told me it was cancelled and I didn’t have to sign anything just gave her my information 3 months later and I’m still being charged and no one answers the phone I’ve contacted customer service and they haven’t answered me either

name: Dan Compton
text: One day at a time

name: Karol Patras Layton
text: Great place to workout

name: Bratton McGregor
text: Paid for swimming lessons for my 4 year old. The instructor is great and the staff has been wonderful. However it’s 100% f ing ridiculous you have a indoor pool with glass windows around it with ZERO AC and people who keep the doors closed. It’s south Alabama it’s 88 degrees as of 6PM and it’s 80 degrees inside a room with a glass enclosure. It’s MISERABLE in the sauna that is considered a pool. I literally opened a door and was told by staff that the door needed to stay closed. If I wanted to go hang out in a spa I would have paid to go to the spa.

name: Reece Perkins
text:
Drove from Pasgogula and was turned away.
They said they were not allowing nationwide members in at this time.
Would have been nice if someone would have posted this to their website to let someone know this in advance.
Totally unacceptable.

name: Stephanie Sypsa
text: I only use the swimming pool,  and I really enjoy it. The water is the perfect temperature,  and there's always a lifeguard on duty.  Everyone that works there is super nice,  and there's lots to do to get in shape.

name: Jonathan Beasley
text: Great Staff! Guy who works the weight  in the mornings is so funny and easy to talk to as well as being super helpful whenever I have a question or need assistance! Great place to work out for all ages!

name: Keta Nicole
text: I do not ever and wouldn’t ever recommend any of these location or facilities for your children. Carmen Lee and Ashley is very unprofessional and bias. Carmen Lee through a pen at my youngest son because he was crying years back when I addressed her about she lied about it. Stay clear of this facility. She is one of the directors at Saraland short fat and stocky. Jealous is her second nature she does not need to work near kids at all. This is family Ran center and not for black children. I do not prefer sending your kids, to the after care not the ymca program.

name: Virginia Becker
text: Had a great tour and decided to join to use pool for exersize

name: Bianca Jester
text: People are always very nice and friendly. Everything is always clean.

name: 2i2never Mc
text: This location probably have the worst customer service, unfriendly front desk, email the manager the situation but never get a reply almost 2 weeks. The facility is old, needs to be updated. We decided not to go there anymore. We can deal with the facility but their service. We love the day care staff!

name: William Metzger
text:
There are 6 TV’s by the cardio equipment. The AFC championship game is on CBS. The gym closes in 90 minutes. According to the person supervising the weight room, they cannot change the channel by people’s request. Now I have to watch Fox News instead

This might be the final straw, Mobile Infirmary can’t possibly be this trash

name: Vicente D
text: I love this place

name: Lauren Thompson
text: My car was broken into while my daughter was at evening swimming classes. We were parked right next to the building under a lighted area. Lost my passenger window and belongings. YMCA should notify members of each occurrence. Park at your own risk!

name: Maria Delgado
text: Rally good place to workout with lots of activities for children to do. Their summer swim team and spring conditioning are the best with some of the best coaches in Mobile. Definitely a place for family to get healthy. They offer lifeguard and WSI certifications both done through the Red Cross. Their group exercise classes are the best!

resp.text: Thank you, Maria! We are so happy to hear you enjoy our facilities and programs we offer!

name: Michael Weak
text: Friendliest staff on the planet

name: Dorothy Sloan
text:
Very poor customer service at this location. I went in to re-join and they charged me $50 that day plus prorated for 11 days charge and then turned around 4 days later and charge me $45 for next month. Without explaining that to me.
I tried numerous times to call and cancel due to health issues and was told only one lady handled it and I would have to email her. I was told they couldn't give out her email address by one man but some lady finally did.  She never responded back via email so 4 days later after I call again and leave her a voicemail another employee sends a rude email about the cancellation and still charged me for the whole month of September. I tried to cancel 10 days before the date of my auto draft and due to their unprofessionalism I was unable to.
I will never recommend this place. Hardest ever to cancel.

name: Emilie Biggs
text: Super friendly staff!

name: Michael Pigott
text: Love a gym with a pool.

name: HM M
text: Very poor customer service. Everything involving memberships is so unorganized and neglected. The new machine equipment is difficult to use. The hours are horrible. Definitely have not felt at home there. I am choosing to go somewhere else.

name: Ishraq Hassan
text: I’ve seen 3rd world countries with better showers.

name: Trevion Johnson
text: This place is a joke ,parents do not let ur children play any sports there it's all about money they charge u $95 for a 4 or 5 game season with nothing but a shirt that cost only $7 or $8 at the most so u get 10 players on a team that's almost a $1000k .The right hand doesnt know what the left hand is doing and vice versa it is completely unorganized to the max ,if u call them out on things they dont want u there anymore

name: Samantha Pickney
text: I picked here because my kids could play in the nursery while I worked out. After five mins they come to get me to complain about my kids. They say my kids running around, playing with toys. They want my kids to sit in a chair in front of a TV. I only gone here four times and every time they had to say something bad about my kids. They hating on my kids because they being kids. My daughter is  autistic and I told them how to talk to her. They were  discriminating against my child! They would complain about my son for wanting to play with toys. These people don’t want to do their jobs. They want our kids to sit in front of the tv while they play on their phones. I am paying 75 dollars a month for them to hate on my kids! I am so not happy with how they treated my kids and me. Don’t take your family to this place.

name: Ryan Nielson
text: Awesome, except one employee who stole my basketball. Besides that I loved it there

name: Dannette Barker
text: I just found out that they now a daycare charge. As a single parent, this is upsetting.  I have never been asked to pay a daycare fee with a gym membership.  The family plan is too high and members with small children who can't use the equipment should not be charged.

name: Michele Hart
text: I love working out there. The staff is great!!

name: Jamie St. John
text: Always loved it there.  Plenty variety of exercise classes to take.

name: Ahmed Khursheed
text: I think it's the best place to do workout with how's some people locking for your kids,, I love it,,

name: overseermole
text: Great place except their day and month rates are high for a YMCA.

name: Arthur McClain
text: The staff was great, really helpful with all my needs.

name: Michael Hawthorne
text: A little pricey but you get what you pay for

name: Joseph Turner
text: Classes

name: Kelsey Finley
text: A fun place to  to be

name: rydarryian dees
text: I love this,it helps alot.

name: Barnacle Bill
text: Among all the other locations this one is the least desirable. The Pelham location offers so much more in a more updated facility. Don’t waste your time here. 👎👎

resp.text: Hi Bill! Glad you are enjoying the Pelham location.  Members get to enjoy multi-club access. While Hoover may not have the glitz and glam of our newer locations, it is special to 24e. Hoover was our very first location and has an "Old School" vibe and equipment you would be hard pressed to find anywhere else. So show us some love and consider giving us 5 stars. Thanks and Happy New Year!!

name: LaDarren Smith
text: BYSWO Fitness Trains out of this funk and it is the absolute best for those looking to take their fitness to another level! byswofitness.com can help with personal training and nutrition coaching

name: Christopher Peters
text: One of the best gyms in Birmingham with multiple locations

resp.text: Thanks Christopher!! So great to hear you are enjoying 24e. It's an honor to serve our awesome members!

name: WADE COLEMAN
text: Awesome gym, awesome environment. Great variety of equipment too.

name: Philip Duchock
text: Decent gym, a little small but conviemient for those who work odd hours. Customer service is good but im not a fan of the contract would recommend for locals near by.

name: Devin M Chapman
text: Clean, neutral environment. Great place to get some work in and be your self.

name: JaCorey Murray
text: I've been with this gym since 2012 and no complaints. Love the free weights, space and ability to come at any time of the day. If you're looking for a personal trainer, I'll recommend Nicolette Hayes. She is very talented and has a wide range of options to help with general cardio and strength conditioning. She'll also take the time to understand and customize your workout.

resp.text: Hi JaCorey! Thanks for taking the time to leave a great review. We are so thankful to have you at 24e for all these years. It is an honor. Thank you!!!

name: Jason Harmon
text:
Knowledgeable management and friendly.
Most adequate facilities for facilitating better health. Highly recommend

name: Carlos Cumpiano
text: This is a great gym. The staff is great. Very friendly people and like to make sure they have relationships with their members. It’s a little more than PF black card but well worth the price. Everyone that goes wants to work and better themselves.

name: Sabrina Gaddy
text: Luv 24e! It's a modern 'old school' style gym. Fantastic equipment & lots of it! Also lot of free weights! Open 24 hrs which is so awesome for those of us who work weird hours. Staff is great! always cheerful &  happy to assist!  Luv this gym!!

resp.text: Thank you, Sabrina!

name: Tommie Wisaeu
text: Honestly, this gym is EASILY the BEST gym I've been to. Nothing else comes close. Well, maybe a gym that costs 3x as much will be as good, but why bother when this gym is clean, has all of the equipment you could possibly need, and staff that genuinely cares. Price is fair, all the equipment works, plenty of changing rooms and bathrooms, private showers, this gym is as good as it gets.

resp.text: Thanks for the awesome review, Trent!! So thankful to have you at 24e!!

name: Bergen Bolt
text:
The best gym in town!
I've used several different local gyms over the years, and this one is far and away my favorite. The equipment is fantastic, the facility is large and open, the staff is knowledgeable, helpful, and friendly, and the other members are amazing. As a woman on a weight loss journey, it can be difficult to find a gym where it feels like I belong. And it's really cool to feel like I belong in a gym where bodybuilding athletes train!
The price is perfect and the service and support from staff is above and beyond! I recently had surgery and they called to check on me to make sure I was healing okay. I love this gym!!!!!

resp.text: Thank you so much for those kind words!! It is truly a blessing to have such awesome members!! Thanks Bergen!!

name: Garrett Bell
text: This gym is great for anyone. The environment is very nice, with a good mix of beginners up to series bodybuilders. Mix of older and newer equipment which is very well maintained. Staff is friendly and helpful. I have and would recommend this gym to anyone. Gym gets fairly busy later in the day from 4-6pm but never to busy to get on the machines and weights you want to use. The best part is you can workout any time any day. For the most part there is always a few people working out.

name: Deep South
text: Best gym I have ever been a member of, common sense owner and staff.

name: Steve Trowbridge
text: Great Gym! Never packed, very clean, employees are great!

resp.text: Thanks Steve!! That is great to hear! We are thankful have such awesome members and staff!

name: David Rhodes
text: Team Swole, Whooo!

resp.text: Ha! That's right! Thanks for the five stars!!

name: Steven Johnson
text: I have been going to this gym since it opened. I love it because they have a lot of free weights and many different types. They even have lifting platforms with bumper style plates for Olympic and power lifting. I wouldn't go anywhere else. The owner and staff are top notch as well

name: Koinonia with God
text:
What makes 24e so special is my personal trainer, Hugheston. He is one of the most soft-hearted and intentional people I have ever met. Your goals become his goals and he somehow always manages to go the extra mile with you. I have spent my whole life away from the gym but he has transformed my negative perception of working out into a world of excitement and possibility. I never thought I could enjoy working out!

I'm always suspicious about trainers but he is not in it for the money, his motivation is in getting to transform your lives and I have gotten to see that first hand.

resp.text: Thank you, so much! We are certainly proud of Hugheston and are thankful for awesome members like you!!

name: Jim McFerrin
text: Best equipment and staff in town.

resp.text: Not to mention, the best members!! Thank you!

name: Bryan Gilbert
text: Best customer experience I’ve ever had at a business. Houston at the front desk was one of the friendliest people I’ve ever met. Give that man a raise.

name: B D
text: Best bang for buck ive ever gotten from a gym. Always open and it's good for people who really want to work out. Even though it's more of a bodybuilder gym, the crowd has always been really welcoming to whoever

name: Koinonia with God
text:
What makes 24e so special is my personal trainer, Hugheston. He is one of the most soft-hearted and intentional people I have ever met. Your goals become his goals and he somehow always manages to go the extra mile with you. I have spent my whole life away from the gym but he has transformed my negative perception of working out into a world of excitement and possibility. I never thought I could enjoy working out!

I'm always suspicious about trainers but he is not in it for the money, his motivation is in getting to transform your lives and I have gotten to see that first hand.

resp.text: Thank you, so much! We are certainly proud of Hugheston and are thankful for awesome members like you!!

name: Charles Perkins
text: Best fun I've ever been apart of. Love the staff love the environment of real lifters in there.

name: bwarren1975
text: I like this gym. Owner is cool. Employees are cool. Membership price is not bad.  Hammer strength equipment is good.

name: Craig Summerville
text: Why would you go anywhere else?  Definitely the best "bang for the buck", so to speak.  There are no other gyms in the area where you can spend $25.00 a month and have access to a gym 24 hours a day!  This makes it super convenient if you work odd hours.  The atmosphere is fantastic.  The equipment is modern, clean, and well maintained.  The staff is extremely friendly and knowledgeable.  So, I ask again, why would you go elsewhere?

name: Shaun Southward
text: Best gym in Birmingham. Only gym in town that gives you access to a full gym, that's 24/7 with no contract memberships. Staff was great, not stuffy like most places. $25 per month for this place is a steal

name: Marc Glass
text: 8 dollars daily. Great for travelers. Awesome gym, friendly staff.

resp.text: Thanks Marc!!

name: Donald Watkins
text: I have some friends that work out here. its not for the faint of heart. if you are serious about getting fit and making it a lifestyle this may be the perfect gym for you.

name: Charlie Prince
text: Best gym I've ever been to. Clean, had whether you need the people and ut has a great culture of your serious about getting in shape.

name: J Spratling
text: I experienced the same poor service when I tried to cancel my membership.  Jack, the manager, was extremely unprofessional.  I would NOT recommend this gym to anyone.  There are several gyms in the Birmingham area.  You can easily find one that appreciates your business from the time you sign up to the time you cancel.  Do not go to this gym.

name: Kevin Wilkie
text: Great place to workout. Plenty of equipment and everything you need for a good workout!

resp.text: Thanks Kevin!

name: Austin Mann

name: Dylan Stephenson
text: Great place to go workout. it's also has a very friendly and helpful staff as well!

name: Michael Wallace
text: Great Gym.  They have all you need for a full body workout.  Employees are friendly and helpful.

name: Brent Harris
text: 24e fitness in Hoover is awesome, and the atmosphere is great. Hugheston is my personal trainer and I highly recommend him. We have great interaction, while he gives me valuable coaching techniques. Hugheston has also helped me with a great diet plan to help me achieve my goals. Thanks Hugheston!!

resp.text: Thank you, Brent! It is truly rewarding to have such awesome members and to hear that our trainers, like Hugheston, are making a difference!!

name: Grant Price
text: Great gym, Houghston helped me get in shape with a personal training program!

resp.text: Thanks Grant! We're so happy to hear that Hugheston is helping you meet your fitness goals!

name: frank baker
text: This is a beautiful facility convenient to research park.  It's nice to have a place to work out at lunch break.

name: Jay R
text: This is a clean, well run, locally owned business. 24e offers just about every service you'd want from a Health Club membership.

name: Jay R
text: This is a clean, well run, locally owned business. 24e offers just about every service you'd want from a Health Club membership.

name: Nannette Zeanah
text: I have used this gym for 5 years.  My family uses it as well.  I have lost 105 pounds.  Wow!  That's amazing isn't it!.  My son has lost over 100 pounds as well.  I couldn't have done it without the help of the staff and trainers.  I train with Hugheston at present.  He's amazing and very knowledgeable.  He is very conscientious and seems to care about his clients.  He helps me to do the exercises with the correct form. I am older and have some physical issues.  He works with me to help improve my mobility and flexibility.  That really helps me alot.  I am a nurse and work 12 hours shifts three days a week.  Hugheston helps me immensely.  I could keep going on and on but I want everyone to know that the Hoover 24e is a great place to get healthy and fit.  I've never been uncomfortable or felt out of place.  If I have questions Daniel or Hugheston makes sure to help me find the answers.  So if you want to get fit or just be healthy come see what the gym is all about.

name: Chris Ehrixh
text: Great gym. Love it.

resp.text: Thanks Chris!

name: Cameron White
text: Great staff, great regulars, and most importantly great gym.

name: Jeff Randle
text: This fitness club is HUGE with so many options for literally anything you could want to do. The cardio equipment is all the way on the other side of the gym from the free weights so the people who don't want to mingle don't have to. If machines are your thing, they have any and all that you can imagine. They've really tried to cover every base with this gym.

name: Shantavia
text: At first i thought it was a wonderful gym and i didnt mind pay 30 dollars a month then a family emergency came up so i could no longer pay for the personal trainer i decided to get the trainer understood but the managers couldnt i wouldnt recommend anyone to go to this gym

text: No Cooling Off Period or Try It Out Time. I joined this gym and after going five times did not feel like it was the right fit for me, and did not like going to a gym without staff at night. When I contacted Daniel at the gym and asked if I could cancel I was told my only options were to pay a $150 or finish out the contact without using the gym if I did not like it. He said it did not matter that I had only been a member for less than a two weeks. So beware they do not offer a trial period - join and if you do not like it pay their fee.

Best gym ever

name: Virginia A
text: A bit pricy but very clean, great equipment, and 24 hr access is a lifesaver. Awesome and very helpful manager. Would definitely recommend this place to anyone !

name: Destiny Fitch
text: Great gym

name: DWMJr
text: Wonderful

name: Erin Nicholas
text: This is my favorite gym ever, it has everything I love! I've been coming here for years! Everyone is so friendly! I feel so welcome coming here! And I'm always motivated because their is lots to do! I have all the motivation I need! Patrick is a really great leader to talk to! Brock has the best group training workouts!

name: Sharise G
text: I was a member there before I moved. I made my cousin and two of my friends join because of how much I liked it.  Patrick and Mike were amazing. Patrick always spoke and asked me about my day and how things were going and would even call and check up on me. Mike's training helped me figure out how to keep things fresh. I would recommend this gym to anyone seriously looking for results and new friends.

name: Eric Ekholm
text:
Amazing facility with even better staff. I would like to thank Andrew Philen for personally guiding my fitness goals. Andrew not only helps me with the physical part but he also helps me nutritionally and is the most motivating person I think I've ever met.
Patrick Johnson made the sign up process incredibly easy and really took his time with me. I felt like he was more interested in what he could do for me than what he could get out of me for Gold's.
This place is awesome. I never thought I would be a "gym guy", but the staff really makes you feel at home and couldn't be any more accommodating.
Thanks again.

name: Victor Corder
text: Wonderful Gym. I enjoy the gym because it has everything a person need to accomplished his health goals. The Staff is very nice and polite. I like the new weights that replace the old one. The bathroom are clean also.

name: Jamie Stahler
text: This was a great location. It was spacious with plenty of machines, free weights, cardio, a spin area, baseball court and a pool. It's set back off the road a bit so you may need a map to help find it. It was clean and seemed to be on the newer side.

name: michael smith
text: Been attending this gym since it opened...great place with nice equipment, a variety of classes, and courteous & helpful staff...always nice to see Christian and Daniel.  There's a diverse group of members ranging from high school kids to the elderly, and people just getting in a quick 20 minutes to some pretty devoted fitness fanatics.  Many local individuals, couples and a few families, most of whom are regulars and friendly.  Just recently (mid-2014) got in 8 new Hammer Strength machines to compliment an excellent weight room.

name: Greg Ludwig
text: Basketball court is cool and the gym equipment is top notch. The bathrooms are really gross. Pretty good other than that.

name: Jenny Smith
text: Went here a few times with a friend. The first time was horrible, as the sales guy was very rude and stern. The second time was the complete opposite. The gym is very nice and the staff was really welcoming. The lady's locker room was well kept. The women in the daycare were great with my kids and the sales rep I met with the second time was very kind and informative and didn't hound me about joining and kept up with me for weeks after. Be sure to speak with Patrick or Daniel if you ever go to this establishment, they really seemed to care about what I wanted.

name: A Goodyear
text: Facilities are amazing.  Often too crowded, but late night is the best time to go.

name: Daniel Reinman
text: I've been to many gyms and this Gold's gym location is really good. It has a lot of the amenities I like and need. Suana, pool, indoor track, machines (relatively new), free weights, group studio, cardio machines - it has something for everyone.  It is also less crowded than many gyms I have been to, and all at a relatively good price. If something breaks, it doesn't stay that way for long and the staff are friendly and responsive. I highly recommend giving it a look if you are in the market for a gym membership.

name: Matt Elder
text: Great gym. Plenty of weights and equipment. Always clean. Managed well, and new staff is very friendly. Highly recommend this gym to anyone looking to better themselves physically.

name: Clifford Hill
text: Christian and Patrick are the best!! Great place and cool atmosphere to work out. The staff is extremely nice.

name: paul neafie
text: Listen I have had MORE than my fair share of trouble with golds gyms over the years but this one IS the exception.  The staff is courteous, professional, and very helpful. From the manager to sales staff to the trainers and anything in between.  These guys are top notch. Had some problems with my card due to that target thing and it took weeks to work out because I bank out of state. But they were patient and helped me get it all worked out. Can't speak for the rest of the golds but this one should be their business model

name: Chris McLaren
text: Christian and the entire welcoming and pleasant. This health club is very enjoyable and puts a smile on my face.

name: Christopher Peters
text: This is the biggest gym of the three. With your membership you can go to the one in Vestavia, Pelham or 280. I will never get rid of my membership, this gym has it all, the free weights, machines, pool, saunas and steam room. Vestavia has an indoor basketball court! Best value by far for the money!

name: Kristin Avis
text:
Second time this week I get up at 430 and am sitting in the parking lot bc the gym hasn’t opened. The most responsible and regular person here that usually opens doesn’t have a key, and the instructor doesnt have a key and there are issues with locks. Be smart- give them one. We realize you’re selling the building but at least follow through on what we pay for. You put your amazing instructors in a bad position to apologize and listen to members frustrations when it’s jot their fault- it’s an upper ADMINISTRATIVE failure and lack of practical thinking. The staff are wonderful, the instructors are tremendously dedicated and have the highest energy and quality and expertise-
As administrators you need figure it out and give better service- and not put your staff in bad positions to catch he brunt of complaints because of your lack of dedication and poor attention to detail. at least let someone have a key to open the gym for a class or if they are supposed to open the gym. They’re dedicated and responsible adults and they are what keeps the regular early morning members coming.

name: Norse Archaelogist Does Things
text: Tried to cancel my membership over the phone in April and they said they just charged my account( it was a day earlier than what it should have been). Then I took my credit card off the website so they couldn't use it. They still somehow charged me. I called and they said you have to come in. I do the paper work and request a refund of just may and they say I'm trapped with them till September. After I'll be moved away to the other side of the country.

name: ram5K5 K
text: BEWARE! I was a member for over a year and decided to cancel when relocating. I asked the front desk how to cancel and was given an email address to send in my request. I was told I would have to give a 30 day notice. After doing EVERYTHING I was told to do to cancel....THEY ARE STILL BILLING MY CREDIT CARD AND I CAN'T MAKE THEM STOP! I have talked with the corporate office and they practically accused me of lying! After disputing the charges with my credit card company...Gold's Gym continues to try and charge me! It has been a nightmare....how can they get away with this?

name: Heather Gustafson
text:
The gym is nice, and the staff is friendly.

The contracts are awful, and best of luck to you trying to get out of yours. I was put through the ringer trying to cancel a membership (even after it expired). Honestly dealing with corporate was the worst part- condescending emails and bad customer service!

Oh and there is a high turnover of staff at this location, so don't get attached to anyone.

name: Joe Overman
text: Great gym! Helpful staff. Facility is all you could ask for in a gym.

name: Joseph Duran
text: Great gym, just need to add tanning and they will have everything.

name: Mister Moore
text: Great environment and cool staff. Patrick johnson's very helpful when I go in.

name: Keith Pilston
text: I joined Gold's due to there not being people at my previous gym to help motivate me. The team at Gold's has been great so far and I see improvement in myself because of it.

name: Ben Brannon
text: If you like being jerked around and lied to repeatedly, do yourself a favor and join Gold's Gym Vestavia - the worst customer service I have ever experienced. I canceled my membership on July 25 and continue to be billed every month. I have left messages at the gym as well as with the corporate office. Not one returned phone call. Found out yesterday morning that they failed to send in my cancellation. Asked for the GM to call me back ASAP. Didn't happen. Had to call them back this morning. We shall see if they actually follow through this time.

name: Mysterious Woman
text: Great place to work out friendly staff grit equipment

name: Samantha Williams
text: Love this gym and love the people! Everyone is very friendly and has a wide variety members!

name: Natesha Speight
text: Love it! Been a member for over 5 yrs.

name: Kirk Gamblin
text: After sum confusion Jamie was able to explain what was up with my cancellation. Workouts were good when I was able to do so.

name: Sophia Warner
text: Love Golds- especially my trainer Christian, he rocks!

name: Ben Christiansen
text: I have been going to this Gold's location for 7 years and it is great.

name: James Pak
text: Thief's work there!!  Beware!!! Always use a padlock. They go into the lockers and steal your wallet and cards and then run out and use it while you're working out.

name: Craig List
text: The best gym in BHam for sure. Very clean and with new modern equipment from Precor, TechnoGym and FreeMotion. The track is really cool for running instead of boring treadmills. I did a few "sessions" with trainer Kyle White and he definitely knows how to give you a good work out, you won't be disappointed. The two of us have a pretty regular thing going on now. The location is convenient but it can get pretty busy after work. I would suggest if you can try and go later in the evening to avoid the crowds and get an appointment with Kyle then hit the sauna afterwards for some small talk and hot relaxation. There's no juice bar or anything like that but Mugshots is right up 31 and a great midway point to loosen up little bit before just going home and straight to bed. Kyle is also very skilled in deep tissue massage due to his strong grip and thick forearms, so if you are sore afterwards it's a good way jumpstart the recovery process and get you in the right mood. Highly recommended!

name: Kendall Scott
text: Staff is very friendly!!! Overall it is very clean and well equipped with pool, free and machine weights, cardio equipment, theatre cardio room, and basketball court.

name: Abranette Jackson
text: They have everything I like in a gym. Plus a cinema room. This really helps me to get my workout done when I'm not motivated.  😉

name: Noah T
text:
Apart from my horrible experience with this place, know this:  There are a lot of gyms, depending on what you are looking for with nicer people (both trainers and clientale), better prices and value, and much nicer customer service and more knowlegeable personal trainers than Gold's, and specifically this Gold's.

Gold's is really struggling as their gyms get larger and more empty.  No surprise as soon as you walk in the door and they find out you aren't a member they try and get you to sign a contract.  The are commission based and are forced to get a lot of memberships but could care less about you as a person.  I go to a gym now where the exact opposite is true.  Why do you think they make you sign a long contract.  Yeah their facilities are nice, but it won't take long to regret their overpriced rudeness and inexperienced sometimes ignorant physical trainers.  Physical trainers start out at Gold's and the good ones leave because Golds takes a large cut of the top of their fees( not trainers fault)  BE WARNED!

My own story?

I moved down to B'ham about 2 years ago then had to return to Missouri when I canceled my membership in person with this location's manager, Mike Bick.  I came in and he assured me everything was good.  (Memberships can only be canceled if there's not a Gold's Gym location within a certain proximity of where you are moving, must show proof of move)  When I arrived in Missouri I faxed Bick a copy of my utility bill and called him to verify he got it.

Months later I moved back to B'ham and considered re-enrolling when I was shocked to find out they were still auto-billing my card and refused to refund me after I called several times and went to their accounting department.  Google search for similar stories,  this gym only wants your $$$$.

name: Justin J
text: Friendly staffs. Neat and clean facilities.

name: Logan Adams
text: Great gym for the price. Also, second largest Gold's Gym in the country.

name: Anthony Agee
text:
I am in town on business for a few weeks and inquired about guest passes.  Was told it was $99 for one month or $15 per day. Yes, $100 a month!!

The gym itself is clean but full of second-rate, off-brand equipment. For a gym passing itself off as "premium" I find it pretty laughable that there is only one cable machine, no LifeFitness or Hammer Strength brand equipment ANYWHERE.  Their free-weight section is tiny and cramped and put off to the side.

Front desk people I have encountered for each of the last 3 days I have visited (that's $45 so far....) have been less than friendly and seem inconvenienced by my presence.

name: 1kymaniakbar
text: Awesome gym to sculpture your body

name: Charlie Graham
text: Nasty gym. They have not cleaned this place in long time and there were dead bugs on the floor. Plus the staff was not very friendly and did not talk to customers.

name: Kavi D
text: The staff that works in the evenings is extremely rude and does not value their members at all! Will never go back to this location in the evening. It makes me want to cancel my membership because it was so bad.

name: Fernando Smith
text: Good place to work out

name: Bethany Cusimano
text: Clean, kind staff, only 1 DL platform
