Mi sitio para entrenar

name: Kerry Griffith
text: One of the best gyms I've ever been to. The atmosphere is motivating. The staff genuinely care about your fitness journey. The comrades are very friendly.

name: Mike Tilford
text: The most amazing environment to work out. The staff and coaches take the time to get to know you and help you focus on your fitness goals.  You will never feel judged or uncomfortable.  The positivity radiates through every member.  Everyone is supportive and friendly.  You will be made to feel at home as soon as you walk through the door.

name: Matthew Wade
text: The facility is incredible, the workouts are great, but the community is what brings me back. The coaching staff not only brings years of knowledge to the table, but strives to make each of us a better athlete and a better person. I look forward to walking through the door each morning knowing I will be greeted as if I'm the most important person of the hour. So, if you're looking for a gym to call home, or just to drop in for a good sweat, please stop by and see for yourself how Element Fitness can change your life!

resp.text: You're awesome Matthew!!!!

name: Jayli Dismukes
text: Element fitness is a hard working but very fun workout center. The staff is so kind and all of the people are just the best. Everyone is so motivating toward one another. The atmosphere is great and you can get the job done! I highly recommend!

name: Daniela Susnara
text: Element Fitness provides a fantastic environment for anyone of any fitness level looking to improve their health/lifestyle/nutrition. They are able to do this with a knowledgeable coaching staff and incredibly supportive community. Their effective crossfit and x4 programming offers something for everyone!

name: Blake Hudson
text: Element Fitness is everything you could want in a gym and more! The classes are intense and totally ready for you when you show up - no preparation needed. Whether you are looking for an intense weightlifting session with CrossFit RTR or an endurance pushing X4 HIIT class, Element has the perfect fit. The community is top notch and the gym hosts fun nights for everyone with free food and trivia throughout the semester. Element is amazing (and the smoothie bar is too)!

name: Collins Mills
text: Very proud to be apart of the gym!! Love the programming, coaching, and community!! Always pushing me to better!

name: Nelly Carmichael
text: BEST Crossfit in town! Been doing crossfit for few years and RTR has the best WODs that work your whole body! Never gets boring!

name: Tip T
text: Desiree is the best trainer in Montgomery! She is an expert in nutrition and the science of exercise. The gym is immaculate and they are very professional. Be prepared for a great workout.

resp.text: Thank you so much

name: Chord O'Roy
text: First time working out via video conferencing but I have benefited more than I would at Planet Fitness...thank you Jamie and Desiree for your hard work putting this together

resp.text: Thanks for the shout out! We appreciate the support. Your consistency and dedication makes it all worth it! Keep working towards your goal 💪

name: Pam Carden
text: I absolutely love everything about Pure Barre Huntsville!  My husband said it's the only workout I've ever stuck with!   It's effective and fun!  The staff went above and beyond during the early months of Covid by providing online classes.   Very proud to be part of the Pure Barre Huntsville Family.

resp.text: Thank you so much for your kind review and high praises, Pam. We are honored to have an amazing community of clients and we are delighted you are among them. Pure Barre is a great work out and we are glad that you have kept up with it! Keep it up!

name: Angelica Lee
text: Pure Barre Huntsville is an effective yet safe workout. The clients and staff are all such a joy to be around and I couldn't be more proud to be apart of an outstanding community. I highly recommend anyone, regardless of their fitness needs, to give Pure Barre a try.

name: Fannie Proctor
text: I absolutely love Pure Barre Huntsville! The staff is amazing and it’s the best workout. I would highly recommend giving PB a try for a great full body workout.

resp.text: Thank you for your kind review, Fannie. We are delighted that you are apart of our community. Pure Barre is a great and safe work out. We highly recommend everyone to try it out at least once.

name: Andrea Schilling
text: Amazing owners, staff and instructors. I always get a great workout whether it has been a day or weeks since I have been to class!

name: Samantha Key
text: I love love love Pure Barre!! I have tried numerous workouts and this was the first one that I got the results I was looking for: The results are amazing plus I really enjoy the workout. I really love how the instructor is always checking your technique to make sure you are getting the most from your workout.  Everyone is so positive and uplifting. It's the PERFECT way to start your day. If you have been on the fence about trying it, you should def give it a try!!! You won't be disappointed! :)

name: Jacqueline Weaver
text: Wonderful facility,  friendly staff, great full body workout!

resp.text: Jacqueline, thank you so much for your kind words! We are so thankful to have you at Pure Barre Huntsville! We are so glad you have had a positive experience, and appreciate you sharing this review!

name: Emily Rogers
text: One of my favorite ways to work out. Don't go anymore as I've been working out at a different gym but this place is always so welcoming and full of a lovely staff. Helpful and encouraging team makes for a great workout regardless of your fitness level.

name: Melissa Trapp-Petty
text:
As a hard-core yogi and runner, I've found it to be a great way for me to work on strengthening specifically my backside and hips. In the short time I've been doing it (two weeks), I've noticed changes to my body mechanics and figure.

Last, the class times are convenient around my schedule, and the people are lovely and welcoming. I appreciate the program.

name: Liz Helton Bullard
text: Pure Barre Huntsville rocks! The girls in the studio immediately made me feel very comfortable and welcome. All of the instructors and employees, even those that I hadn't spoken to initially, knew my name by the time I came back for my second class (pretty incredible, considering that they hadn't taken a picture or anything to know me by) and greeted me by name upon coming in and encouraged me during class. The instructors and employees are very down-to-earth, kind, and cool, which you sadly sometimes don't see in small, upscale studios. The atmosphere there has motivated me to go every day after work!

name: Stephanie Rauseo
text: Pure Barre is a great way to get a total body workout in 55 minutes. I love the core strength and flexibility I have achieved by coming to classes. The teachers are always there to help put you in the correct form as well as motivate you to push harder and go lower for the extra shaking.

name: Caroline Kirk
text:
Pure Barre is amazing! I have an inner ear condition called Meniere's Disease that causes intermittent dizziness with chronic disequilibrium.  Balance is like a muscle and must be worked out continuously for optimum performance.  Pure Barre does this for me. Meredith and the staff are amazing.  They have flexible class schedules with clean, comfortable facilities and equipment. The changes to your muscles and weight is great for self confidence.  Highly recommend Pure Barre as a lifestyle change for most people!

Kari Kingsley
Nurse Practitioner

name: susie walter
text: I just love it!  Everyone is always in good spirit and the workout is so different. Works my legs and butt muscles in a unique way.  I find legs difficult to work with a bad back so I like the no weights.  I have to really focus and I like that.  Instructors are nice and always willing to answer questions.  Susie

name: Jackie Kachele
text: Love this workout. Pure Barre is a workout for everybody no matter what your level of fitness is and if you have any complications, the staff/instructors will work with you to find alternate moves. I love this studio and the staff. It becomes a fun place to go daily.

name: Rebecca Cockrell
text: Great low-impact workout that produces results! I love the way I feel! (& look!) I stand all day at work, & the increase in my core strength has greatly diminished my lower back pain! The staff are always welcoming & available to help!

name: Marianne McConnell Zollar
text: The first time I took pure barre I was hooked! As an instructor I always tell new clients that the 55 minutes will go by so fast. Arrive at least 10 minutes early to complete paperwork, get all set up, and allow you to talk to the instructor or other clients about how the class works. Within 10 classes you will feel so strong!

name: Kendall Frawley
text: LOVE pure barre! Instructors are so nice and willing to help you. Amazing workout and great apparel!!

name: Kayla Brazelton
text: I have just started pure barre and am already seeing changes. It's a very fun and efficient way to work out. If you haven't tried pure barre you should definitely give it a chance.

name: Susan Geoghegan
text: Fabulous classes and great instructors! PB Huntsville is my happy place where I can forgot about real life for a while.

name: Ashley Rather
text: Great full body work out. Staff is friendly and helpful. Studio is big enough to not feel too crowded. Love the retail clothing!

name: Lee Satterfield
text: I have been a client at Pure Barre Huntsville for 3 years now and I still love it! It is always challenging and fun. I never stop seeing results unlike many other things I have done in the past that either I got burned out on or just stopped producing the same results. You can count on Pure Barre Huntsville to always be pushing it to the next challenge!

name: Katie Kleiner
text: Awesome workout that is always a challenge! It produces results while being safe and fun. Love the 55 minutes I set aside to better myself.

name: Jessica Stroud
text: I'm in Huntsville for Thanksgiving with family and went to this location. Wanda and Marianne were so friendly and helpful. They made me feel right at home. The studio was clean and the workout was great! Thanks ladies!

name: Stephanie Nelson
text: If you are looking for a fun low impact routine, Pure Barre is for you. The instructors are great they make you work for every calorie you burn. You will Love and Hate them at the same time.

name: Krystina Berens
text: Absolutely loved my first class with Pure Barre! The staff was incredible and so welcoming. The instructor was very personable and helpful. I will definitely be returning!

name: Ann Ever Ainsworth
text: Love Pure Barre! It is a great workout for the beginner or the experienced. The front desk ladies and the teachers are all so nice and welcoming. Huntsville Pure Barre is my favorite workout in town!

name: Megan Johnson
text: Although I have tried Pure Barre in the past (in another city), this was my first class in over 6 months. I felt very welcome and very comfortable even though I'm very out of shape! I've already signed up for my next class tomorrow!

name: Amy Delahoussaye
text: Everyone was very welcoming and they set me up as a new client with great ease! I loved the class, instructor, and studio and cannot wait to attend again!

name: Jennifer Helton
text: Pure Barre is a great workout, try a few classes and you will be addicted!! Great instructors, awesome retail selection, and friendly environment! It's the only workout I have stuck to after almost 3 years!

name: Angela Pressley
text: I canceled our membership in July due to Covid. I called and the owner assured me we would not be charged in August and that the account was closed. Well guess what the money come out and when I called him back he said they would refund my money back not to worry. I then asked him if it would be going the same thing in September he once again assured me it wouldn’t. Oh but yes it did oh and I still haven’t gotten my refund from August. So now I paid for two months after my account had been closed. Well then to top it off no one will return a phone call,text or email about my money. Then today I get another email saying they are trying to take another payment out of my account! I was stolen from,lied to and just completely ignored. Today I called and asked for corporate’s phone number well guess what they didn’t answer either. I maybe out of all that money but if I can stop someone else from getting treated the way I was, it will be worth it.

name: hayden bryars
text: The place is always dirty, short on weight plates and constantly has malfunctioning restrooms.. I cancelled my membership and was charged a month later. When I called about it, the employee told me there was no membership change from on file (not accurate) then he called me an a**shole. This place is a JOKE!

name: Tam Nguyen
text: They closed and move when I came back in my routine bad service ever

name: Reginald Ingram
text: It's great for a small town gym. The membership pricing is affordable. They offer a great mix of free weights as well as machines, they have a cardio room that's great for stretching, and now has a punching bag in it (major plus since no other gyms in the area has a punching bag). They do have some good personal trainers, and offer classes. One major benefit is its 24/7. You can work out on your own schedule to fit your lifestyle.  I prefer working out at 4am, and this gym affords me that luxury. I've never had a wait time to use any machine, that's also a major plus. The staff keeps all areas of this gym very clean, and most patrons usually wipe down things after they've used them.

name: Kanina Crosen
text: Suddenly stopped honoring free passes that we have handed out for years! Didn’t bother to actually call us and let us know. I guess they don’t like getting more business.

text: The place kinda stinks. I work out at the Pell City one and that one is miles ahead of this gym. A treadmill has a broken incline button where it's falling off. A aerobic machine sticks and nearly threw me off whilst trying to use it. Don't use this gym. Go to a different SnapFitness. The one in pellcity is clean, kind and has amazing staff/patrons.

Courteous employees !!!

We hope to see you at our Planet in Tuscaloosa again soon 💜

resp.text: Thanks for sharing the PF love, Beth! We hope to see you at our well-maintained and comfortable Planet in Tuscaloosa again soon 💜👍

And you still have to use your head. I use a paper towel to grab the bottle of cleaner. I clean equipment before, just in case, and after. Get in there and get your workout in💪🏽

text:
To be a gym that is against Lunks and even has a Lunk alarm saying.  That they would have a Lunk as manager of this location.
Great facility with great new equipment. However the manager is rude and has an attitude problem.   I canceled my membership over a pair of 4 dollar tanning bed goggles.   It’s not the goggles that made me cancel.  it was the attitude of the manager.  He didn’t oppose me canceling my membership in no way.  Canceling was very simple and easy!  Very pleased!  I recommend this location if you’d like to cancel your membership.

resp.text: Hi, dustin. We understand that our club isn't for everyone, but we still appreciate your feedback. Please try to understand that we don't actually like to use the lunk alarm, but we will use it if it means protecting our #JudgementFreeZone. Pushing the body and achieving results is completely acceptable, but excessive yelling and weight slamming are not. Thanks for reaching out.

text: The place is great but I haven’t been in 4 months or more and I just got a txt saying that I just paid for my membership fee when I haven’t been to Snap at all

name: Katherine Stephens
text: I have tried different gyms off and on throughout the years, but SNAP is my ABSOLUTE FAV!! The gym is always nice and so clean. Jessica Baines is my go to! She is always helpful and you can tell she loves her job and all of her members! I highly recommend snap!!

name: Lizzie Clark
text: The staff at this club are amazing caring people that know their business! They get you the results you  are looking for!  It is spotless too! wow!

name: Jennifer-Draven Cook
text: The staff is AMAZING!!  The gym is clean and well organized.  They have a wide varity of cardio machines and strenght training.  Plus all of the equipment is functional.  They even have a room where you can choose workout video's from an online catalog (for example like Julian Michaels).

resp.text: Thanks so much Jennifer! We love our community and strive to be the very best at what we do. Its so nice to hear people like you are getting what you need at Snap Fitness PC!

name: Christian Turley
text: Great, small sized gym. Clean and has something for everyone. The environment is great for anyone who wants a quiet gym or just starting out!

name: Laura Serrano
text: Fabulous gym! Fabulous staff!

name: Jacob Grayson
text: I would not ever recommend this gym again. They pretend they want to help you at the end of the day they only want your money.

name: Brenda Hayes
text: Nice friendly people

name: Brent Bodily
text: Great facility
